original: 07,024.029a tiṣṭhantam agrato dṛṣṭvā prativindhyaṃ tam āhave
analyzed: tiṣṭhantam agratas dṛṣṭvā prativindhyam tam āhave

original: 07,024.029c drauṇir mānaṃ pituḥ kurvan mārgaṇaiḥ samavārayat
analyzed: drauṇiḥ mānam pituḥ kurvan mārgaṇaiḥ samavārayat

original: 07,024.030a taṃ kruddhaḥ prativivyādha prativindhyaḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: tam kruddhaḥ prativivyādha prativindhyaḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
siṃha lāṅgūla lakṣmāṇam pituḥ arthe vyavasthitam
pravapan iva bījāni bīja kāle nara ṛṣabha
drauṇāyaniḥ draupadeyam śara varṣaiḥ avākirat
ārjunim śrutakīrtim ca draupadeyam mahā ratham
droṇāya abhimukham yāntam dauḥśāsaniḥ avārayat

original: 07,024.031d*0179_03 tasya kṛṣṇasamaḥ kārṣṇis tribhir bhallaiḥ susaṃśitaiḥ
analyzed: tasya kṛṣṇa samaḥ kārṣṇiḥ tribhiḥ bhallaiḥ su saṃśitaiḥ

original: 07,024.031d*0179_04 dhanur dhvajaṃ ca sūtaṃ ca chittvā droṇāntikaṃ yayau
analyzed: dhanuḥ dhvajam ca sūtam ca chittvā droṇa antikam yayau

original: 07,024.032a yas tu śūratamo rājan senayor ubhayor mataḥ
analyzed: yaḥ tu śūratamaḥ rājan senayoḥ ubhayoḥ mataḥ
tam paṭaccara hantāram lakṣmaṇaḥ samavārayat

original: 07,024.033a sa lakṣmaṇasyeṣvasanaṃ chittvā lakṣma ca bhārata
analyzed: sa lakṣmaṇasya iṣvasanam chittvā lakṣma ca bhārata
lakṣmaṇe śara jālāni visṛjan bahu aśobhata
tatas bhimanyuḥ karmāṇi kurvantam citra yodhinam
ārjuniḥ kṛtinam śūram lakṣmaṇam samayodhayat
vikarṇaḥ tu mahā prājñaḥ yājñasenim śikhaṇḍinam
paryavārayat āyāntam yuvānam samare yuvā
tatas tam iṣu jālena yājñaseniḥ samāvṛṇot

original: 07,024.035c vidhūya tad bāṇajālaṃ babhau tava suto balī
analyzed: vidhūya tat bāṇa jālam babhau tava sutaḥ balī
aṅgadaḥ abhimukhaḥ śūram uttamaujasam āhave
droṇāya abhimukham yāntam vatsadantaiḥ avārayat
sa saṃprahāraḥ tumulaḥ tayoḥ puruṣa siṃhayoḥ

original: 07,024.037c sainikānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ tayoś ca prītivardhanaḥ
analyzed: sainikānām ca sarveṣām tayoḥ ca prīti vardhanaḥ

original: 07,024.037d*0181_01 aṅgadaṃ pañcabhir bāṇair avidhyat sa paraṃtapaḥ
analyzed: aṅgadam pañcabhiḥ bāṇaiḥ avidhyat sa paraṃtapaḥ

original: 07,024.037d*0181_02 aṅgado daśabhir bāṇaiḥ punar enam avākirat
analyzed: aṅgadaḥ daśabhiḥ bāṇaiḥ punar enam avākirat
tatas samabhavat yuddham anyonyam itaretaram
vīrāṇām jaya kāṅkṣāṇām atīva bala pauruṣāt

original: 07,024.038a durmukhas tu maheṣvāso vīraṃ purujitaṃ balī
analyzed: durmukhaḥ tu mahā iṣvāsaḥ vīram purujitam balī
droṇāya abhimukham yāntam kuntibhojam avārayat

original: 07,024.039a sa durmukhaṃ bhruvor madhye nārācena vyatāḍayat
analyzed: sa durmukham bhruvoḥ madhye nārācena vyatāḍayat

original: 07,024.039c tasya tad vibabhau vaktraṃ sanālam iva paṅkajam
analyzed: tasya tat vibabhau vaktram sa nālam iva paṅkajam

original: 07,024.040a karṇas tu kekayān bhrātṝn pañca lohitakadhvajān
analyzed: karṇaḥ tu kekayān bhrātṝn pañca lohitaka dhvajān
droṇāya abhimukham yātām śara varṣaiḥ avārayat
te ca enam bhṛśa saṃkruddhāḥ śara vrātaiḥ avākiran

original: 07,024.041c sa ca tāṃś chādayām āsa śarajālaiḥ punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: sa ca tān chādayām āsa śara jālaiḥ punar punar

original: 07,024.042a naiva karṇo na te pañca dadṛśur bāṇasaṃvṛtāḥ
analyzed: na eva karṇaḥ na te pañca dadṛśuḥ bāṇa saṃvṛtāḥ
sa aśva sūta dhvaja rathāḥ paraspara śara ācitāḥ

original: 07,024.043a putras te durjayaś caiva jayaś ca vijayaś ca ha
analyzed: putraḥ te durjayaḥ ca eva jayaḥ ca vijayaḥ ca ha

original: 07,024.043c nīlaṃ kāśyaṃ jayaṃ śūrās trayas trīn pratyavārayan
analyzed: nīlam kāśyam jayam śūrāḥ trayaḥ trīn pratyavārayan
tat yuddham abhavat ghoram īkṣitṛ prīti vardhanam
siṃha vyāghra tarakṣūṇām yathā ibha mahiṣa ṛṣabhaiḥ

original: 07,024.044d*0182_01 bṛhaddhanur bṛhac caiva jayamitro jayas tathā
analyzed: bṛhaddhanuḥ bṛhat ca eva jayamitraḥ jayaḥ tathā
dhṛṣṭadyumna sutān vīrān putrāḥ te samavārayan
kṣemadhūrti bṛhantau tau bhrātarau sātvatam yudhi
droṇāya abhimukham yāntam śaraiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ tatakṣatuḥ

original: 07,024.046a tayos tasya ca tad yuddham atyadbhutam ivābhavat
analyzed: tayoḥ tasya ca tat yuddham ati adbhutam iva abhavat
siṃhasya dvipa mukhyābhyām prabhinnābhyām yathā vane
rājānam tu tathā ambaṣṭham ekam yuddha abhinandinam

original: 07,024.047c cedirājaḥ śarān asyan kruddho droṇād avārayat
analyzed: cedi rājaḥ śarān asyan kruddhaḥ droṇāt avārayat
tam ambaṣṭhaḥ sthi bhedinyā niravidhyat śalākayā

original: 07,024.048c sa tyaktvā saśaraṃ cāpaṃ rathād bhūmim athāpatat
analyzed: sa tyaktvā sa śaram cāpam rathāt bhūmim atha apatat

original: 07,024.049a vārdhakṣemiṃ tu vārṣṇeyaṃ kṛpaḥ śāradvataḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: vārdhakṣemim tu vārṣṇeyam kṛpaḥ śāradvataḥ śaraiḥ
akṣudraḥ kṣudrakaiḥ droṇāt kruddha rūpam avārayat
yudhyantau kṛpa vārṣṇeyau ye paśyan citra yodhinau
te yuddha sakta manasaḥ na anyāḥ bubudhire kriyāḥ
saumadattiḥ tu rājānam maṇimantam atandritam
paryavārayat āyāntam yaśaḥ droṇasya vardhayan
sa saumadatteḥ tvaritaḥ chittvā iṣvasana ketane

original: 07,024.052c punaḥ patākāṃ sūtaṃ ca chatraṃ cāpātayad rathāt
analyzed: punar patākām sūtam ca chatram ca apātayat rathāt
atha āplutya rathāt tūrṇam yūpaketuḥ amitra hā
sa aśva sūta dhvaja ratham tam cakarta vara asinā

original: 07,024.054a rathaṃ ca svaṃ samāsthāya dhanur ādāya cāparam
analyzed: ratham ca svam samāsthāya dhanuḥ ādāya ca aparam

original: 07,024.054c svayaṃ yacchan hayān rājan vyadhamat pāṇḍavīṃ camūm
analyzed: svayam yacchan hayān rājan vyadhamat pāṇḍavīm camūm

original: 07,024.054d*0183_01 pāṇḍyam indram ivāyāntam asurān prati jaghnuṣam
analyzed: pāṇḍyam indram iva āyāntam asurān prati jaghnuṣam
samarthaḥ sāyaka oghena dvīpam sindhuḥ iva āvṛṇot
gadā parigha nistriṃśa paṭṭiśa āyodhana upalaiḥ
kaḍaṅgaraiḥ bhuśuṇḍībhiḥ prāsa tomara sāyakaiḥ

original: 07,024.054d*0184_01 tasya sindhupater vāhān vyadhamat pāṇḍyarāṭ svayam
analyzed: tasya sindhupateḥ vāhān vyadhamat pāṇḍya rāj svayam
vīraḥ vīreṇa saṃkruddhaḥ droṇāya abhimukham vrajan
alambuṣaḥ tu saṃkruddhaḥ ghaṭotkacam avārayat
mṛga ṛkṣa yuddhe tiṣṭhantam rathe vīraḥ ratheṣubhiḥ
tām pāṇḍavīm mahā senām deva senā upamām raṇe
avākirat śara ogheṇa asurāḥ iva tāvakaḥ

original: 07,024.054d*0185_01 pārtham indram ivāyāntaṃ droṇaṃ prati nijaghnuṣam
analyzed: pārtham indram iva āyāntam droṇam prati nijaghnuṣam
samārcchat sāyaka oghena svayam rājā nyavārayat
sa nṛpam sa aśva yantāram arāti ghnam arāti hā
amṛdnāt tam pṛṣatkena duryodhanam ariṃdamam

original: 07,024.054d*0185_05 sa jyāṃ mṛdnatpṛṣatkena spṛṣṭvā vṛkṣam ivāśaniḥ
analyzed: sa jyām mṛdnat pṛṣatkena spṛṣṭvā vṛkṣam iva aśaniḥ
vīraḥ vismāpayan yuddhe droṇāya abhimukhaḥ vrajat
alambuṣaḥ tu saṃkruddhaḥ ghaṭotkacam avārayat
vṛka ṛkṣa yukte tiṣṭhantam rathe vīraḥ vara iṣubhiḥ
musalaiḥ mudgaraiḥ cakraiḥ bhindipālaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ
pāṃsu vāta agni salilaiḥ bhasma loṣṭha tṛṇa drumaiḥ

original: 07,024.056a ārujan prarujan bhañjan nighnan vidrāvayan kṣipan
analyzed: ārujan prarujan bhañjan nighnan vidrāvayan kṣipan
senām vibhīṣayan āyāt droṇa prepsuḥ ghaṭotkacaḥ
tam tu nānā praharaṇaiḥ nānā yuddha viśeṣaṇaiḥ

original: 07,024.057c rākṣasaṃ rākṣasaḥ kruddhaḥ samājaghne hy alambusaḥ
analyzed: rākṣasam rākṣasaḥ kruddhaḥ samājaghne hi alambuṣaḥ
tayoḥ tat abhavat yuddham rakṣaḥ grāmaṇi mukhyayoḥ
tādṛś yādṛś purā vṛttam śambara amararājayoḥ
bhāradvājaḥ tu senānyam dhṛṣṭadyumnam mahā ratham

original: 07,024.058d*0186_02 tam eva rājan saṃpaśyann atikramya tathā bahūn
analyzed: tam eva rājan saṃpaśyan atikramya tathā bahūn
mahatā śara jālena kirantam śatru vāhinīm
avārayat mahā rāja sa amātyam sa padānugam
tathā anye pārthivāḥ rājan bahu tvāt na anukīrtitāḥ
samasajjanta te sarve yathāyogam yathābalam

original: 07,024.058d*0186_07 hayair hayāḥ samājagmuḥ kuñjarair eva kuñjarāḥ
analyzed: hayaiḥ hayāḥ samājagmuḥ kuñjaraiḥ eva kuñjarāḥ

original: 07,024.058d*0186_08 padātayaḥ padātaiś ca rathair eva ratharṣabhāḥ
analyzed: padātayaḥ padātaiḥ ca rathaiḥ eva ratha ṛṣabhāḥ
akurvan ārya karmāṇi tatra te puruṣa ṛṣabhāḥ
kula vīrya anurūpāṇi saṃsṛṣṭāḥ ca parasparam
evam dvaṃdva śatāni āsan ratha vāraṇa vājinām

original: 07,024.059c padātīnāṃ ca bhadraṃ te tava teṣāṃ ca saṃkulam
analyzed: padātīnām ca bhadram te tava teṣām ca saṃkulam

original: 07,024.060a naitādṛśo dṛṣṭapūrvaḥ saṃgrāmo naiva ca śrutaḥ
analyzed: na etādṛśaḥ dṛṣṭa pūrvaḥ saṃgrāmaḥ nā eva ca śrutaḥ
droṇasya abhāva bhāveṣu prasaktānām yathā bhavat

original: 07,024.061a idaṃ ghoram idaṃ citram idaṃ raudram iti prabho
analyzed: idam ghoram idam citram idam raudram iti prabho

original: 07,024.061c tatra yuddhāny adṛśyanta pratatāni bahūni ca
analyzed: tatra yuddhāni adṛśyanta pratatāni bahūni ca
dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ uvāca
teṣu evam saṃnivṛtteṣu pratyudyāteṣu bhāgaśas

original: 07,025.001c kathaṃ yuyudhire pārthā māmakāś ca tarasvinaḥ
analyzed: katham yuyudhire pārthāḥ māmakāḥ ca tarasvinaḥ

original: 07,025.002a kim arjunaś cāpy akarot saṃśaptakabalaṃ prati
analyzed: kim arjunaḥ ca api akarot saṃśaptaka balam prati

original: 07,025.002c saṃśaptakā vā pārthasya kim akurvata saṃjaya
analyzed: saṃśaptakāḥ vā pārthasya kim akurvata saṃjaya
saṃjayaḥ uvāca
tathā teṣu nivṛtteṣu pratyudyāteṣu bhāgaśas

original: 07,025.003c svayam abhyadravad bhīmaṃ nāgānīkena te sutaḥ
analyzed: svayam abhyadravat bhīmam nāga anīkena te sutaḥ

original: 07,025.004a sa nāga iva nāgena govṛṣeṇeva govṛṣaḥ
analyzed: sa nāgaḥ iva nāgena go vṛṣeṇa iva go vṛṣaḥ
samāhūtaḥ svayam rājñā nāga anīkam upādravat
sa yuddha kuśalaḥ pārthaḥ bāhu vīryeṇa ca anvitaḥ
abhinat kuñjara anīkam acireṇa eva māriṣa

original: 07,025.005d*0187_01 tatra yuddhāny adṛśyanta pradṛptāni bahūni ca
analyzed: tatra yuddhāni adṛśyanta pradṛptāni bahūni ca

original: 07,025.006a te gajā girisaṃkāśāḥ kṣarantaḥ sarvato madam
analyzed: te gajāḥ giri saṃkāśāḥ kṣarantaḥ sarvatas madam
bhīmasenasya nārācaiḥ vimukhāḥ vimadīkṛtāḥ
vidhamet abhra jālāni yathā vāyuḥ samantataḥ
vyadhamat tāni anīkāni tathā eva pavanātmajaḥ

original: 07,025.008a sa teṣu visṛjan bāṇān bhīmo nāgeṣv aśobhata
analyzed: sa teṣu visṛjan bāṇān bhīmaḥ nāgeṣu aśobhata

original: 07,025.008c bhuvaneṣv iva sarveṣu gabhastīn udito raviḥ
analyzed: bhuvaneṣu iva sarveṣu gabhastīn uditaḥ raviḥ

original: 07,025.009a te bhīmabāṇaiḥ śataśaḥ saṃsyūtā vibabhur gajāḥ
analyzed: te bhīma bāṇaiḥ śataśas saṃsyūtāḥ vibabhuḥ gajāḥ
gabhastibhiḥ iva arkasya vyomni nānā balāhakāḥ
tathā gajānām kadanam kurvāṇam anilātmajam
kruddhaḥ duryodhanaḥ bhyetya pratyavidhyat śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
tatas kṣaṇena kṣitipam kṣataja pratima īkṣaṇaḥ

original: 07,025.011c kṣayaṃ ninīṣur niśitair bhīmo vivyādha patribhiḥ
analyzed: kṣayam ninīṣuḥ niśitaiḥ bhīmaḥ vivyādha patribhiḥ
sa śara arpita sarva aṅgaḥ kruddhaḥ vivyādha pāṇḍavam
nārācaiḥ arka raśmi ābhaiḥ bhīmasenam smayan iva

original: 07,025.013a tasya nāgaṃ maṇimayaṃ ratnacitraṃ dhvaje sthitam
analyzed: tasya nāgam maṇi mayam ratna citram dhvaje sthitam

original: 07,025.013c bhallābhyāṃ kārmukaṃ caiva kṣipraṃ ciccheda pāṇḍavaḥ
analyzed: bhallābhyām kārmukam ca eva kṣipram ciccheda pāṇḍavaḥ
duryodhanam pīḍyamānam dṛṣṭvā bhīmena māriṣa
cukṣobhayiṣuḥ abhyāgāt aṅgaḥ mātaṅgam āsthitaḥ
tam āpatantam mātaṅgam ambuda pratima svanam
kumbha antare bhīmasenaḥ nārācena ārdayat bhṛśam
tasya kāyam vinirbhidya mamajja dharaṇī tale
tatas papāta dviradaḥ vajra āhataḥ iva acalaḥ
tasya āvarjita nāgasya mlecchasya avapatiṣyataḥ
śiraḥ ciccheda bhallena kṣiprakārī vṛkodaraḥ

original: 07,025.018a tasmin nipatite vīre saṃprādravata sā camūḥ
analyzed: tasmin nipatite vīre saṃprādravata sā camūḥ
saṃbhrānta aśva dvipa rathā padātīn avamṛdnatī
teṣu anīkeṣu sarveṣu vidravatsu samantataḥ
prāgjyotiṣaḥ tatas bhīmam kuñjareṇa samādravat
yena nāgena maghavān ajayat daitya dānavān
tad anvayena nāgena bhīmasenam upādravat
sa nāga pravaraḥ bhīmam sahasā samupādravat

original: 07,025.021a śravaṇābhyām atho padbhyāṃ saṃhatena kareṇa ca
analyzed: śravaṇābhyām atho padbhyām saṃhatena kareṇa ca
vyāvṛtta nayanaḥ kruddhaḥ pradahan iva pāṇḍavam
vṛkodara ratham sa aśvam aviśeṣam acūrṇayat

original: 07,025.021d*0189_02 padbhyāṃ bhīmo 'py atho dhāvaṃs tasya gātreṣv alīyata
analyzed: padbhyām bhīmaḥ pi atho dhāvan tasya gātreṣu alīyata
jānan añjalikā vedham na apākrāmata pāṇḍavaḥ
gātra abhyantara gaḥ bhūtvā kareṇa atāḍayat muhur

original: 07,025.021d*0189_05 lālayām āsa taṃ nāgaṃ vadhākāṅkṣiṇam avyayam
analyzed: lālayām āsa tam nāgam vadha ākāṅkṣiṇam avyayam
kulāla cakra vat nāgaḥ tadā tūrṇam atha abhramat
nāga ayuta balaḥ śrīmān kālayānaḥ vṛkodaram
bhīmaḥ pi niṣkramya tatas supratīkā agratas bhavat
bhīmam kareṇa avanamya jānubhyām abhyapātayat

original: 07,025.021d*0189_10 grīvāyāṃ veṣṭayitvainaṃ sa gajo hantum aihata
analyzed: grīvāyām veṣṭayitvā enam sa gajaḥ hantum aihata
kara veṣṭam bhīmasenaḥ bhramam dattvā vyamocayat
punar gātrāṇi nāgasya praviveśa vṛkodaraḥ
yāvat pratigaja āyātam sva balastham avaikṣata
bhīmaḥ pi nāga gātrebhyaḥ viniḥsṛtya apayāt javāt

original: 07,025.022a tataḥ sarvasya sainyasya nādaḥ samabhavan mahān
analyzed: tatas sarvasya sainyasya nādaḥ samabhavat mahān

original: 07,025.022c hā hā vinihato bhīmaḥ kuñjareṇeti māriṣa
analyzed: hā hā vinihataḥ bhīmaḥ kuñjareṇa iti māriṣa
tena nādena vitrastā pāṇḍavānām anīkinī
sahasā abhyadravat rājan yatra tasthau vṛkodaraḥ

original: 07,025.024a tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā hataṃ matvā vṛkodaram
analyzed: tatas yudhiṣṭhiraḥ rājā hatam matvā vṛkodaram
bhagadattam sa pāñcālaḥ sarvatas samavārayat
bhīmaḥ pi dorbhyām nāga indram nipīḍya amocayat balī

original: 07,025.025a taṃ rathai rathināṃ śreṣṭhāḥ parivārya samantataḥ
analyzed: tam rathaiḥ rathinām śreṣṭhāḥ parivārya samantataḥ
avākiram śaraiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ sahasraśas
sa vighātam pṛṣatkānām aṅkuśena samācaran
gajena pāṇḍu pāñcālān vyadhamat parvateśvaraḥ
tat adbhutam apaśyāma bhagadattasya saṃyuge

original: 07,025.027c tathā vṛddhasya caritaṃ kuñjareṇa viśāṃ pate
analyzed: tathā vṛddhasya caritam kuñjareṇa viśām pate
tatas rājā daśārṇānām prāgjyotiṣam upādravat
tiryak yātena nāgena sa madena āśu gāminā
tayoḥ yuddham samabhavat nāgayoḥ bhīma rūpayoḥ
sa pakṣayoḥ parvatayoḥ yathā sa drumayoḥ purā
prāgjyotiṣa pateḥ nāgaḥ saṃnipatya apavṛtya ca
gatvā nāgam abodhayat
pārśve daśārṇa adhipateḥ bhittvā nāgam apātayat
tomaraiḥ sūrya raśmi ābhaiḥ bhagadattaḥ saptabhiḥ
jaghāna dvirada stham tam śatrum pracalita āsanam
tatas yudhiṣṭhiraḥ dṛṣṭvā daśārṇa adhipatim hatam
mahatā ratha vaṃśena prāgjyotiṣam abhidravat
upasṛtya tu rājānam bhagadattam yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
ratha anīkena mahatā sarvatas paryavārayat

original: 07,025.033a sa kuñjarastho rathibhiḥ śuśubhe sarvato vṛtaḥ
analyzed: sa kuñjara sthaḥ rathibhiḥ śuśubhe sarvatas vṛtaḥ
parvate vana madhya sthaḥ jvalan iva hutāśanaḥ
maṇḍalam sarvatas śliṣṭam rathinām ugra dhanvinām
kiratām śara varṣāṇi sa nāgaḥ paryavartata
tatas prāgjyotiṣaḥ rājā parigṛhya dvipa ṛṣabham
preṣayām āsa sahasā yuyudhāna ratham prati
āpatantam tu saṃprekṣya nāgam sātvata puṃgavaḥ
avidhyat pañcabhiḥ bāṇaiḥ śitaiḥ āśīviṣa upamaiḥ
saḥ tividdhaḥ balavatā satyakena viśām pate
vyavartata paritrāsāt maṇḍalāni śara arditaḥ

original: 07,025.036a śineḥ pautrasya tu rathaṃ parigṛhya mahādvipaḥ
analyzed: śineḥ pautrasya tu ratham parigṛhya mahā dvipaḥ
abhicikṣepa vegena yuyudhānaḥ tu apākramat

original: 07,025.037a bṛhataḥ saindhavān aśvān samutthāpya tu sārathiḥ
analyzed: bṛhataḥ saindhavān aśvān samutthāpya tu sārathiḥ

original: 07,025.037c tasthau sātyakim āsādya saṃplutas taṃ rathaṃ punaḥ
analyzed: tasthau sātyakim āsādya saṃplutaḥ tam ratham punar

original: 07,025.038a sa tu labdhvāntaraṃ nāgas tvarito rathamaṇḍalāt
analyzed: sa tu labdhvā antaram nāgaḥ tvaritaḥ ratha maṇḍalāt
niścakrāma tatas sarvān paricikṣepa pārthivān

original: 07,025.039a te tv āśugatinā tena trāsyamānā nararṣabhāḥ
analyzed: te tu āśu gatinā tena trāsyamānāḥ nara ṛṣabhāḥ

original: 07,025.039c tam ekaṃ dviradaṃ saṃkhye menire śataśo nṛpāḥ
analyzed: tam ekam dviradam saṃkhye menire śataśas nṛpāḥ
te gaja sthena kālyante bhagadattena pāṇḍavāḥ
airāvata sthena yathā devarājena dānavāḥ

original: 07,025.041a teṣāṃ pradravatāṃ bhīmaḥ pāñcālānām itas tataḥ
analyzed: teṣām pradravatām bhīmaḥ pāñcālānām itas tatas
gaja vāji kṛtaḥ śabdaḥ su mahān samajāyata
bhagadattena samare kālyamāneṣu pāṇḍuṣu
prāgjyotiṣam abhikruddhaḥ punar bhīmaḥ samabhyayāt
tasya abhidravataḥ vāhān hasta muktena vāriṇā

original: 07,025.043c siktvā vyatrāsayan nāgas te pārtham aharaṃs tataḥ
analyzed: siktvā vyatrāsayat nāgaḥ te pārtham aharan tatas
tatas tam abhyayāt tūrṇam ruciparva ākṛtīsutaḥ
samukṣam śara varṣeṇa ratha sthaḥ ntaka saṃnibhaḥ
tatas ruciraparvāṇam śareṇa nata parvaṇā
suparvā parvata patiḥ ninye vaivasvata kṣayam
tasmin nipatite vīre saubhadraḥ draupadī sutāḥ
cekitānaḥ dhṛṣṭaketuḥ yuyutsuḥ ca ārdayan dvipam

original: 07,025.047a ta enaṃ śaradhārābhir dhārābhir iva toyadāḥ
analyzed: te enam śara dhārābhiḥ dhārābhiḥ iva toyadāḥ
siṣicuḥ bhairavān nādān vinadantaḥ jighāṃsavaḥ
tatas pārṣṇi aṅkuśa aṅguṣṭhaiḥ kṛtinā coditaḥ dvipaḥ
prasārita karaḥ prāyāt stabdha karṇa īkṣaṇaḥ drutam

original: 07,025.049a so 'dhiṣṭhāya padā vāhān yuyutsoḥ sūtam ārujat
analyzed: saḥ dhiṣṭhāya padā vāhān yuyutsoḥ sūtam ārujat

original: 07,025.049b*0195_01 rathaṃ babhañja saṃkruddhaś caṇḍavāto yathā drumam
analyzed: ratham babhañja saṃkruddhaḥ caṇḍa vātaḥ yathā drumam

original: 07,025.049b*0196_01 yuyutsus tu rathād rājann apākrāmat tvarānvitaḥ
analyzed: yuyutsuḥ tu rathāt rājan apākrāmat tvarā anvitaḥ

original: 07,025.049b*0196_02 tataḥ pāṇḍavayodhās te nāgarājaṃ śarair drutam
analyzed: tatas pāṇḍava yodhāḥ te nāga rājam śaraiḥ drutam

original: 07,025.049c putras tu tava saṃbhrāntaḥ saubhadrasyāpluto ratham
analyzed: putraḥ tu tava saṃbhrāntaḥ saubhadrasya āplutaḥ ratham

original: 07,025.050a sa kuñjarastho visṛjann iṣūn ariṣu pārthivaḥ
analyzed: sa kuñjara sthaḥ visṛjan iṣūn ariṣu pārthivaḥ
babhau raśmīn iva ādityaḥ bhuvaneṣu samutsṛjan
sa bhīmena atha bahudhā dantābhyām avapīḍayan
mokṣitaḥ yuddha śauṇḍena nāga ayuta balaḥ gajaḥ

original: 07,025.051a tam ārjunir dvādaśabhir yuyutsur daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: tam ārjuniḥ dvādaśabhiḥ yuyutsuḥ daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 07,025.051c tribhis tribhir draupadeyā dhṛṣṭaketuś ca vivyadhuḥ
analyzed: tribhiḥ tribhiḥ draupadeyāḥ dhṛṣṭaketuḥ ca vivyadhuḥ
cekitānaḥ catuḥṣaṣṭyā sa uttara āyudhikam punar

original: 07,025.051d*0198_02 pratyavidhyac charaiḥ sarvān bhagadattas tribhis tribhiḥ
analyzed: pratyavidhyat śaraiḥ sarvān bhagadattaḥ tribhiḥ tribhiḥ
saḥ riyatna arpitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ ācitaḥ dviradaḥ babhau

original: 07,025.052c saṃsyūta iva sūryasya raśmibhir jalado mahān
analyzed: saṃsyūtaḥ iva sūryasya raśmibhiḥ jaladaḥ mahān
niyantuḥ śilpa yatnābhyām preṣitaḥ ri śara arditaḥ

original: 07,025.053c paricikṣepa tān nāgaḥ sa ripūn savyadakṣiṇam
analyzed: paricikṣepa tān nāgaḥ sa ripūn savya dakṣiṇam

original: 07,025.054a gopāla iva daṇḍena yathā paśugaṇān vane
analyzed: gopālaḥ iva daṇḍena yathā paśu gaṇān vane

original: 07,025.054c āveṣṭayata tāṃ senāṃ bhagadattas tathā muhuḥ
analyzed: āveṣṭayata tām senām bhagadattaḥ tathā muhur
kṣipram śyena abhipannānām vāyasānām iva svanaḥ

original: 07,025.055b*0199_01 rajaś ca sumahad rājann antarikṣaṃ samācinot
analyzed: rajaḥ ca su mahat rājan antarikṣam samācinot

original: 07,025.055b*0200_01 sa reṇumārgo viyati bhāti daṇḍa ivotthitaḥ
analyzed: sa reṇu mārgaḥ viyati bhāti daṇḍaḥ iva utthitaḥ
samucchritaḥ bhṛśa ārtāyā senāyā su bhujaḥ yathā
abhidhāva iti kaunteyam saṃcodayat iva arjunam
babhūva pāṇḍaveyānām bhṛśam vidravatām svanaḥ
sa nāga rājaḥ pravara aṅkuśa āhataḥ
purā sapakṣaḥ drivaraḥ yathā nṛpa
bhayam tathā ripuṣu samādadhat bhṛśam
vaṇij gaṇānām kṣubhitaḥ yathā arṇavaḥ
tatas dhvaniḥ dvirada ratha aśva pārthivaiḥ
bhayāt dravadbhiḥ tibhairavaḥ

original: 07,025.057c kṣitiṃ viyad dyāṃ vidiśo diśas tathā;
analyzed: kṣitim viyat dyām vidiśaḥ diśaḥ tathā
samāvṛṇot pārthiva saṃyuge tadā
samantataḥ tatra janādhipa īśvara
sa tena nāga pravareṇa pārthivaḥ
bhṛśam jagāhe dviṣatām anīkinīm
purā su guptām vibudhaiḥ iva āhave
virocanaḥ deva varūthinīm iva
bhṛśam vavau jvalana sakhaḥ viyat rajaḥ
samāvṛṇot muhur api ca eva sainikān
tam eka nāgam gaṇaśas yathā gajāḥ
samantataḥ drutam iva menire janāḥ
saṃjayaḥ uvāca

original: 07,026.001a yan māṃ pārthasya saṃgrāme karmāṇi paripṛcchasi
analyzed: yat mām pārthasya saṃgrāme karmāṇi paripṛcchasi

original: 07,026.001c tac chṛṇuṣva mahārāja pārtho yad akaron mṛdhe
analyzed: tat śṛṇuṣva mahā rāja pārthaḥ yat akarot mṛdhe

original: 07,026.002a rajo dṛṣṭvā samudbhūtaṃ śrutvā ca gajanisvanam
analyzed: rajaḥ dṛṣṭvā samudbhūtam śrutvā ca gaja nisvanam
bhajyatām bhagadattena kaunteyaḥ kṛṣṇam abravīt
yathā prāgjyotiṣaḥ rājā gajena madhusūdana
tvaramāṇaḥ bhyatikrāntaḥ dhruvam tasya eṣa nisvanaḥ
indrāt an avaraḥ saṃkhye gaja yāna viśāradaḥ

original: 07,026.004c prathamo vā dvitīyo vā pṛthivyām iti me matiḥ
analyzed: prathamaḥ vā dvitīyaḥ vā pṛthivyām iti me matiḥ
sa ca api dvirada śreṣṭhaḥ sadā pratigajaḥ yudhi
sarva śabda atigaḥ saṃkhye kṛta karmā jita klamaḥ
sahaḥ śastra nipātānām agni sparśasya ca anagha
sa pāṇḍava balam vyaktam adya ekaḥ nāśayiṣyati
siṃhanādam mahat kṛtvā dhanuḥ bāṇa ravaiḥ saha
vidrāvyamāṇam saṃpaśya hata bhūyiṣṭha nāyakam

original: 07,026.006d*0203_03 dṛṣṭvā vinadya sahasā mama senāṃ pramṛdnati
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā vinadya sahasā mama senām pramṛdnati

original: 07,026.007a na cāvābhyām ṛte 'nyo 'sti śaktas taṃ pratibādhitum
analyzed: na ca āvābhyām ṛte sti śaktaḥ tam pratibādhitum
tvaramāṇaḥ tatas yāhi yatas prāgjyotiṣa adhipaḥ
śakra sakhyāt dvipa balaiḥ vayasā ca api vismitam
adya enam preṣayiṣyāmi balahantuḥ priya atithim

original: 07,026.009a vacanād atha kṛṣṇas tu prayayau savyasācinaḥ
analyzed: vacanāt atha kṛṣṇaḥ tu prayayau savyasācinaḥ
dāryate bhagadattena yatra pāṇḍava vāhinī

original: 07,026.010a taṃ prayāntaṃ tataḥ paścād āhvayanto mahārathāḥ
analyzed: tam prayāntam tatas paścāt āhvayantaḥ mahā rathāḥ
saṃśaptakāḥ samārohan sahasrāṇi caturdaśa
daśa eva tu sahasrāṇi trigartānām narādhipa
catvāri tu sahasrāṇi vāsudevasya ye nugāḥ
dāryamāṇām camūm dṛṣṭvā bhagadattena māriṣa

original: 07,026.012c āhūyamānasya ca tair abhavad dhṛdayaṃ dvidhā
analyzed: āhūyamānasya ca taiḥ abhavat hṛdayam dvidhā

original: 07,026.013a kiṃ nu śreyaskaraṃ karma bhaved iti vicintayan
analyzed: kim nu śreyaskaram karma bhavet iti vicintayan

original: 07,026.013c ito vā vinivarteyaṃ gaccheyaṃ vā yudhiṣṭhiram
analyzed: itas vā vinivarteyam gaccheyam vā yudhiṣṭhiram
tasya buddhyā vicārya etat arjunasya kuru udvaha
abhavat bhūyasī buddhiḥ saṃśaptaka vadhe sthirā
sa saṃnivṛttaḥ sahasā kapi pravara ketanaḥ
ekaḥ ratha sahasrāṇi nihantum vāsavī raṇe

original: 07,026.016a sā hi duryodhanasyāsīn matiḥ karṇasya cobhayoḥ
analyzed: sā hi duryodhanasya āsīt matiḥ karṇasya ca ubhayoḥ
arjunasya vadha upāye tena dvaidham akalpayat

original: 07,026.017a sa tu saṃvartayām āsa dvaidhībhāvena pāṇḍavaḥ
analyzed: sa tu saṃvartayām āsa dvaidhībhāvena pāṇḍavaḥ

original: 07,026.017c rathena tu rathāgryāṇām akarot tāṃ mṛṣā tadā
analyzed: rathena tu ratha agryāṇām akarot tām mṛṣā tadā
tatas śata sahasrāṇi śarāṇām nata parvaṇām
vyasṛjan arjune rājan saṃśaptaka mahā rathāḥ

original: 07,026.019a naiva kuntīsutaḥ pārtho naiva kṛṣṇo janārdanaḥ
analyzed: na eva kuntī sutaḥ pārthaḥ na eva kṛṣṇaḥ janārdanaḥ

original: 07,026.019c na hayā na ratho rājan dṛśyante sma śaraiś citāḥ
analyzed: na hayāḥ na rathaḥ rājan dṛśyante sma śaraiḥ citāḥ
tatas na eva arjuna upendrau na rathaḥ sa aśva ketanaḥ
dṛśyante śara varṣeṇa prabalena samāvṛtāḥ
tatas tena śara ogheṇa mahatā samavāstṛtaḥ
na aśakat nāma bībhatsuḥ amitrān pratibādhitum

original: 07,026.020a yadā moham anuprāptaḥ sasvedaś ca janārdanaḥ
analyzed: yadā moham anuprāptaḥ sa svedaḥ ca janārdanaḥ

original: 07,026.020b*0206_01 tato janārdanaḥ pārthaṃ pratyuvāca hasann iva
analyzed: tatas janārdanaḥ pārtham pratyuvāca hasan iva

original: 07,026.020b*0206_02 vajram astraṃ tu saṃdhāya jahi saṃśaptakān iha
analyzed: vajram astram tu saṃdhāya jahi saṃśaptakān iha

original: 07,026.020c tatas tān prāyaśaḥ pārtho vajrāstreṇa nijaghnivān
analyzed: tatas tān prāyaśas pārthaḥ vajra astreṇa nijaghnivān
śataśas pāṇayaḥ chinnāḥ sa iṣu jyā tala kārmukāḥ

original: 07,026.021c ketavo vājinaḥ sūtā rathinaś cāpatan kṣitau
analyzed: ketavaḥ vājinaḥ sūtāḥ rathinaḥ ca apatan kṣitau
druma acala agra ambudharaiḥ sama rūpāḥ su kalpitāḥ
hata ārohāḥ kṣitau petuḥ dvipāḥ pārtha śara āhatāḥ
vipraviddha kutha valgāḥ chinna bhāṇḍāḥ parāsavaḥ
sa ārohāḥ turagāḥ petuḥ mathitāḥ pārtha mārgaṇaiḥ
sa ṛṣṭi carma asi nakharāḥ sa mudgara paraśvadhāḥ

original: 07,026.024c saṃchinnā bāhavaḥ petur nṛṇāṃ bhallaiḥ kirīṭinā
analyzed: saṃchinnāḥ bāhavaḥ petuḥ nṛṇām bhallaiḥ kirīṭinā
bāla āditya ambuja indūnām tulya rūpāṇi māriṣa
saṃchinnāni arjuna śaraiḥ śirāṃsi urvīm prapedire
jajvāla alaṃkṛtaiḥ senā patribhiḥ prāṇa bhojanaiḥ
nānā liṅgaiḥ tadā amitrān kruddhe nighnati phalgune

original: 07,026.027a kṣobhayantaṃ tadā senāṃ dviradaṃ nalinīm iva
analyzed: kṣobhayantam tadā senām dviradam nalinīm iva

original: 07,026.027c dhanaṃjayaṃ bhūtagaṇāḥ sādhu sādhv ity apūjayan
analyzed: dhanaṃjayam bhūta gaṇāḥ sādhu sādhu iti apūjayan

original: 07,026.028a dṛṣṭvā tat karma pārthasya vāsavasyeva mādhavaḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tat karma pārthasya vāsavasya iva mādhavaḥ

original: 07,026.028c vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatvā talam āhatya pūjayat
analyzed: vismayam paramam gatvā talam āhatya pūjayat

original: 07,026.028d*0207_01 karmaitat pārtha śakreṇa yamena dhanadena ca
analyzed: karma etat pārtha śakreṇa yamena dhanadena ca

original: 07,026.028d*0207_02 duṣkaraṃ samare yat te kṛtam adyeti me matiḥ
analyzed: duṣkaram samare yat te kṛtam adyā iti me matiḥ
yugapad ca eva saṃgrāme sahasraśas
patitāḥ eva me dṛṣṭāḥ saṃśaptaka mahā rathāḥ

original: 07,026.029a tataḥ saṃśaptakān hatvā bhūyiṣṭhaṃ ye vyavasthitāḥ
analyzed: tatas saṃśaptakān hatvā bhūyiṣṭham ye vyavasthitāḥ
bhagadattāya yāhi iti pārthaḥ kṛṣṇam acodayat
saṃjayaḥ uvāca
yiyāsataḥ tatas kṛṣṇaḥ pārthasya aśvān manojavān
apraiṣīt hema saṃchannān droṇa anīkāya pāṇḍurān

original: 07,027.002a taṃ prayāntaṃ kuruśreṣṭhaṃ svāṃs trātuṃ droṇatāpitān
analyzed: tam prayāntam kuru śreṣṭham svān trātum droṇa tāpitān
suśarmā bhrātṛbhiḥ sārdham yuddha arthī pṛṣṭhatas nvayāt

original: 07,027.003a tataḥ śvetahayaḥ kṛṣṇam abravīd ajitaṃ jayaḥ
analyzed: tatas śvetahayaḥ kṛṣṇam abravīt ajitam jayaḥ
eṣa mām bhrātṛbhiḥ sārdham suśarmā āhvayate cyuta
dīryate ca uttareṇa etat sainyam naḥ śatru sūdana

original: 07,027.004c dvaidhībhūtaṃ mano me 'dya kṛtaṃ saṃśaptakair idam
analyzed: dvaidhībhūtam manaḥ me dya kṛtam saṃśaptakaiḥ idam

original: 07,027.005a kiṃ nu saṃśaptakān hanmi svān rakṣāmy ahitārditān
analyzed: kim nu saṃśaptakān hanmi svān rakṣāmi ahita arditān

original: 07,027.005c iti me tvaṃ mataṃ vettha tatra kiṃ sukṛtaṃ bhavet
analyzed: iti me tvam matam vettha tatra kim su kṛtam bhavet

original: 07,027.006a evam uktas tu dāśārhaḥ syandanaṃ pratyavartayat
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu dāśārhaḥ syandanam pratyavartayat
yena trigarta adhipatiḥ pāṇḍavam samupāhvayat
tatas rjunaḥ suśarmāṇam viddhvā saptabhiḥ āśugaiḥ

original: 07,027.007c dhvajaṃ dhanuś cāsya tathā kṣurābhyāṃ samakṛntata
analyzed: dhvajam dhanuḥ ca asya tathā kṣurābhyām samakṛntata
trigarta adhipateḥ ca api bhrātaram ṣaḍbhiḥ āyasaiḥ

original: 07,027.008c sāśvaṃ sasūtaṃ tvaritaḥ pārthaḥ praiṣīd yamakṣayam
analyzed: sa aśvam sa sūtam tvaritaḥ pārthaḥ praiṣīt yama kṣayam
tatas bhujaga saṃkāśām suśarmā śaktim āyasīm
cikṣepa arjunam ādiśya vāsudevāya tomaram

original: 07,027.010a śaktiṃ tribhiḥ śaraiś chittvā tomaraṃ tribhir arjunaḥ
analyzed: śaktim tribhiḥ śaraiḥ chittvā tomaram tribhiḥ arjunaḥ
suśarmāṇam śara vrātaiḥ mohayitvā nyavartata
tam vāsavam iva āyāntam bhūri varṣa śara oghiṇam

original: 07,027.011c rājaṃs tāvakasainyānāṃ nograṃ kaś cid avārayat
analyzed: rājan tāvaka sainyānām na ugram kaḥ cit avārayat

original: 07,027.012a tato dhanaṃjayo bāṇais tata eva mahārathān
analyzed: tatas dhanaṃjayaḥ bāṇaiḥ tatas eva mahā rathān

original: 07,027.012c āyād vinighnan kauravyān dahan kakṣam ivānalaḥ
analyzed: āyāt vinighnan kauravyān dahan kakṣam iva analaḥ

original: 07,027.013a tasya vegam asahyaṃ tu kuntīputrasya dhīmataḥ
analyzed: tasya vegam asahyam tu kuntī putrasya dhīmataḥ

original: 07,027.013c nāśaknuvaṃs te saṃsoḍhuṃ sparśam agner iva prajāḥ
analyzed: na aśaknuvan te saṃsoḍhum sparśam agneḥ iva prajāḥ
saṃveṣṭayan anīkāni śara varṣeṇa pāṇḍavaḥ
suparṇa pāta vat rājan āyāt prāgjyotiṣam prati
yat tadā anāmayat jiṣṇuḥ bharatānām apāyinām
dhanuḥ kṣema karam saṃkhye dviṣatām aśru vardhanam

original: 07,027.016a tad eva tava putrasya rājan durdyūtadevinaḥ
analyzed: tat eva tava putrasya rājan durdyūta devinaḥ

original: 07,027.017a tathā vikṣobhyamāṇā sā pārthena tava vāhinī
analyzed: tathā vikṣobhyamāṇā sā pārthena tava vāhinī

original: 07,027.018c matiṃ kṛtvā raṇe kruddhā vīrā jayaparājaye
analyzed: matim kṛtvā raṇe kruddhāḥ vīrāḥ jaya parājaye

original: 07,027.019c ārchat pārtho guruṃ bhāraṃ sarvabhārasaho yudhi
analyzed: ārchat pārthaḥ gurum bhāram sarva bhāra sahaḥ yudhi

original: 07,027.020c mṛdnīyāt tadvad āyastaḥ pārtho 'mṛdnāc camūṃ tava
analyzed: mṛdnīyāt tadvat āyastaḥ pārthaḥ mṛdnāt camūm tava

tena nāgena sahasā dhanaṃjayam upādravat
tam rathena nara vyāghraḥ pratyagṛhṇāt a bhīta vat

original: 07,027.023a kalpitābhyāṃ yathāśāstraṃ rathena ca gajena ca
analyzed: kalpitābhyām yathāśāstram rathena ca gajena ca

abhyavarṣat śara ogheṇa bhagadattaḥ dhanaṃjayam

original: 07,027.025a sa cāpi śaravarṣaṃ tac charavarṣeṇa vāsaviḥ
analyzed: sa ca api śara varṣam tat śara varṣeṇa vāsaviḥ

original: 07,027.025d*0209_01 vavarṣa śaravarṣaṃ tu punar eva dhanaṃjayaḥ
analyzed: vavarṣa śara varṣam tu punar eva dhanaṃjayaḥ

original: 07,027.026a tataḥ prāgjyotiṣo rājā śaravarṣaṃ nivārya tat

original: 07,027.026c śarair jaghne mahābāhuṃ pārthaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ ca bhārata
analyzed: śaraiḥ jaghne mahā bāhum pārtham kṛṣṇam ca bhārata

original: 07,027.028a tam āpatantaṃ dviradaṃ dṛṣṭvā kruddham ivāntakam
analyzed: tam āpatantam dviradam dṛṣṭvā kruddham iva antakam

original: 07,027.029c sārohaṃ mṛtyusāt kartuṃ smaran dharmaṃ dhanaṃjayaḥ
analyzed: sa āroham mṛtyusāt kartum smaran dharmam dhanaṃjayaḥ

original: 07,027.030a sa tu nāgo dviparathān hayāṃś cārujya māriṣa
analyzed: sa tu nāgaḥ dvipa rathān hayān ca ārujya māriṣa
prāhiṇot mṛtyu lokāya tatas krudhyat dhanaṃjayaḥ
dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ uvāca

original: 07,028.001a tathā kruddhaḥ kim akarod bhagadattasya pāṇḍavaḥ
analyzed: tathā kruddhaḥ kim akarot bhagadattasya pāṇḍavaḥ

original: 07,028.001c prāgjyotiṣo vā pārthasya tan me śaṃsa yathātatham
analyzed: prāgjyotiṣaḥ vā pārthasya tat me śaṃsa yathātatham
saṃjayaḥ uvāca
prāgjyotiṣeṇa saṃsaktau ubhau dāśārha pāṇḍavau
mṛtyoḥ iva antikam prāptau sarva bhūtāni menire

original: 07,028.003a tathā hi śaravarṣāṇi pātayaty aniśaṃ prabho
analyzed: tathā hi śara varṣāṇi pātayati aniśam prabho
bhagadattaḥ gaja skandhāt kṛṣṇayoḥ syandana sthayoḥ
atha kārṣṇāyasaiḥ bāṇaiḥ pūrṇa kārmuka niḥsṛtaiḥ
avidhyat devakīputram hema puṅkhaiḥ śilā śitaiḥ
agni sparśa samāḥ tīkṣṇāḥ bhagadattena coditāḥ

original: 07,028.005c nirbhidya devakīputraṃ kṣitiṃ jagmuḥ śarās tataḥ
analyzed: nirbhidya devakīputram kṣitim jagmuḥ śarāḥ tatas

original: 07,028.006a tasya pārtho dhanuś chittvā śarāvāpaṃ nihatya ca
analyzed: tasya pārthaḥ dhanuḥ chittvā śarāvāpam nihatya ca
lāḍayan iva rājānam bhagadattam ayodhayat
saḥ rka raśmi nibhān tīkṣṇān tomarān vai caturdaśa
prerayat savyasācī tān tridhā ekaikam atha ācchinat

original: 07,028.008a tato nāgasya tad varma vyadhamat pākaśāsaniḥ
analyzed: tatas nāgasya tat varma vyadhamat pākaśāsanaḥ

original: 07,028.008c śarajālena sa babhau vyabhraḥ parvatarāḍ iva
analyzed: śara jālena sa babhau vyabhraḥ parvatarāj iva
tat vyaśīryata bhū tale

original: 07,028.008c*0210_02 viśīrṇavarmā sa gajaḥ śaraiḥ subhṛśam arditaḥ
analyzed: viśīrṇa varmā sa gajaḥ śaraiḥ su bhṛśam arditaḥ
babhau śirasi mātaṃgo
tatas prāgjyotiṣaḥ śaktim hema daṇḍām ayasmayīm
vyasṛjat vāsudevāya dvidhā tām arjuna u chinat

original: 07,028.010a tataś chatraṃ dhvajaṃ caiva chittvā rājño 'rjunaḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: tatas chatram dhvajam ca eva chittvā rājñaḥ rjunaḥ śaraiḥ
vivyādha daśabhiḥ tūrṇam utsmayan parvata adhipam
saḥ tividdhaḥ rjuna śaraiḥ su puṅkhaiḥ kaṅka patribhiḥ
bhagadattaḥ tatas kruddhaḥ pāṇḍavasya mahātmanaḥ
vyasṛjat tomarān mūrdhni śvetāśvasya unnanāda ca
taiḥ arjunasya samare kirīṭam parivartitam

original: 07,028.013a parivṛttaṃ kirīṭaṃ taṃ yamayann eva phalgunaḥ

original: 07,028.013c sudṛṣṭaḥ kriyatāṃ loka iti rājānam abravīt
analyzed: su dṛṣṭaḥ kriyatām loke iti rājānam abravīt

original: 07,028.014a evam uktas tu saṃkruddhaḥ śaravarṣeṇa pāṇḍavam
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu saṃkruddhaḥ śara varṣeṇa pāṇḍavam

original: 07,028.014d*0211_02 jagmatur naiva saṃmohaṃ cukṣubhāte na cācyutau

original: 07,028.015a tasya pārtho dhanuś chittvā tūṇīrān saṃnikṛtya ca
analyzed: tasya pārthaḥ dhanuḥ chittvā tūṇīrān saṃnikṛtya ca
tvaramāṇaḥ dvisaptatyā sarva marmasu atāḍayat
viddhaḥ tathā api a vyathitaḥ vaiṣṇava astram udīrayan

analyzed: tat astram udyatam dṛṣṭvā vāsudevaḥ pratāpavān

original: 07,028.018a vaijayanty abhavan mālā tad astraṃ keśavorasi
analyzed: vaijayantī abhavat mālā tat astram keśava urasi

tayā padma abhiśobhinyā vāyu kampita lolayā
śobhate bhyadhikam śauriḥ atasī puṣpa saṃnibhaḥ
sandhyā abhraiḥ iva saṃchannaḥ prāvṛṣ kāle naga uttamaḥ
tatas rjunaḥ klānta manāḥ keśavam pratyabhāṣata
ayudhyamānaḥ turagān saṃyantā asmi janārdana

original: 07,028.019c ity uktvā puṇḍarīkākṣa pratijñāṃ svāṃ na rakṣasi
analyzed: iti uktvā puṇḍarīkākṣa pratijñām svām na rakṣasi

original: 07,028.019d*0214_01 idam astram avasthāpya prāptaṃ māṃ devakīsuta
analyzed: idam astram avasthāpya prāptam mām devakī suta

original: 07,028.020a yady ahaṃ vyasanī vā syām aśakto vā nivāraṇe

original: 07,028.020c tatas tvayaivaṃ kāryaṃ syān na tu kāryaṃ mayi sthite
analyzed: tatas tvayā evam kāryam syāt na tu kāryam mayi sthite

original: 07,028.022d*0215_04 sā vavre viṣṇusadṛśaṃ putram astraṃ ca vaiṣṇavam

original: 07,028.022d*0215_05 babhūva ca sutas tasyāṃ narako nāma viśrutaḥ

analyzed: astram ca vaiṣṇavam tasmai dadau nārāyaṇaḥ svayam

original: 07,028.022d*0216_03 nāsyāvadhyo 'sti loke 'smin mad anyaḥ kaś cid arjuna

analyzed: ekā mūrtiḥ tapaḥ caryām kurute me bhuvi sthitā

original: 07,028.027a taṃ tu kālam anuprāptaṃ viditvā pṛthivī tadā

original: 07,028.027c prāyācata varaṃ yaṃ māṃ narakārthāya taṃ śṛṇu

original: 07,028.028a devānām asurāṇāṃ ca avadhyas tanayo 'stu me

original: 07,028.028c upeto vaiṣṇavāstreṇa tan me tvaṃ dātum arhasi

original: 07,028.029a evaṃ varam ahaṃ śrutvā jagatyās tanaye tadā

original: 07,028.029c amogham astram adadaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ tad ahaṃ purā
analyzed: amogham astram adadam vaiṣṇavam tat aham purā

analyzed: avocam ca etat astram vai hi amogham bhavatu kṣame
narakasya abhirakṣā artham na enam kaḥ cit vadhiṣyati
anena astreṇa te guptaḥ sutaḥ para bala ardanaḥ

original: 07,028.032a tathety uktvā gatā devī kṛtakāmā manasvinī

original: 07,028.032c sa cāpy āsīd durādharṣo narakaḥ śatrutāpanaḥ

original: 07,028.033a tasmāt prāgjyotiṣaṃ prāptaṃ tad astraṃ pārtha māmakam
analyzed: tasmāt prāgjyotiṣam prāptam tat astram pārtha māmakam

original: 07,028.033b*0218_02 sarvān samāgatān hanyāt kiṃ punas tvāṃ dhanaṃjaya
analyzed: sarvān samāgatān hanyāt kim punar tvām dhanaṃjaya

original: 07,028.033b*0218_03 bhogināṃ caiva durdharṣaṃ mayā dattaṃ surāsuraiḥ

original: 07,028.033b*0218_04 jahi prāgjyotiṣaṃ pārtha purā sarvān hinasti saḥ
analyzed: jahi prāgjyotiṣam pārtha purā sarvān hinasti saḥ

viyuktam parama astreṇa jahi pārtha mahā asuram

original: 07,028.035c yathāhaṃ jaghnivān pūrvaṃ hitārthaṃ narakaṃ tathā
analyzed: yathā aham jaghnivān pūrvam hita artham narakam tathā

original: 07,028.036a evam uktas tataḥ pārthaḥ keśavena mahātmanā
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tatas pārthaḥ keśavena mahātmanā
bhagadattam śitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ sahasā samavākirat

kāñcana śṛṅkhalā naddhām savyām ciccheda pāṇḍavaḥ
sā hatā śara ghātena vajra niṣpeṣa saṃnibhā

original: 07,028.036d*0220_05 dakṣiṇāpi hatā rājan ghaṇṭā bāṇaiḥ kirīṭinaḥ
analyzed: dakṣiṇā api hatā rājan ghaṇṭā bāṇaiḥ kirīṭinaḥ

original: 07,028.036d*0220_06 papāta dūram adhvānaṃ gatvā sūrya iva kṣitau
analyzed: papāta dūram adhvānam gatvā sūryaḥ iva kṣitau
bhagadattena nirmuktaḥ supratīkaḥ pi vegataḥ
hanumān sūrya bimbasya grasana artham iva udyataḥ
tatas pārthaḥ mahā bāhuḥ asaṃbhrāntaḥ mahā manāḥ
kumbhayoḥ antare nāgam nārācena samārpayat

original: 07,028.037d*0221_02 avidhyad arjuno nāgaṃ kumbhayor antare bhṛśam

original: 07,028.038a samāsādya tu taṃ nāgaṃ bāṇo vajra ivācalam
analyzed: samāsādya tu tam nāgam bāṇaḥ vajraḥ iva acalam

original: 07,028.038c abhyagāt saha puṅkhena valmīkam iva pannagaḥ
analyzed: abhyagāt saha puṅkhena valmīkam iva pannagaḥ

original: 07,028.038d*0222_01 sa karī bhagadattena preryamāṇaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: sa karī bhagadattena preryamāṇaḥ punar punar

original: 07,028.038d*0222_02 na karoti vacas tasya daridrasyeva kāminī
analyzed: na karoti vacaḥ tasya daridrasya iva kāminī

original: 07,028.038d*0223_01 madhye vidīrṇas tasthau sa prāsyandata punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: madhye vidīrṇaḥ tasthau sa prāsyandata punar punar

original: 07,028.039a sa tu viṣṭabhya gātrāṇi dantābhyām avaniṃ yayau

nadan ārta svaram prāṇān utsasarja mahā dvipaḥ
tatas gāṇḍīvadhanvānam abhyabhāṣata keśavaḥ
ayam mahattaraḥ pārtha palitena samāvṛtaḥ
valī saṃchanna nayanaḥ śūraḥ parama durjayaḥ
akṣṇoḥ unmīlana arthāya baddha paṭṭaḥ sadā nṛpaḥ
deva vākyāt praciccheda śareṇa bhṛśam arjunaḥ
chinna mātrem śuke tasmin ruddha netraḥ babhūva saḥ
tamaḥ mayam jagat mene bhagadattaḥ pratāpavān
tatas candra ardha bimbena śareṇa nata parvaṇā

original: 07,028.040b*0227_01 bibheda sakalo deho dvidhābhūto babhūva ha
analyzed: bibheda sakalaḥ dehaḥ dvidhā bhūtaḥ babhūva ha

original: 07,028.040b*0227_02 rājñā balavatā tena jānubhyāṃ dhārito raṇe
analyzed: rājñā balavatā tena jānubhyām dhāritaḥ raṇe

original: 07,028.040b*0227_03 arjunaṃ prati yuddhe na cirakālaṃ dadhāra saḥ
analyzed: arjunam prati yuddhe na cira kālam dadhāra saḥ

original: 07,028.040b*0227_04 evaṃ yuddhaṃ tadā tena rājñā tena durātmanā
analyzed: evam yuddham tadā tena rājñā tena durātmanā

original: 07,028.041c śarāsanaṃ śarāṃś caiva gatāsuḥ pramumoca ha
analyzed: śarāsanam śarān ca eva gatāsuḥ pramumoca ha

original: 07,028.042a śirasas tasya vibhraṣṭaḥ papāta ca varāṅkuśaḥ
analyzed: śirasaḥ tasya vibhraṣṭaḥ papāta ca vara aṅkuśaḥ
nāla tāḍana vibhraṣṭam palāśam nalināt iva
sa hema mālī tapanīya bhāṇḍāt
papāta nāgāt giri saṃnikāśāt
su puṣpitaḥ māruta vega rugṇaḥ

original: 07,044.019c adṛśyam ārjuniṃ cakrur nimeṣāt te nṛpātmajāḥ
analyzed: adṛśyam ārjunim cakruḥ nimeṣāt te nṛpa ātmajāḥ

original: 07,044.020a sasūtāśvadhvajaṃ tasya syandanaṃ taṃ ca māriṣa
analyzed: sa sūta aśva dhvajam tasya syandanam tam ca māriṣa
ācitam samapaśyāma śvāvidham śalalaiḥ iva

original: 07,044.021a sa gāḍhaviddhaḥ kruddhaś ca tottrair gaja ivārditaḥ
analyzed: sa gāḍha viddhaḥ kruddhaḥ ca tottraiḥ gajaḥ iva arditaḥ

original: 07,044.021c gāndharvam astram āyacchad rathamāyāṃ ca yojayat
analyzed: gāndharvam astram āyacchat ratha māyām ca yojayat

original: 07,044.022a arjunena tapas taptvā gandharvebhyo yad āhṛtam
analyzed: arjunena tapaḥ taptvā gandharvebhyaḥ yat āhṛtam
tumburu pramukhebhyaḥ vai tena amohayata āhitān

original: 07,044.023a ekaḥ sa śatadhā rājan dṛśyate sma sahasradhā
analyzed: ekaḥ sa śatadhā rājan dṛśyate sma sahasradhā
alāta cakra vat saṃkhye kṣipram astrāṇi darśayan
ratha caryā astra māyābhiḥ mohayitvā paraṃtapaḥ
bibheda śatadhā rājam śarīrāṇi mahīkṣitām
bhinna anīkāḥ ca diś mūḍhāḥ bhūyas saṃtrasta cetasaḥ
bhallaiḥ utkṛtta śirasaḥ para lokam atha āviśan

original: 07,044.025a prāṇāḥ prāṇabhṛtāṃ saṃkhye preṣitā niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: prāṇāḥ prāṇabhṛtām saṃkhye preṣitāḥ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 07,044.025c rājan prāpur amuṃ lokaṃ śarīrāṇy avaniṃ yayuḥ
analyzed: rājan prāpuḥ amum lokam śarīrāṇi avanim yayuḥ

original: 07,044.026a dhanūṃṣy aśvān niyantṝṃś ca dhvajān bāhūṃś ca sāṅgadān
analyzed: dhanūṃṣi aśvān niyantṝn ca dhvajān bāhūn ca sa aṅgadān

original: 07,044.026c śirāṃsi ca śitair bhallais teṣāṃ ciccheda phālguniḥ
analyzed: śirāṃsi ca śitaiḥ bhallaiḥ teṣām ciccheda phālguniḥ
cūta ārāmaḥ yathā bhagnaḥ pañca varṣa phala upagaḥ
rāja putra śatam tadvat saubhadreṇa apatat hatam
kruddha āśīviṣa saṃkāśān su kumārān sukha ucitān
ekena nihatān dṛṣṭvā bhītaḥ duryodhanaḥ bhavat
rathinaḥ kuñjarān aśvān padātīn ca avamarditān

original: 07,044.029c dṛṣṭvā duryodhanaḥ kṣipram upāyāt tam amarṣitaḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā duryodhanaḥ kṣipram upāyāt tam amarṣitaḥ
tayoḥ kṣaṇam iva āpūrṇaḥ saṃgrāmaḥ samapadyata
atha abhavat te vimukhaḥ putraḥ śara śata arditaḥ
dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ uvāca

original: 07,045.001a yathā vadasi me sūta ekasya bahubhiḥ saha
analyzed: yathā vadasi me sūta ekasya bahubhiḥ saha

original: 07,045.001c saṃgrāmaṃ tumulaṃ ghoraṃ jayaṃ caiva mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: saṃgrāmam tumulam ghoram jayam ca eva mahātmanaḥ
aśraddheyam iva āścaryam saubhadrasya atha vikramam

original: 07,045.002c kiṃ tu nātyadbhutaṃ teṣāṃ yeṣāṃ dharmo vyapāśrayaḥ
analyzed: kim tu na ati adbhutam teṣām yeṣām dharmaḥ vyapāśrayaḥ
duryodhane tha vimukhe rāja putra śate hate
saubhadre pratipattim kām pratyapadyanta māmakāḥ
mūlam hi sarva dharmāṇām daivatam svarga vāsinām

original: 07,045.003d*0308_02 sa kṛṣṇo daivataṃ yeṣāṃ kiṃ teṣāṃ duḥkhasaṃbhavaḥ
analyzed: sa kṛṣṇaḥ daivatam yeṣām kim teṣām duḥkha saṃbhavaḥ
karmaṇām pratipanne rthe kālena pariṇāmite

original: 07,045.003d*0308_04 kā cintā mahatī bhūpa cintayā bādhyate jaḍaḥ
analyzed: kā cintā mahatī bhūpa cintayā bādhyate jaḍaḥ

original: 07,045.003d*0308_06 tyāgaṃ vinā mahārāja samādhānaṃ na vidyate
analyzed: tyāgam vinā mahā rāja samādhānam na vidyate
bhavān tad rahitaḥ rājam śṛṇuṣva ācarite phalam
saṃjayaḥ uvāca

original: 07,045.004*0309_01 tāvakās tava putrāś ca vīkṣamāṇāḥ parasparam
analyzed: tāvakāḥ tava putrāḥ ca vīkṣamāṇāḥ parasparam
saṃśuṣka āsyāḥ calat netrāḥ prasvinnāḥ loma harṣiṇaḥ
palāyana kṛta utsāhāḥ nirutsāhāḥ dviṣat jaye
gotra nāmabhiḥ anyonyam krandantaḥ jīvita eṣiṇaḥ
hatān bhrātṝn pitṝn putrān suhṛd saṃbandhi bāndhavān
utsṛjya utsṛjya samiyuḥ tvarayantaḥ haya dvipān

original: 07,045.006a tān prabhagnāṃs tathā dṛṣṭvā droṇo drauṇir bṛhadbalaḥ
analyzed: tān prabhagnān tathā dṛṣṭvā droṇaḥ drauṇiḥ bṛhadbalaḥ
kṛpaḥ duryodhanaḥ karṇaḥ kṛtavarmā atha saubalaḥ

original: 07,045.006d*0311_01 tathā sarve samabhyetya saubhadraṃ drutam arpayan
analyzed: tathā sarve samabhyetya saubhadram drutam arpayan

original: 07,045.006d*0311_02 tathā vinihatāṃ dṛṣṭvā tava senām anāthavat
analyzed: tathā vinihatām dṛṣṭvā tava senām anātha vat
abhidrutāḥ su saṃkruddhāḥ saubhadram aparājitam

original: 07,045.007c te 'pi pautreṇa te rājan prāyaśo vimukhīkṛtāḥ
analyzed: te pi pautreṇa te rājan prāyaśas vimukhīkṛtāḥ
saubhadreṇa mahā rāja śakra pratima tejasā

original: 07,045.008a ekas tu sukhasaṃvṛddho bālyād darpāc ca nirbhayaḥ
analyzed: ekaḥ tu sukha saṃvṛddhaḥ bālyāt darpāt ca nirbhayaḥ
iṣvastra vid mahā tejāḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ rjunim abhyayāt

original: 07,045.009a tam anvag evāsya pitā putragṛddhī nyavartata
analyzed: tam eva asya pitā putra gṛddhī nyavartata
anu duryodhanam ca anye nyavartanta mahā rathāḥ

original: 07,045.010a taṃ te 'bhiṣiṣicur bāṇair meghā girim ivāmbubhiḥ
analyzed: tam te bhiṣiṣicuḥ bāṇaiḥ meghāḥ girim iva ambuṣu

original: 07,045.010c sa ca tān pramamāthaiko viṣvag vāto yathāmbudān
analyzed: sa ca tān pramamātha ekaḥ vātaḥ yathā ambudān

original: 07,045.011a pautraṃ tu tava durdharṣaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ priyadarśanam
analyzed: pautram tu tava durdharṣam lakṣmaṇam priya darśanam
pituḥ samīpe tiṣṭhantam śūram udyata kārmukam
atyanta sukha saṃvṛddham dhaneśvara suta upamam

original: 07,045.012c āsasāda raṇe kārṣṇir matto mattam iva dvipam
analyzed: āsasāda raṇe kārṣṇiḥ mattaḥ mattam iva dvipam

original: 07,045.012d*0313_01 abravīl lakṣmaṇaḥ kruddham ārjuniṃ paramām āstravit
analyzed: abravīt lakṣmaṇaḥ kruddham ārjunim paramām āstra vid
śṛṇu vākyam mahā bāho abhimanyo mahā bala

original: 07,045.012d*0313_03 gaccha tvaṃ pāṇḍavāñ śīghraṃ mā yuddhaṃ kuru suvrata
analyzed: gaccha tvam pāṇḍavām śīghram mā yuddham kuru suvrata

original: 07,045.012d*0313_04 tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā abhimanyuḥ pratāpavān
analyzed: tasya tat vacanam śrutvā abhimanyuḥ pratāpavān

original: 07,045.012d*0313_05 uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ kruddhaḥ prahasann iva bhārata
analyzed: uvāca lakṣmaṇam kruddhaḥ prahasan iva bhārata

original: 07,045.012d*0313_06 gamiṣyāmi ciraṃ bhrātaḥ sarvān etān nihatya vai
analyzed: gamiṣyāmi ciram bhrātar sarvān etān nihatya vai

original: 07,045.012d*0313_07 pāṇḍavān prati cādyaiva iti satyaṃ vadāmi te
analyzed: pāṇḍavān prati ca adya eva iti satyam vadāmi te
siṃha śāvaḥ vane yadvat puṇḍarīka śiśum yathā
lakṣmaṇena tu saṃgamya saubhadraḥ para vīra hā

original: 07,045.013c śaraiḥ suniśitais tīkṣṇair bāhvor urasi cārpitaḥ
analyzed: śaraiḥ su niśitaiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ bāhvoḥ urasi ca arpitaḥ
saṃkruddhaḥ vai mahā bāhuḥ daṇḍa āhataḥ iva uragaḥ

original: 07,045.014c pautras tava mahārāja tava pautram abhāṣata
analyzed: pautraḥ tava mahā rāja tava pautram abhāṣata

original: 07,045.015a sudṛṣṭaḥ kriyatāṃ loko amuṃ lokaṃ gamiṣyasi
analyzed: su dṛṣṭaḥ kriyatām lokaḥ amum lokam gamiṣyasi
paśyatām bāndhavānām tvām nayāmi yama sādanam
tasya ca atikramam dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇaḥ yuddha kovidaḥ

original: 07,045.015d*0315_02 yuddhaṃ cakre tadā tena śastrāstrair matimān nṛpa
analyzed: yuddham cakre tadā tena śastra astraiḥ matimān nṛpa
tayoḥ yuddham atīva āsīt budha aṅgārakayoḥ iva
anyonyam jighāṃsatoḥ bala vāsavayoḥ iva
śara jālaiḥ mahā ghoraiḥ vivyadhuḥ te parasparam

original: 07,045.015d*0315_06 lakṣmaṇo niśitair bāṇair daśabhiś ca stanāntare
analyzed: lakṣmaṇaḥ niśitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ daśabhiḥ ca stanāntare
ājaghāna ārjunim ca eva tathā viddhaḥ bhimanyunā
pañcabhiḥ pañcabhiḥ bāṇaiḥ nijaghne ratha vājinaḥ
sārathim iṣuṇā ekena dhvajam ca eka iṣuṇā ahanat

original: 07,045.015d*0315_10 tribhir bāṇair dhanuś chittvā ārjuniḥ sumahābalaḥ
analyzed: tribhiḥ bāṇaiḥ dhanuḥ chittvā ārjuniḥ su mahā balaḥ

original: 07,045.016a evam uktvā tato bhallaṃ saubhadraḥ paravīrahā
analyzed: evam uktvā tatas bhallam saubhadraḥ para vīra hā
mahā bāhuḥ nirmukta uraga saṃnibham
sa tasya bhuja nirmuktaḥ lakṣmaṇasya su darśanam
su nasam su bhru keśāntam śiraḥ hārṣīt sa kuṇḍalam

original: 07,045.017e lakṣmaṇaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā hā hety uccukruśur janāḥ
analyzed: lakṣmaṇam nihatam dṛṣṭvā hā hā iti uccukruśuḥ janāḥ
sa bhrātṝn rāja putrān ca kumārasya anuyāyinām
jaghāna bāṇaiḥ saubhadraḥ sahasrāṇi caturdaśa
aṣṭau ratha sahasrāṇi sapta nāga śatāni ca

original: 07,045.018a tato duryodhanaḥ kruddhaḥ priye putre nipātite
analyzed: tatas duryodhanaḥ kruddhaḥ priye putre nipātite
hata enam iti cukrośa kṣatriyān kṣatriya ṛṣabhaḥ

original: 07,045.019a tato droṇaḥ kṛpaḥ karṇo droṇaputro bṛhadbalaḥ
analyzed: tatas droṇaḥ kṛpaḥ karṇaḥ droṇa putraḥ bṛhadbalaḥ

original: 07,045.019c kṛtavarmā ca hārdikyaḥ ṣaḍ rathāḥ paryavārayan
analyzed: kṛtavarmā ca hārdikyaḥ ṣaṭ rathāḥ paryavārayan

original: 07,045.020a sa tān viddhvā śitair bāṇair vimukhīkṛtya cārjuniḥ
analyzed: sa tān viddhvā śitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ vimukhīkṛtya ca ārjuniḥ
vegena abhyapatat kruddhaḥ saindhavasya mahat balam
āvavruḥ tasya panthānam gaja anīkena daṃśitāḥ

original: 07,045.021c kaliṅgāś ca niṣādāś ca krāthaputraś ca vīryavān
analyzed: kaliṅgāḥ ca niṣādāḥ ca krātha putraḥ ca vīryavān

original: 07,045.021e tat prasaktam ivātyarthaṃ yuddham āsīd viśāṃ pate
analyzed: tat prasaktam iva atyartham yuddham āsīt viśām pate

original: 07,045.022a tatas tat kuñjarānīkaṃ vyadhamad dhṛṣṭam ārjuniḥ
analyzed: tatas tat kuñjara anīkam vyadhamat dhṛṣṭam ārjuniḥ
yathā vivāt nityagatiḥ jaladām śataśas mbare
tatas krāthaḥ śara vrātaiḥ ārjunim samavākirat
atha itare saṃnivṛttāḥ punar droṇa mukhāḥ rathāḥ
parama astrāṇi dhunvānāḥ saubhadram abhidudruvuḥ
tān nivārya ārjuniḥ bāṇaiḥ krāthaputram atha ardayat
śara ogheṇa aprameyeṇa tvaramāṇaḥ jighāṃsayā
sa dhanuḥ bāṇa keyūrau bāhū sa mukuṭam śiraḥ

original: 07,045.025c chatraṃ dhvajaṃ niyantāram aśvāṃś cāsya nyapātayat
analyzed: chatram dhvajam niyantāram aśvān ca asya nyapātayat
kula śīla śruta balaiḥ kīrtyā ca astra balena ca

original: 07,045.026c yukte tasmin hate vīrāḥ prāyaśo vimukhābhavan
analyzed: yukte tasmin hate vīrāḥ prāyaśas vimukhāḥ abhavan
dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ uvāca
tathā praviṣṭam taruṇam saubhadram aparājitam
kula anurūpam kurvāṇam saṃgrāmeṣu apalāyinam
ājāneyaiḥ su balibhiḥ yuktam aśvaiḥ tri hāyanaiḥ
plavamānam iva ākāśe ke śūrāḥ samavārayan
saṃjayaḥ uvāca
abhimanyuḥ praviśya eva tāvakān niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
akarot vimukhān sarvān pārthivān pāṇḍu nandanaḥ

original: 07,046.004a taṃ tu droṇaḥ kṛpaḥ karṇo drauṇiś ca sabṛhadbalaḥ
analyzed: tam tu droṇaḥ kṛpaḥ karṇaḥ drauṇiḥ ca sa bṛhadbalaḥ

original: 07,046.004c kṛtavarmā ca hārdikyaḥ ṣaḍ rathāḥ paryavārayan
analyzed: kṛtavarmā ca hārdikyaḥ ṣaṭ rathāḥ paryavārayan

original: 07,046.005a dṛṣṭvā tu saindhave bhāram atimātraṃ samāhitam
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tu saindhave bhāram atimātram samāhitam
sainyam tava mahā rāja yudhiṣṭhiram upādravat
saubhadram itare vīram abhyavarṣam śara ambubhiḥ
tāla mātrāṇi cāpāni vikarṣantaḥ mahā rathāḥ

original: 07,046.007a tāṃs tu sarvān maheṣvāsān sarvavidyāsu niṣṭhitān
analyzed: tān tu sarvān mahā iṣvāsān sarva vidyāsu niṣṭhitān
vyaṣṭambhayat raṇe bāṇaiḥ saubhadraḥ para vīra hā

original: 07,046.008a droṇaṃ pañcāśatā viddhvā viṃśatyā ca bṛhadbalam
analyzed: droṇam pañcāśatā viddhvā viṃśatyā ca bṛhadbalam
aśītyā kṛtavarmāṇam kṛpam ṣaṣṭyā śilīmukhaiḥ
rukma puṅkhaiḥ mahā vegaiḥ ākarṇa sama coditaiḥ
avidhyat daśabhiḥ bāṇaiḥ aśvatthāmānam ārjuniḥ

original: 07,046.010a sa karṇaṃ karṇinā karṇe pītena niśitena ca
analyzed: sa karṇam karṇinā karṇe pītena niśitena ca
phālguniḥ dviṣatām madhye vivyādha parama iṣuṇā
pātayitvā kṛpasya aśvān tathā ubhau pārṣṇisārathī
athā enam daśabhiḥ bāṇaiḥ pratyavidhyat stanāntare
tatas vṛndārakam vīram kurūṇām kīrti vardhanam

original: 07,046.012c putrāṇāṃ tava vīrāṇāṃ paśyatām avadhīd balī
analyzed: putrāṇām tava vīrāṇām paśyatām avadhīt balī
tam drauṇiḥ pañcaviṃśatyā kṣudrakāṇām samarpayat
varam varam amitrāṇām ārujantam abhīta vat

original: 07,046.014a sa tu bāṇaiḥ śitais tūrṇaṃ pratyavidhyata māriṣa
analyzed: sa tu bāṇaiḥ śitaiḥ tūrṇam pratyavidhyata māriṣa
paśyatām dhārtarāṣṭrāṇām aśvatthāmānam ārjuniḥ

original: 07,046.015a ṣaṣṭyā śarāṇāṃ taṃ drauṇis tigmadhāraiḥ sutejanaiḥ
analyzed: ṣaṣṭyā śarāṇām tam drauṇiḥ tigma dhāraiḥ su tejanaiḥ

original: 07,046.015c ugrair nākampayad viddhvā mainākam iva parvatam
analyzed: ugraiḥ na akampayat viddhvā mainākam iva parvatam

original: 07,046.016a sa tu drauṇiṃ trisaptatyā hemapuṅkhair ajihmagaiḥ
analyzed: sa tu drauṇim trisaptatyā hema puṅkhaiḥ ajihmagaiḥ
pratyavidhyat mahā tejāḥ balavān apakāriṇam
tasmin droṇaḥ bāṇa śatam putra gṛddhī nyapātayat

original: 07,046.017c aśvatthāmā tathāṣṭau ca parīpsan pitaraṃ raṇe
analyzed: aśvatthāmā tathā aṣṭau ca parīpsan pitaram raṇe
karṇaḥ dvāviṃśatim bhallān kṛtavarmā caturdaśa

original: 07,046.018c bṛhadbalas tu pañcāśat kṛpaḥ śāradvato daśa
analyzed: bṛhadbalaḥ tu pañcāśat kṛpaḥ śāradvataḥ daśa

original: 07,046.019a tāṃs tu pratyavadhīt sarvān daśabhir daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: tān tu pratyavadhīt sarvān daśabhiḥ daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 07,046.019c tair ardyamānaḥ saubhadraḥ sarvato niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: taiḥ ardyamānaḥ saubhadraḥ sarvatas niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
tam kosalānām adhipaḥ karṇinā atāḍayat hṛdi

original: 07,046.020c sa tasyāśvān dhvajaṃ cāpaṃ sūtaṃ cāpātayat kṣitau
analyzed: sa tasya aśvān dhvajam cāpam sūtam ca apātayat kṣitau
atha kosala rājaḥ tu virathaḥ khaḍga carma dhṛt

original: 07,046.021c iyeṣa phālguneḥ kāyāc chiro hartuṃ sakuṇḍalam
analyzed: iyeṣa phālguneḥ kāyāt śiraḥ hartum sa kuṇḍalam
sa kosalānām bhartāram rāja putram bṛhadbalam
hṛdi vivyādha bāṇena sa bhinna hṛdayaḥ patat

original: 07,046.023a babhañja ca sahasrāṇi daśa rājan mahātmanām
analyzed: babhañja ca sahasrāṇi daśa rājan mahātmanām
sṛjatām aśivāḥ vācaḥ khaḍga kārmuka dhāriṇām

original: 07,046.024a tathā bṛhadbalaṃ hatvā saubhadro vyacarad raṇe
analyzed: tathā bṛhadbalam hatvā saubhadraḥ vyacarat raṇe
viṣṭambhayan mahā iṣvāsān yodhān tava śara ambuṣu
saṃjayaḥ uvāca

original: 07,047.001a sa karṇaṃ karṇinā karṇe punar vivyādha phālguniḥ
analyzed: sa karṇam karṇinā karṇe punar vivyādha phālguniḥ

original: 07,047.001c śaraiḥ pañcāśatā cainam avidhyat kopayan bhṛśam
analyzed: śaraiḥ pañcāśatā ca enam avidhyat kopayan bhṛśam

original: 07,047.002a prativivyādha rādheyas tāvadbhir atha taṃ punaḥ
analyzed: prativivyādha rādheyaḥ tāvadbhiḥ atha tam punar

original: 07,047.002c sa tair ācitasarvāṅgo bahv aśobhata bhārata

original: 07,073.041c astrair astravidāṃ śreṣṭho yodhayām āsa bhārata

ante vihitam astrāṇām etat kavaca dhāraṇam

original: 07,078.012a asminn antarhitaṃ kṛṣṇa trailokyam api varmaṇi
analyzed: asmin antarhitam kṛṣṇa trailokyam api varmaṇi

original: 07,078.012c eko droṇo hi vedaitad ahaṃ tasmāc ca sattamāt
analyzed: ekaḥ droṇaḥ hi veda etat aham tasmāt ca sattamāt

original: 07,078.013a na śakyam etat kavacaṃ bāṇair bhettuṃ kathaṃ cana
analyzed: na śakyam etat kavacam bāṇaiḥ bhettum katham cana

original: 07,078.013c api vajreṇa govinda svayaṃ maghavatā yudhi
analyzed: api vajreṇa govinda svayam maghavatā yudhi

original: 07,078.014a jānaṃs tvam api vai kṛṣṇa māṃ vimohayase katham

original: 07,078.014c yadvṛttaṃ triṣu lokeṣu yac ca keśava vartate
analyzed: yad vṛttam triṣu lokeṣu yat ca keśava vartate

original: 07,078.015a tathā bhaviṣyad yac caiva tat sarvaṃ viditaṃ tava
analyzed: tathā bhaviṣyat yat ca eva tat sarvam viditam tava

original: 07,078.015c na tv evaṃ veda vai kaś cid yathā tvaṃ madhusūdana
analyzed: na tu evam veda vai kaḥ cit yathā tvam madhusūdana

original: 07,078.016a eṣa duryodhanaḥ kṛṣṇa droṇena vihitām imām
analyzed: eṣa duryodhanaḥ kṛṣṇa droṇena vihitām imām
tiṣṭhati abhīta vat saṃkhye bibhrat kavaca dhāraṇām

original: 07,078.017a yat tv atra vihitaṃ kāryaṃ naiṣa tad vetti mādhava
analyzed: yat tu atra vihitam kāryam na eṣa tat vetti mādhava

original: 07,078.017c strīvad eṣa bibharty etāṃ yuktāṃ kavacadhāraṇām
analyzed: strī vat eṣa bibharti etām yuktām kavaca dhāraṇām

original: 07,078.018a paśya bāhvoś ca me vīryaṃ dhanuṣaś ca janārdana
analyzed: paśya bāhvoḥ ca me vīryam dhanuṣaḥ ca janārdana

original: 07,078.019a idam aṅgirase prādād deveśo varma bhāsvaram
analyzed: idam aṅgirase prādāt deveśaḥ varma bhāsvaram

original: 07,078.019b*0550_01 tasmād bṛhaspatiḥ prāpa tataḥ prāpa puraṃdaraḥ
analyzed: tasmāt bṛhaspatiḥ prāpa tatas prāpa puraṃdaraḥ

original: 07,078.019c punar dadau surapatir mahyaṃ varma sasaṃgraham
analyzed: punar dadau surapatiḥ mahyam varma sa saṃgraham

original: 07,078.020a daivaṃ yady asya varmaitad brahmaṇā vā svayaṃ kṛtam
analyzed: daivam yadi asya varma etat brahmaṇā vā svayam kṛtam

original: 07,078.020c naitad gopsyati durbuddhim adya bāṇahataṃ mayā
analyzed: na etat gopsyati durbuddhim adya bāṇa hatam mayā
saṃjayaḥ uvāca
evam uktvā arjunaḥ bāṇān abhimantrya vyakarṣayat
vikṛṣyamāṇān tena evam dhanuḥ madhya gatām śarān
tān asya astreṇa ciccheda drauṇiḥ sarva astra ghātinā

original: 07,078.022a tān nikṛttān iṣūn dṛṣṭvā dūrato brahmavādinā
analyzed: tān nikṛttān iṣūn dṛṣṭvā dūratas brahma vādinā
nyavedayat keśavāya vismitaḥ śvetavāhanaḥ

original: 07,078.023a naitad astraṃ mayā śakyaṃ dviḥ prayoktuṃ janārdana
analyzed: na etat astram mayā śakyam dvis prayoktum janārdana

original: 07,078.023c astraṃ mām eva hanyād dhi paśya tv adya balaṃ mama
analyzed: astram mām eva hanyāt hi paśya tu adya balam mama
tatas duryodhanaḥ kṛṣṇau navabhiḥ nata parvabhiḥ
avidhyata raṇe rājam śaraiḥ āśīviṣa upamaiḥ
bhūyas eva abhyavarṣat ca samare kṛṣṇa pāṇḍavau
śara varṣeṇa mahatā tatas hṛṣyanta tāvakāḥ
cakruḥ vāditra ninadān siṃhanāda ravān tathā

original: 07,078.026a tataḥ kruddho raṇe pārthaḥ sṛkkaṇī parisaṃlihan
analyzed: tatas kruddhaḥ raṇe pārthaḥ parisaṃlihan

original: 07,078.026c nāpaśyata tato 'syāṅgaṃ yan na syād varmarakṣitam
analyzed: na apaśyata sya aṅgam yat na syāt varma rakṣitam
tatas sya niśitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ su muktaiḥ antaka upamaiḥ

original: 07,078.027c hayāṃś cakāra nirdehān ubhau ca pārṣṇisārathī
analyzed: hayān cakāra nirdehān ubhau ca pārṣṇisārathī

original: 07,078.028a dhanur asyācchinac citraṃ hastāvāpaṃ ca vīryavān
analyzed: dhanuḥ asya ācchinat citram hasta āvāpam ca vīryavān
ratham ca śakalīkartum savyasācī pracakrame
duryodhanam ca bāṇābhyām tīkṣṇābhyām virathīkṛtam
prayatna kārī kaunteyaḥ nakha māṃsa antara iṣubhiḥ
sa vedanābhiḥ āvignaḥ palāyana parāyaṇaḥ
avidhyat hasta talayoḥ ubhayoḥ arjunaḥ tadā

original: 07,078.030a taṃ kṛcchrām āpadaṃ prāptaṃ dṛṣṭvā paramadhanvinaḥ
analyzed: tam kṛcchrām āpadam prāptam dṛṣṭvā parama dhanvinaḥ
samāpetuḥ parīpsantaḥ dhanaṃjaya śara arditam

original: 07,078.031a te rathair bahusāhasraiḥ kalpitaiḥ kuñjarair hayaiḥ
analyzed: te rathaiḥ bahu sāhasraiḥ kalpitaiḥ kuñjaraiḥ hayaiḥ
padāti oghaiḥ ca saṃrabdhaiḥ parivavruḥ dhanaṃjayam
atha na arjuna govindau rathaḥ vā api vyadṛśyata
astra varṣeṇa mahatā jana oghaiḥ ca api saṃvṛtau
tatas rjunaḥ stra vīryeṇa nijaghne tām varūthinīm
tatra vyaṅgīkṛtāḥ petuḥ ratha dvipāḥ

original: 07,078.034a te hatā hanyamānāś ca nyagṛhṇaṃs taṃ rathottamam
analyzed: te hatāḥ hanyamānāḥ ca nyagṛhṇan tam ratha uttamam
sa ratha stambhitaḥ tasthau krośa mātram samantataḥ
tatas rjunam vṛṣṇi vīraḥ tvaritaḥ vākyam abravīt
dhanuḥ visphāraya atyartham aham dhmāsyāmi ca ambujam

original: 07,078.036a tato visphārya balavad gāṇḍīvaṃ jaghnivān ripūn
analyzed: tatas visphārya balavat gāṇḍīvam jaghnivān ripūn
mahatā śara varṣeṇa tala śabdena ca arjunaḥ

original: 07,078.037a pāñcajanyaṃ ca balavad dadhmau tāreṇa keśavaḥ
analyzed: pāñcajanyam ca balavat dadhmau tāreṇa keśavaḥ
rajasā dhvasta pakṣma antaḥ prasvinna vadanaḥ bhṛśam
tena acyuta uṣṭha yuga pūrita mārutena
śaṅkha antara udara vivṛddha viniḥsṛtena
nādena sa asura viyat sura lokapālam
udvignam īśvara jagat sphuṭati iva sarvam

original: 07,078.038a tasya śaṅkhasya nādena dhanuṣo nisvanena ca
analyzed: tasya śaṅkhasya nādena dhanuṣaḥ nisvanena ca

original: 07,078.038c niḥsattvāś ca sasattvāś ca kṣitau petus tadā janāḥ
analyzed: niḥsattvāḥ ca sa sattvāḥ ca kṣitau petuḥ tadā janāḥ

original: 07,078.039a tair vimukto ratho reje vāyvīrita ivāmbudaḥ
analyzed: taiḥ vimuktaḥ rathaḥ reje vāyu īritaḥ iva ambudaḥ
jayadrathasya goptāraḥ tatas kṣubdhāḥ saha anugāḥ

original: 07,078.040a te dṛṣṭvā sahasā pārthaṃ goptāraḥ saindhavasya tu
analyzed: te dṛṣṭvā sahasā pārtham goptāraḥ saindhavasya tu
cakruḥ nādān bahuvidhān kampayantaḥ vasuṃdharām
bāṇa śabda ravān ca ugrān vimiśrām śaṅkha nisvanaiḥ
prāduścakruḥ mahātmānaḥ siṃhanāda ravān api

original: 07,078.042a taṃ śrutvā ninadaṃ ghoraṃ tāvakānāṃ samutthitam
analyzed: tam śrutvā ninadam ghoram tāvakānām samutthitam
pradadhmatuḥ tadā śaṅkhau vāsudeva dhanaṃjayau
tena śabdena mahatā pūritā iyam vasuṃdharā
sa śailā sa arṇava dvīpā sa pātālā viśām pate

original: 07,078.044a sa śabdo bharataśreṣṭha vyāpya sarvā diśo daśa
analyzed: sa śabdaḥ bharata śreṣṭha vyāpya sarvāḥ diśaḥ daśa
pratisasvāna tatra eva kuru pāṇḍavayoḥ bale
tāvakāḥ rathinaḥ tatra dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇa dhanaṃjayau
saṃrambham paramam prāptāḥ tvaramāṇāḥ mahā rathāḥ

original: 07,078.046a atha kṛṣṇau mahābhāgau tāvakā dṛśya daṃśitau
analyzed: atha kṛṣṇau mahābhāgau tāvakāḥ dṛśya daṃśitau
abhyadravanta saṃkruddhāḥ tat adbhutam iva abhavat
saṃjayaḥ uvāca
tāvakāḥ tu samīkṣya eva vṛṣṇi andhaka kuru uttamau

original: 07,079.001c prāg atvarañ jighāṃsantas tathaiva vijayaḥ parān
analyzed: prāk atvaram jighāṃsantaḥ tathā eva vijayaḥ parān
suvarṇa citraiḥ vaiyāghraiḥ svanavadbhiḥ mahā rathaiḥ

original: 07,079.002c dīpayanto diśaḥ sarvā jvaladbhir iva pāvakaiḥ
analyzed: dīpayantaḥ diśaḥ sarvāḥ jvaladbhiḥ iva pāvakaiḥ
rukma pṛṣṭhaiḥ ca duṣprekṣyaiḥ kārmukaiḥ pṛthivīpate

original: 07,079.003c kūjadbhir atulān nādān roṣitair uragair iva
analyzed: kūjadbhiḥ atulān nādān roṣitaiḥ uragaiḥ iva
bhūriśravāḥ śalaḥ karṇaḥ vṛṣasenaḥ jayadrathaḥ

original: 07,079.004c kṛpaś ca madrarājaś ca drauṇiś ca rathināṃ varaḥ
analyzed: kṛpaḥ ca madra rājaḥ ca drauṇiḥ ca rathinām varaḥ

original: 07,079.005a te pibanta ivākāśam aśvair aṣṭau mahārathāḥ
analyzed: te pibantaḥ iva ākāśam aśvaiḥ aṣṭau mahā rathāḥ

original: 07,079.006c samāvṛṇvan diśaḥ sarvāḥ pārthaṃ ca viśikhaiḥ śitaiḥ
analyzed: samāvṛṇvan diśaḥ sarvāḥ pārtham ca viśikhaiḥ śitaiḥ

original: 07,079.007a kaulūtakā hayāś citrā vahantas tān mahārathān
analyzed: kaulūtakāḥ hayāḥ citrāḥ vahantaḥ tān mahā rathān

original: 07,079.007c vyaśobhanta tadā śīghrā dīpayanto diśo daśa
analyzed: vyaśobhanta tadā śīghrāḥ dīpayantaḥ diśaḥ daśa

original: 07,079.008c pārvatīyair nadījaiś ca saindhavaiś ca hayottamaiḥ
analyzed: pārvatīyaiḥ nadījaiḥ ca saindhavaiḥ ca haya uttamaiḥ
kuru yodha varāḥ rājan tava putram parīpsavaḥ
dhanaṃjaya ratham śīghram sarvatas samupādravan
te pragṛhya mahā śaṅkhān dadhmuḥ puruṣa sattamāḥ

original: 07,079.010c pūrayanto divaṃ rājan pṛthivīṃ ca sasāgarām
analyzed: pūrayantaḥ divam rājan pṛthivīm ca sa sāgarām

original: 07,079.011e devadattaṃ ca kaunteyaḥ pāñcajanyaṃ ca keśavaḥ
analyzed: devadattam ca kaunteyaḥ pāñcajanyam ca keśavaḥ

original: 07,079.012c pṛthivīṃ cāntarikṣaṃ ca diśaś caiva samāvṛṇot
analyzed: pṛthivīm ca antarikṣam ca diśaḥ ca eva samāvṛṇot
tathā eva pāñcajanyaḥ pi vāsudeva samīritaḥ
sarva śabdān atikramya pūrayām āsa rodasī
tasmin tathā vartamāne dāruṇe nāda saṃkule
bhīrūṇām trāsa janane śūrāṇām harṣa vardhane
pravāditāsu bherīṣu jharjhareṣu ānakeṣu ca
mṛdaṅgeṣu ca rāja indra vādyamāneṣu anekaśas
mahā ratha samākhyātāḥ duryodhana hita eṣiṇaḥ
amṛṣyamāṇāḥ tam śabdam kruddhāḥ parama dhanvinaḥ
nānādeśyāḥ mahīpālāḥ sva sainya parirakṣiṇaḥ
amarṣitāḥ mahā śaṅkhān dadhmuḥ vīrāḥ mahā rathāḥ
kṛte pratikariṣyantaḥ keśavasya arjunasya ca
babhūva tava tat sainyam śaṅkha śabda samīritam
udvigna ratha nāga aśvam asvastham iva ca abhibho
tat prayuktam iva ākāśam śūraiḥ śaṅkha nināditam

original: 07,079.019c babhūva bhṛśam udvignaṃ nirghātair iva nāditam
analyzed: babhūva bhṛśam udvignam nirghātaiḥ iva nāditam

original: 07,079.020a sa śabdaḥ sumahān rājan diśaḥ sarvā vyanādayat
analyzed: sa śabdaḥ su mahān rājan diśaḥ sarvāḥ vyanādayat

original: 07,079.020c trāsayām āsa tat sainyaṃ yugānta iva saṃbhṛtaḥ
analyzed: trāsayām āsa tat sainyam yugānte iva saṃbhṛtaḥ

original: 07,079.021a tato duryodhano 'ṣṭau ca rājānas te mahārathāḥ
analyzed: tatas duryodhanaḥ ṣṭau ca rājānaḥ te mahā rathāḥ
jayadrathasya rakṣā artham pāṇḍavam paryavārayan

original: 07,079.022c arjunaṃ ca tribhir bhallair dhvajam aśvāṃś ca pañcabhiḥ
analyzed: arjunam ca tribhiḥ bhallaiḥ dhvajam aśvān ca pañcabhiḥ

original: 07,079.023a tam arjunaḥ pṛṣatkānāṃ śataiḥ ṣaḍbhir atāḍayat
analyzed: tam arjunaḥ pṛṣatkānām śataiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ atāḍayat

original: 07,079.024a karṇaṃ dvādaśabhir viddhvā vṛṣasenaṃ tribhis tathā
analyzed: karṇam dvādaśabhiḥ viddhvā vṛṣasenam tribhiḥ tathā

original: 07,079.024c śalyasya saśaraṃ cāpaṃ muṣṭau ciccheda vīryavān
analyzed: śalyasya sa śaram cāpam muṣṭau ciccheda vīryavān

original: 07,079.025a gṛhītvā dhanur anyat tu śalyo vivyādha pāṇḍavam
analyzed: gṛhītvā dhanuḥ anyat tu śalyaḥ vivyādha pāṇḍavam

original: 07,079.026a karṇo dvātriṃśatā caiva vṛṣasenaś ca pañcabhiḥ
analyzed: karṇaḥ dvātriṃśatā ca eva vṛṣasenaḥ ca pañcabhiḥ

original: 07,079.026c jayadrathas trisaptatyā kṛpaś ca daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: jayadrathaḥ trisaptatyā kṛpaḥ ca daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 07,079.026e madrarājaś ca daśabhir vivyadhuḥ phalgunaṃ raṇe
analyzed: madra rājaḥ ca daśabhiḥ vivyadhuḥ phalgunam raṇe

original: 07,079.027a tataḥ śarāṇāṃ ṣaṣṭyā tu drauṇiḥ pārtham avākirat
analyzed: tatas śarāṇām ṣaṣṭyā tu drauṇiḥ pārtham avākirat

original: 07,079.027c vāsudevaṃ ca saptatyā punaḥ pārthaṃ ca pañcabhiḥ
analyzed: vāsudevam ca saptatyā punar pārtham ca pañcabhiḥ

original: 07,079.028c pratyavidhyat sa tān sarvān darśayan pāṇilāghavam
analyzed: pratyavidhyat sa tān sarvān darśayan pāṇi lāghavam

original: 07,079.029a karṇaṃ dvādaśabhir viddhvā vṛṣasenaṃ tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: karṇam dvādaśabhiḥ viddhvā vṛṣasenam tribhiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 07,079.030a saumadattiṃ tribhir viddhvā śalyaṃ ca daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: saumadattim tribhiḥ viddhvā śalyam ca daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
śitaiḥ agni śikhā ākāraiḥ drauṇim vivyādha ca aṣṭabhiḥ

original: 07,079.031a gautamaṃ pañcaviṃśatyā śaindhavaṃ ca śatena ha
analyzed: gautamam pañcaviṃśatyā śaindhavam ca śatena ha

original: 07,079.031c punar drauṇiṃ ca saptatyā śarāṇāṃ so 'bhyatāḍayat
analyzed: punar drauṇim ca saptatyā śarāṇām saḥ bhyatāḍayat

original: 07,079.032a bhūriśravās tu saṃkruddhaḥ pratodaṃ cicchide hareḥ
analyzed: bhūriśravāḥ tu saṃkruddhaḥ pratodam cicchide hareḥ

original: 07,079.032c arjunaṃ ca trisaptatyā bāṇānām ājaghāna ha
analyzed: arjunam ca trisaptatyā bāṇānām ājaghāna ha

original: 07,079.033a tataḥ śaraśatais tīkṣṇais tān arīñ śvetavāhanaḥ
analyzed: tatas śara śataiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ tān arīm śvetavāhanaḥ

original: 07,079.033c pratyaṣedhad drutaṃ kruddho mahāvāto ghanān iva
analyzed: pratyaṣedhat drutam kruddhaḥ mahā vātaḥ ghanān iva
dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ uvāca
