original: 07,080.001c pārthānāṃ māmakānāṃ ca tān mamācakṣva saṃjaya
analyzed: pārthānām māmakānām ca tān mama ācakṣva saṃjaya
saṃjayaḥ uvāca
dhvajān bahuvidha ākārām śṛṇu teṣām mahātmanām

original: 07,080.002c rūpato varṇataś caiva nāmataś ca nibodha me
analyzed: rūpataḥ varṇataḥ ca eva nāmataḥ ca nibodha me

original: 07,080.003a teṣāṃ tu rathamuhyānāṃ ratheṣu vividhā dhvajāḥ
analyzed: teṣām tu ratha muhyānām ratheṣu vividhāḥ dhvajāḥ
pratyadṛśyanta rāja indra jvalitāḥ iva pāvakāḥ
kāñcanāḥ kāñcana āpīḍāḥ kāñcana sraj alaṃkṛtāḥ
kāñcanāni iva śṛṅgāṇi kāñcanasya mahā gireḥ
aneka varṇāḥ vividhāḥ dhvajāḥ parama śobhinaḥ

original: 07,080.005a te dhvajāḥ saṃvṛtās teṣāṃ patākābhiḥ samantataḥ
analyzed: te dhvajāḥ saṃvṛtāḥ teṣām patākābhiḥ samantataḥ
nānā varṇa virāgābhiḥ vibabhuḥ sarvatas vṛtāḥ

original: 07,080.006a patākāś ca tatas tās tu śvasanena samīritāḥ
analyzed: patākāḥ ca tatas tāḥ tu śvasanena samīritāḥ
nṛtyamānāḥ vyadṛśyanta raṅga madhye vilāsikāḥ
indrāyudha savarṇa ābhāḥ patākāḥ bharata ṛṣabha
dodhūyamānāḥ rathinām śobhayanti mahā rathān
siṃha lāṅgūlam ugra āsyam dhajam vānara lakṣaṇam
dhanaṃjayasya saṃgrāme pratyapaśyāma bhairavam
sa vānara varaḥ rājan patākābhiḥ alaṃkṛtaḥ

original: 07,080.009c trāsayām āsa tat sainyaṃ dhvajo gāṇḍīvadhanvanaḥ
analyzed: trāsayām āsa tat sainyam dhvajaḥ gāṇḍīvadhanvanaḥ
tathā eva siṃha lāṅgūlam droṇaputrasya bhārata
dhvaja agram samapaśyāma bāla sūrya sama prabham
kāñcanam pavana uddhūtam śakra dhvaja sama prabham
nandanam kaurava indrāṇām drauṇeḥ lakṣaṇam ucchritam
hasti kakṣyā punar haimī babhūva ādhiratheḥ dhvaje

original: 07,080.012c āhave khaṃ mahārāja dadṛśe pūrayann iva
analyzed: āhave kham mahā rāja dadṛśe pūrayan iva
patākī kāñcana sragvī dhvajaḥ karṇasya saṃyuge
nṛtyati iva rathopasthe śvasanena samīritaḥ
ācāryasya ca pāṇḍūnām brāhmaṇasya yaśasvinaḥ
go vṛṣaḥ gautamasya āsīt kṛpasya su pariṣkṛtaḥ

original: 07,080.015a sa tena bhrājate rājan govṛṣeṇa mahārathaḥ
analyzed: sa tena bhrājate rājan go vṛṣeṇa mahā rathaḥ
tripura ghna rathaḥ yadvat go vṛṣeṇa virājate
mayūraḥ vṛṣasenasya kāñcanaḥ maṇi ratnavān
vyāhariṣyan iva atiṣṭhat senā agram api śobhayan

original: 07,080.017a tena tasya ratho bhāti mayūreṇa mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: tena tasya rathaḥ bhāti mayūreṇa mahātmanaḥ
yathā skandasya rāja indra mayūreṇa virājatā
madra rājasya śalyasya dhvaja agre gni śikhām iva
sauvarṇīm pratipaśyāma sītām apratimām śubhām

original: 07,080.019a sā sītā bhrājate tasya ratham āsthāya māriṣa
analyzed: sā sītā bhrājate tasya ratham āsthāya māriṣa
sarva bīja virūḍhā iva yathā sītā śriyā vṛtā
varāhaḥ sindhurājasya rājataḥ bhivirājate
dhvaja agre lohita arka ābhaḥ hema jāla pariṣkṛtaḥ
śuśubhe ketunā tena rājatena jayadrathaḥ

original: 07,080.021c yathā devāsure yuddhe purā pūṣā sma śobhate
analyzed: yathā devāsure yuddhe purā pūṣā sma śobhate
saumadatteḥ punar yūpaḥ yajña śīlasya dhīmataḥ

original: 07,080.022c dhvajaḥ sūrya ivābhāti somaś cātra pradṛśyate
analyzed: dhvajaḥ sūryaḥ iva ābhāti somaḥ ca atra pradṛśyate

original: 07,080.023a sa yūpaḥ kāñcano rājan saumadatter virājate
analyzed: sa yūpaḥ kāñcanaḥ rājan saumadatteḥ virājate
rājasūye makha śreṣṭhe yathā yūpaḥ samucchritaḥ

original: 07,080.024a śalasya tu mahārāja rājato dvirado mahān
analyzed: śalasya tu mahā rāja rājataḥ dviradaḥ mahān
ketuḥ kāñcana citra aṅgaiḥ mayūraiḥ upaśobhitaḥ

original: 07,080.025a sa ketuḥ śobhayām āsa sainyaṃ te bharatarṣabha
analyzed: sa ketuḥ śobhayām āsa sainyam te bharata ṛṣabha
yathā śvetaḥ mahā nāgaḥ devarāja camūm tathā
nāgaḥ maṇi mayaḥ rājñaḥ dhvajaḥ kanaka saṃvṛtaḥ
kiṅkiṇī śata saṃhrādaḥ bhrājan citre ratha uttame

original: 07,080.027a vyabhrājata bhṛśaṃ rājan putras tava viśāṃ pate
analyzed: vyabhrājata bhṛśam rājan putraḥ tava viśām pate

original: 07,080.027c dhvajena mahatā saṃkhye kurūṇām ṛṣabhas tadā
analyzed: dhvajena mahatā saṃkhye kurūṇām ṛṣabhaḥ tadā
navā ete tava vāhinyām ucchritāḥ parama dhvajāḥ
vyadīpayan te pṛtanām yuga anta āditya saṃnibhāḥ

original: 07,080.029a daśamas tv arjunasyāsīd eka eva mahākapiḥ
analyzed: daśamaḥ tu arjunasya āsīt ekaḥ eva mahā kapiḥ
adīpyata arjunaḥ yena himavān iva vahninā
tatas citrāṇi śubhrāṇi su mahānti mahā rathāḥ
kārmukāṇi ādaduḥ tūrṇam arjuna arthe paraṃtapāḥ
tathā eva dhanuḥ āyacchat pārthaḥ śatru vināśanaḥ

original: 07,080.031c gāṇḍīvaṃ divyakarmā tad rājan durmantrite tava
analyzed: gāṇḍīvam divya karmā tat rājan durmantrite tava

original: 07,080.032a tavāparādhād dhi narā nihatā bahudhā yudhi
analyzed: tava aparādhāt hi narāḥ nihatāḥ bahudhā yudhi
nānā digbhyaḥ samāhūtāḥ sa hayāḥ sa ratha dvipāḥ
teṣām āsīt vyatikṣepaḥ garjatām itaretaram
duryodhana mukhānām ca pāṇḍūnām ṛṣabhasya ca
tatra adbhutam param cakre kaunteyaḥ kṛṣṇasārathiḥ

original: 07,080.034c yad eko bahubhiḥ sārdhaṃ samāgacchad abhītavat
analyzed: yat ekaḥ bahubhiḥ sārdham samāgacchat a bhīta vat
aśobhata mahā bāhuḥ gāṇḍīvam vikṣipan dhanuḥ

original: 07,080.035c jigīṣus tān naravyāghrāñ jighāṃsuś ca jayadratham
analyzed: jigīṣuḥ tān nara vyāghrām jighāṃsuḥ ca jayadratham
tatra arjunaḥ mahā rāja śaraiḥ muktaiḥ sahasraśas
adṛśyān akarot yodhān tāvakām śatru tāpanaḥ

original: 07,080.037a tatas te 'pi naravyāghrāḥ pārthaṃ sarve mahārathāḥ
analyzed: tatas te nara vyāghrāḥ pārtham sarve mahā rathāḥ
adṛśyam samare cakruḥ sāyaka oghaiḥ samantataḥ
saṃvṛte nara siṃhaiḥ taiḥ kurūṇām ṛṣabhe rjune

original: 07,080.038c mahān āsīt samuddhūtas tasya sainyasya nisvanaḥ
analyzed: mahān āsīt samuddhūtaḥ tasya sainyasya nisvanaḥ
dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ uvāca
arjune saindhavam prāpte bhāradvājena saṃvṛtāḥ

original: 07,081.001c pāñcālāḥ kurubhiḥ sārdhaṃ kim akurvata saṃjaya
analyzed: pāñcālāḥ kurubhiḥ sārdham kim akurvata saṃjaya
saṃjayaḥ uvāca
aparāhṇe mahā rāja saṃgrāme loma harṣaṇe

original: 07,081.002c pāñcālānāṃ kurūṇāṃ ca droṇe dyūtam avartata
analyzed: pāñcālānām kurūṇām ca droṇe dyūtam avartata
pāñcālāḥ hi jighāṃsantaḥ droṇam saṃhṛṣṭa cetasaḥ
abhyavarṣanta garjantaḥ śara varṣāṇi māriṣa
tatas su tumulaḥ teṣām saṃgrāmaḥ vartata adbhutaḥ
pāñcālānām kurūṇām ca ghoraḥ devāsura upamaḥ

original: 07,081.005a sarve droṇarathaṃ prāpya pāñcālāḥ paṇḍavaiḥ saha
analyzed: sarve droṇa ratham prāpya pāñcālāḥ paṇḍavaiḥ saha
tat anīkam bibhitsantaḥ mahā astrāṇi vyadarśayan
droṇasya ratha paryantam rathinaḥ ratham āsthitāḥ
kampayantaḥ bhyavartanta vegam āsthāya madhyamam
tam abhyagāt bṛhatkṣatraḥ kekayānām mahā rathaḥ
pravapan niśitān bāṇān mahā indra aśani saṃnibhān

original: 07,081.008a taṃ tu pratyudiyāc chīghraṃ kṣemadhūrtir mahāyaśāḥ
analyzed: tam tu pratyudiyāt śīghram kṣemadhūrtiḥ mahā yaśāḥ
vimuñcan niśitān sahasraśas
dhṛṣṭaketuḥ ca cedīnām
tvaritaḥ bhyadravat droṇam mahā indraḥ iva śambaram
tam āpatantam sahasā vyādita āsyam iva antakam
vīradhanvā mahā iṣvāsaḥ tvaramāṇaḥ samabhyayāt
yudhiṣṭhiram mahā rāja jigīṣum samavasthitam
saha anīkam tatas droṇaḥ nyavārayata vīryavān
nakulam kuśalam yuddhe parākrāntam parākramī

original: 07,081.012c abhyagacchat samāyāntaṃ vikarṇas te sutaḥ prabho
analyzed: abhyagacchat samāyāntam vikarṇaḥ te sutaḥ prabho
sahadevam tathā āyāntam durmukhaḥ śatru karśanaḥ
śaraiḥ aneka sāhasraiḥ samavākirat āśugaiḥ

original: 07,081.014a sātyakiṃ tu naravyāghraṃ vyāghradattas tv avārayat
analyzed: sātyakim tu nara vyāghram vyāghradattaḥ tu avārayat

original: 07,081.014c śaraiḥ suniśitais tīkṣṇaiḥ kampayan vai muhur muhuḥ
analyzed: śaraiḥ su niśitaiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ kampayan vai muhur muhur
draupadeyān nara vyāghrān muñcataḥ sāyaka uttamān
saṃrabdhān rathinām śreṣṭhān saumadattiḥ avārayat
bhīmasenam tathā kruddham bhīma rūpaḥ bhayānakam
pratyavārayat āyāntam ārṣyaśṛṅgiḥ mahā rathaḥ
tayoḥ samabhavat yuddham nara rākṣasayoḥ mṛdhe

original: 07,081.017c yādṛg eva purā vṛttaṃ rāmarāvaṇayor nṛpa
analyzed: yādṛś eva purā vṛttam rāma rāvaṇayoḥ nṛpa
tatas yudhiṣṭhiraḥ droṇam navatyā nata parvaṇām
ājaghne bharata śreṣṭha sarva marmasu bhārata
tam droṇaḥ pañcaviṃśatyā nijaghāna stanāntare
roṣitaḥ bharata śreṣṭha kaunteyena yaśasvinā

original: 07,081.020a bhūya eva tu viṃśatyā sāyakānāṃ samācinot
analyzed: bhūyas eva tu viṃśatyā sāyakānām samācinot
adṛśyam samare cakre rājānam sāyaka uttamaiḥ
sa aśva sūta dhvajam droṇaḥ paśyatām sarva dhanvinām

original: 07,081.021a tāñ śarān droṇamuktāṃs tu śaravarṣeṇa pāṇḍavaḥ
analyzed: tām śarān droṇa muktān tu śara varṣeṇa pāṇḍavaḥ
avārayata dharma ātmā darśayan pāṇi lāghavam

original: 07,081.022a tato droṇo bhṛśaṃ kruddho dharmarājasya saṃyuge
analyzed: tatas droṇaḥ bhṛśam kruddhaḥ dharmarājasya saṃyuge

original: 07,081.022c ciccheda sahasā dhanvī dhanus tasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: ciccheda sahasā dhanvī dhanuḥ tasya mahātmanaḥ
athā enam chinna dhanvānam tvaramāṇaḥ mahā rathaḥ
śaraiḥ aneka sāhasraiḥ purayām āsa sarvatas
adṛśyam dṛśya rājānam bhāradvājasya sāyakaiḥ
sarva bhūtāni amanyanta hatam eva yudhiṣṭhiram

original: 07,081.025a ke cic cainam amanyanta tathā vai vimukhīkṛtam
analyzed: ke cit ca enam amanyanta tathā vai vimukhīkṛtam
hṛtaḥ rājā iti rāja indra brāhmaṇena yaśasvinā

original: 07,081.026a sa kṛcchraṃ paramaṃ prāpto dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
analyzed: sa kṛcchram paramam prāptaḥ dharmarājaḥ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

original: 07,081.026c tyaktvā tat kārmukaṃ chinnaṃ bhāradvājena saṃyuge
analyzed: tyaktvā tat kārmukam chinnam bhāradvājena saṃyuge
ādade dhanuḥ divyam bhāra ghnam vegavattaram

original: 07,081.027a tatas tān sāyakān sarvān droṇamuktān sahasraśaḥ
analyzed: tatas tān sāyakān sarvān droṇa muktān sahasraśas

original: 07,081.027c ciccheda samare vīras tad adbhutam ivābhavat
analyzed: ciccheda samare vīraḥ tat adbhutam iva abhavat

original: 07,081.028a chittvā ca tāñ śarān rājā krodhasaṃraktalocanaḥ
analyzed: chittvā ca tām śarān rājā krodha saṃrakta locanaḥ

original: 07,081.028c śaktiṃ jagrāha samare girīṇām api dāraṇīm
analyzed: śaktim jagrāha samare girīṇām api dāraṇīm
svarṇa daṇḍām mahā ghorām aṣṭa ghaṇṭām bhaya āvahām

original: 07,081.029a samutkṣipya ca tāṃ hṛṣṭo nanāda balavad balī
analyzed: samutkṣipya ca tām hṛṣṭaḥ nanāda balavat balī
nādena sarva bhūtāni trāsayan iva bhārata
śaktim samudyatām dṛṣṭvā dharmarājena saṃyuge
svasti droṇāya sahasā sarva bhūtāni atha abruvan
sā rāja bhuja nirmuktā nirmukta uraga saṃnibhā

original: 07,081.031c prajvālayantī gaganaṃ diśaś ca vidiśas tathā
analyzed: prajvālayantī gaganam diśaḥ ca vidiśaḥ tathā
droṇa antikam anuprāptā dīpta āsyā pannagī yathā
kālarātriḥ iva bhārataiḥ
kanyā iva uraga rājasya

original: 07,081.032a tām āpatantīṃ sahasā prekṣya droṇo viśāṃ pate
analyzed: tām āpatantīm sahasā prekṣya droṇaḥ viśām pate

original: 07,081.032c prāduścakre tato brāhmam astram astravidāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: prāduścakre tatas brāhmam astram astra vidām varaḥ

original: 07,081.033a tad astraṃ bhasmasāt kṛtvā tāṃ śaktiṃ ghoradarśanām
analyzed: tat astram bhasmasāt kṛtvā tām śaktim ghora darśanām
jagāma syandanam tūrṇam pāṇḍavasya yaśasvinaḥ

original: 07,081.034a tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā droṇāstraṃ tat samudyatam
analyzed: tatas yudhiṣṭhiraḥ rājā droṇa astram tat samudyatam
aśāmayat mahā prājñaḥ brahmāstreṇa eva bhārata

original: 07,081.035a vivyādha ca raṇe droṇaṃ pañcabhir nataparvabhiḥ
analyzed: vivyādha ca raṇe droṇam pañcabhiḥ nata parvabhiḥ

original: 07,081.035c kṣurapreṇa ca tīkṣṇena cicchedāsya mahad dhanuḥ
analyzed: kṣurapreṇa ca tīkṣṇena ciccheda asya mahat dhanuḥ

original: 07,081.036a tad apāsya dhanuś chinnaṃ droṇaḥ kṣatriyamardanaḥ
analyzed: tat apāsya dhanuḥ chinnam droṇaḥ kṣatriya mardanaḥ
gadām cikṣepa sahasā dharmaputrāya māriṣa

original: 07,081.037a tām āpatantīṃ sahasā gadāṃ dṛṣṭvā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
analyzed: tām āpatantīm sahasā gadām dṛṣṭvā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

original: 07,081.037c gadām evāgrahīt kruddhaś cikṣepa ca paraṃtapaḥ
analyzed: gadām eva agrahīt kruddhaḥ cikṣepa ca paraṃtapaḥ

original: 07,081.038a te gade sahasā mukte samāsādya parasparam
analyzed: te gade sahasā mukte samāsādya parasparam
saṃgharṣāt pāvakam muktvā sameyātām mahī tale

original: 07,081.039a tato droṇo bhṛśaṃ kruddho dharmarājasya māriṣa
analyzed: tatas droṇaḥ bhṛśam kruddhaḥ dharmarājasya māriṣa

original: 07,081.039c caturbhir niśitais tīkṣṇair hayāñ jaghne śarottamaiḥ
analyzed: caturbhiḥ niśitaiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ hayām jaghne śara uttamaiḥ
dhanuḥ ca ekena bāṇena ciccheda indra dhvaja upamam

original: 07,081.040c ketum ekena ciccheda pāṇḍavaṃ cārdayat tribhiḥ
analyzed: ketum ekena ciccheda pāṇḍavam ca ārdayat tribhiḥ

original: 07,081.041a hatāśvāt tu rathāt tūrṇam avaplutya yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
analyzed: hata aśvāt tu rathāt tūrṇam avaplutya yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
tasthau ūrdhva bhujaḥ rājā vyāyudhaḥ bharata ṛṣabha

original: 07,081.042a virathaṃ taṃ samālokya vyāyudhaṃ ca viśeṣataḥ
analyzed: viratham tam samālokya vyāyudham ca viśeṣataḥ
droṇaḥ vyamohayat śatrūn sarva sainyāni ca abhibho
muñcan iṣu gaṇān tīkṣṇān laghu hastaḥ dṛḍha vrataḥ
abhidudrāva rājānam siṃhaḥ mṛgam iva ulbaṇaḥ
tam abhidrutam ālokya droṇena amitra ghātinā

original: 07,081.044c hā heti sahasā śabdaḥ pāṇḍūnāṃ samajāyata
analyzed: hā hā iti sahasā śabdaḥ pāṇḍūnām samajāyata

original: 07,081.045a hṛto rājā hṛto rājā bhāradvājena māriṣa
analyzed: hṛtaḥ rājā hṛtaḥ rājā bhāradvājena māriṣa

original: 07,081.045c ity āsīt sumahāñ śabdaḥ pāṇḍusainyasya sarvataḥ
analyzed: iti āsīt su mahān śabdaḥ pāṇḍu sainyasya sarvatas
tatas tvaritam āruhya sahadeva ratham nṛpaḥ
apāyāt javanaiḥ aśvaiḥ kuntī putraḥ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
saṃjayaḥ uvāca
bṛhatkṣatram atha āyāntam kekayam dṛḍha vikramam
kṣemadhūrtiḥ mahā rāja vivyādha urasi mārgaṇaiḥ

original: 07,082.002a bṛhatkṣatras tu taṃ rājā navatyā nataparvaṇām
analyzed: bṛhatkṣatraḥ tu tam rājā navatyā nata parvaṇām
ājaghne tvaritaḥ yuddhe droṇa anīka bibhitsayā
kṣemadhūrtiḥ tu saṃkruddhaḥ kekayasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 07,082.003c dhanuś ciccheda bhallena pītena niśitena ca
analyzed: dhanuḥ ciccheda bhallena pītena niśitena ca
athā enam chinna dhanvānam śareṇa nata parvaṇā
vivyādha hṛdaye tūrṇam pravaram sarva dhanvinām

original: 07,082.005a athānyad dhanur ādāya bṛhatkṣatro hasann iva
analyzed: atha anyat dhanuḥ ādāya bṛhatkṣatraḥ hasan iva
vyaśva sūta dhvajam cakre kṣemadhūrtim mahā ratham
tatas pareṇa bhallena pītena niśitena ca
jahāra nṛpateḥ kāyāt śiraḥ jvalita kuṇḍalam

original: 07,082.007a tac chinnaṃ sahasā tasya śiraḥ kuñcitamūrdhajam
analyzed: tat chinnam sahasā tasya śiraḥ kuñcita mūrdhajam

original: 07,082.007c sakirīṭaṃ mahīṃ prāpya babhau jyotir ivāmbarāt
analyzed: sa kirīṭam mahīm prāpya babhau jyotiḥ iva ambarāt

original: 07,082.008a taṃ nihatya raṇe hṛṣṭo bṛhatkṣatro mahārathaḥ
analyzed: tam nihatya raṇe hṛṣṭaḥ bṛhatkṣatraḥ mahā rathaḥ
sahasā abhyapatat sainyam tāvakam pārtha kāraṇāt
dhṛṣṭaketum atha āyāntam droṇa hetoḥ parākramī
vīradhanvā mahā iṣvāsaḥ vārayām āsa bhārata
tau parasparam āsādya śara daṃṣṭrau tarasvinau
śaraiḥ aneka sāhasraiḥ anyonyam abhijaghnatuḥ
tau ubhau nara śārdūlau yuyudhāte parasparam
mahā vane tīvra madau vāraṇau iva yūthapau
giri gahvaram āsādya śārdūlau iva roṣitau
yuyudhāte mahā vīryau paraspara jighāṃsayā
tau ubhau nara śārdūlau pīḍayantau parasparam

original: 07,082.013a tad yuddham āsīt tumulaṃ prekṣaṇīyaṃ viśāṃ pate
analyzed: tat yuddham āsīt tumulam prekṣaṇīyam viśām pate
siddha cāraṇa saṃghānām vismaya adbhuta darśanam
vīradhanvā tatas kruddhaḥ dhṛṣṭaketoḥ śarāsanam

original: 07,082.014c dvidhā ciccheda bhallena prahasann iva bhārata
analyzed: dvidhā ciccheda bhallena prahasan iva bhārata

original: 07,082.015a tad utsṛjya dhanuś chinnaṃ cedirājo mahārathaḥ
analyzed: tat utsṛjya dhanuḥ chinnam cedi rājaḥ mahā rathaḥ
śaktim jagrāha vipulām rukma daṇḍām ayasmayīm

original: 07,082.016a tāṃ tu śaktiṃ mahāvīryāṃ dorbhyām āyamya bhārata
analyzed: tām tu śaktim mahā vīryām dorbhyām āyamya bhārata
cikṣepa sahasā yattaḥ vīradhanva ratham prati

karṇaḥ pi rathinām śreṣṭhaḥ bhīmasenena kampitaḥ
khaḍga carma dharaḥ rājan bhīmam abhyadravat balī

original: 07,104.033d@011_0010 bhīmaś ciccheda khaḍgaṃ ca carmaṇā saha māriṣa
analyzed: bhīmaḥ ciccheda khaḍgam ca carmaṇā saha māriṣa

original: 07,104.033d@011_0011 dṛṣṭvā karṇaṃ ca pārthena bādhitaṃ bahubhiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā karṇam ca pārthena bādhitam bahubhiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 07,104.033d@011_0013 karṇaṃ kṛcchragataṃ paśya śīghraṃ yānaṃ prayaccha ha
analyzed: karṇam kṛcchra gatam paśya śīghram yānam prayaccha ha

original: 07,104.033d@011_0014 evam uktas tato rājā duḥśalaḥ samupādravat
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tatas rājā duḥśalaḥ samupādravat
duḥśalasya ratham karṇaḥ ca āruroha mahā rathaḥ

original: 07,104.033d@011_0016 tau pārthaḥ sahasā gatvā vivyādha daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: tau pārthaḥ sahasā gatvā vivyādha daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 07,104.033d@011_0017 punaś ca karṇaṃ viddhvāpi duḥśalasya śiro 'harat
analyzed: punar ca karṇam viddhvā api duḥśalasya śiraḥ harat
duḥśalam nihatam dṛṣṭvā bhīmasenena māriṣa

original: 07,104.033d@011_0019 tasyaiva dhanur ādāya karṇo vivyādha pāṇḍavam
analyzed: tasya eva dhanuḥ ādāya karṇaḥ vivyādha pāṇḍavam
anyonyam samare vīrau yuyudhāte mahā balau
śatrughnau śatru madhye tu bala vajra bhṛtau iva

original: 07,104.033d@011_0022 bhīmo viddhvā hayāṃś caiva sārathiṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: bhīmaḥ viddhvā hayān ca eva sārathim ca punar punar

original: 07,104.033d@011_0023 karṇam abhyadravat pārthaḥ prahasaṃś ca mahābalaḥ
analyzed: karṇam abhyadravat pārthaḥ prahasan ca mahā balaḥ
tatas vyāyacchamānasya bhīmasenasya saṃyuge

original: 07,104.033d@011_0025 tat sainyaṃ śakalībhūtaṃ na prājñāyata kiṃ cana
analyzed: tat sainyam śakalībhūtam na prājñāyata kim cana
saṃjayaḥ uvāca
tasmin vilulite sainye saindhavāya arjune gate

original: 07,105.001c sātvate bhīmasene ca putras te droṇam abhyayāt
analyzed: sātvate bhīmasene ca putraḥ te droṇam abhyayāt
tvaran eka rathena eva bahu kṛtyam vicintayan

original: 07,105.002a sa rathas tava putrasya tvarayā parayā yutaḥ
analyzed: sa rathaḥ tava putrasya tvarayā parayā yutaḥ
tūrṇam abhyapatat droṇam manaḥ māruta vegavān

original: 07,105.002d*0810_01 iha dṛṣṭa ito naṣṭaḥ sarathaḥ prādravan nṛpaḥ
analyzed: iha dṛṣṭaḥ itas naṣṭaḥ sa rathaḥ prādravat nṛpaḥ

original: 07,105.002d*0810_02 muhūrtād iva putras te droṇam āsādya māriṣa
analyzed: muhūrtāt iva putraḥ te droṇam āsādya māriṣa

original: 07,105.003a uvāca cainaṃ putras te saṃrambhād raktalocanaḥ
analyzed: uvāca ca enam putraḥ te saṃrambhāt rakta locanaḥ
sa saṃrambham idam vākyam abravīt kuru nandanaḥ
arjunaḥ bhīmasenaḥ ca sātyakiḥ ca aparājitaḥ
vijitya sarva sainyāni su mahānti mahā rathāḥ

original: 07,105.004b*0812_01 atikramya ca hatvā ca sainyāni sumahānti ca
analyzed: atikramya ca hatvā ca sainyāni su mahānti ca
saṃprāptāḥ sindhurājasya samīpam ari karśanāḥ
vyāyacchanti ca tatra api sarve eva aparājitāḥ

original: 07,105.005a yadi tāvad raṇe pārtho vyatikrānto mahārathaḥ
analyzed: yadi tāvat raṇe pārthaḥ vyatikrāntaḥ mahā rathaḥ
katham sātyaki bhīmābhyām vyatikrāntaḥ si mānada
āścarya bhūtam loke smin samudrasya iva śoṣaṇam
nirjayam tava vipra agrya sātvatena arjunena ca
tathā eva bhīmasenena lokaḥ saṃvadate bhṛśam

original: 07,105.007c kathaṃ droṇo jitaḥ saṃkhye dhanurvedasya pāragaḥ
analyzed: katham droṇaḥ jitaḥ saṃkhye dhanurvedasya pāragaḥ

original: 07,105.007d*0813_01 ity evaṃ bruvate yodhā aśraddheyam idaṃ tava
analyzed: iti evam bruvate yodhāḥ aśraddheyam idam tava

original: 07,105.008a nāśa eva tu me nūnaṃ mandabhāgyasya saṃyuge
analyzed: nāśaḥ eva tu me nūnam mandabhāgyasya saṃyuge

original: 07,105.008c yatra tvāṃ puruṣavyāghram atikrāntās trayo rathāḥ
analyzed: yatra tvām puruṣa vyāghram atikrāntāḥ trayaḥ rathāḥ

original: 07,105.009a evaṃ gate tu kṛtye 'smin brūhi yat te vivakṣitam
analyzed: evam gate tu kṛtye smin brūhi yat te vivakṣitam

original: 07,105.009c yad gataṃ gatam eveha śeṣaṃ cintaya mānada
analyzed: yat gatam gatam evā iha śeṣam cintaya mānada

original: 07,105.010c tad bravītu bhavān kṣipraṃ sādhu tat saṃvidhīyatām
analyzed: tat bravītu bhavān kṣipram sādhu tat saṃvidhīyatām
droṇaḥ uvāca

original: 07,105.011a cintyaṃ bahu mahārāja kṛtyaṃ yat tatra me śṛṇu
analyzed: cintyam bahu mahā rāja kṛtyam yat tatra me śṛṇu
trayaḥ hi samatikrāntāḥ pāṇḍavānām mahā rathāḥ

original: 07,105.011e yāvad eva bhayaṃ paścāt tāvad eṣāṃ puraḥsaram
analyzed: yāvat eva bhayam paścāt tāvat eṣām puraḥsaram
tat garīyastaram manye yatra kṛṣṇa dhanaṃjayau

original: 07,105.012c sā purastāc ca paścāc ca gṛhītā bhāratī camūḥ
analyzed: sā purastāt ca paścāt ca gṛhītā bhāratī camūḥ
tatra kṛtyam aham manye saindhavasya abhirakṣaṇam

original: 07,105.013c sa no rakṣyatamas tāta kruddhād bhīto dhanaṃjayāt
analyzed: sa naḥ rakṣyatamaḥ tāta kruddhāt bhītaḥ dhanaṃjayāt
gatau hi saindhavam vīrau yuyudhāna vṛkodarau

original: 07,105.014c saṃprāptaṃ tad idaṃ dyūtaṃ yat tac chakunibuddhijam
analyzed: saṃprāptam tat idam dyūtam yat tat śakuni buddhi jam

original: 07,105.015a na sabhāyāṃ jayo vṛtto nāpi tatra parājayaḥ
analyzed: na sabhāyām jayaḥ vṛttaḥ na api tatra parājayaḥ

original: 07,105.015c iha no glahamānānām adya tāta jayājayau
analyzed: iha naḥ glahamānānām adya tāta jaya ajayau

original: 07,105.016a yān sma tān glahate ghorāñ śakuniḥ kurusaṃsadi
analyzed: yān sma tān glahate ghorām śakuniḥ kuru saṃsadi

original: 07,105.016c akṣān saṃmanyamānaḥ sa prā kśarās te durāsadāḥ
analyzed: akṣān saṃmanyamānaḥ sa pra kśarāḥ te durāsadāḥ

original: 07,105.016d*0814_01 na te 'kṣā niśitā ghorāḥ śarā yuṣmat tanucchadaḥ
analyzed: na te kṣā niśitāḥ ghorāḥ śarāḥ yuṣmat tanucchadaḥ

original: 07,105.017a yatra te bahavas tāta kuravaḥ paryavasthitāḥ
analyzed: yatra te bahavaḥ tāta kuravaḥ paryavasthitāḥ

original: 07,105.017c senāṃ durodaraṃ viddhi śarān akṣān viśāṃ pate
analyzed: senām durodaram viddhi śarān akṣān viśām pate

original: 07,105.018a glahaṃ ca saindhavaṃ rājann atra dyūtasya niścayaḥ
analyzed: glaham ca saindhavam rājan atra dyūtasya niścayaḥ

original: 07,105.018c saindhave hi mahādyūtaṃ samāsaktaṃ paraiḥ saha
analyzed: saindhave hi mahā dyūtam samāsaktam paraiḥ saha

original: 07,105.018d*0815_01 atra te dhruvam āyatto jayo vājaya eva vā
analyzed: atra te dhruvam āyattaḥ jayaḥ vā ajayaḥ eva vā

original: 07,105.019a atra sarve mahārāja tyaktvā jīvitam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: atra sarve mahā rāja tyaktvā jīvitam ātmanaḥ

original: 07,105.019c saindhavasya raṇe rakṣāṃ vidhivat kartum arhatha
analyzed: saindhavasya raṇe rakṣām vidhivat kartum arhatha

original: 07,105.019e tatra no glahamānānāṃ dhruvau tāta jayājayau
analyzed: tatra naḥ glahamānānām dhruvau tāta jaya ajayau

original: 07,105.020a yatra te parameṣvāsā yattā rakṣanti saindhavam
analyzed: yatra te parama iṣvāsāḥ yattāḥ rakṣanti saindhavam

original: 07,105.020c tatra yāhi svayaṃ śīghraṃ tāṃś ca rakṣasva rakṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: tatra yāhi svayam śīghram tān ca rakṣasva rakṣiṇaḥ

original: 07,105.021a ihaiva tv aham āsiṣye preṣayiṣyāmi cāparān
analyzed: iha eva tu aham āsiṣye preṣayiṣyāmi ca aparān
nirotsyāmi ca pāñcālān sahitān pāṇḍu sṛñjayaiḥ
tatas duryodhanaḥ prāyāt tūrṇam ācārya śāsanāt
udyamya ātmānam ugrāya karmaṇe sa padānugaḥ
cakrarakṣau tu pāñcālyau yudhāmanyu uttamaujasau
bāhyena senām abhyetya jagmatuḥ savyasācinam

original: 07,105.024a tau hi pūrvaṃ mahārāja vāritau kṛtavarmaṇā
analyzed: tau hi pūrvam mahā rāja vāritau kṛtavarmaṇā

original: 07,105.024c praviṣṭe tv arjune rājaṃs tava sainyaṃ yuyutsayā
analyzed: praviṣṭe tu arjune rājan tava sainyam yuyutsayā

original: 07,105.024d*0816_01 pārśvena senām āyāntau kururājo dadarśa ha
analyzed: pārśvena senām āyāntau kuru rājaḥ dadarśa ha

original: 07,105.024d*0817_01 pārśve bhittvā camūṃ vīrau praviṣṭau tava vāhinīm

original: 07,105.025a tābhyāṃ duryodhanaḥ sārdham agacchad yuddham uttamam
analyzed: tābhyām duryodhanaḥ sārdham agacchat yuddham uttamam
tvaritaḥ tvaramāṇābhyām bhrātṛbhyām bhārataḥ balī
tau abhidravatām enam ubhau udyata kārmukau
mahā ratha samākhyātau kṣatriya pravarau yudhi
tam avidhyat yudhāmanyuḥ triṃśatā kaṅka patribhiḥ

original: 07,105.026d*0818_02 viṃśatyā sārathiṃ cāsya caturbhiś caturo hayān
analyzed: viṃśatyā sārathim ca asya caturbhiḥ caturaḥ hayān
duryodhanaḥ yudhāmanyoḥ dhvajam eka iṣuṇā ācchinat
iṣudhī kārmukam ca asya samakṛntat ratha uttame

original: 07,105.026d*0818_06 tato 'vidhyac charais tīkṣṇaiś caturbhiś caturo hayān
analyzed: tatas vidhyat śaraiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ caturbhiḥ caturaḥ hayān

original: 07,105.026d*0819_01 yudhāmanyuś ca pāñcālya uttamaujās tathaiva ca
analyzed: yudhāmanyuḥ ca pāñcālyaḥ uttamaujāḥ tathā eva ca

original: 07,105.026d*0819_02 bhittvā pārśvena sainyaṃ tu praviṣṭau phalgunaṃ prati
analyzed: bhittvā pārśvena sainyam tu praviṣṭau phalgunam prati

original: 07,105.026d*0819_05 tau taṃ suniśitair bāṇair avidhyetāṃ mahārathau
analyzed: tau tam su niśitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ avidhyetām mahā rathau

original: 07,105.026d*0819_06 uttamaujās tu bhallena cāpaṃ ciccheda vīryavān

atha anyat su mahā tejāḥ dhanuḥ gṛhya mahā balaḥ

original: 07,105.027a yudhāmanyus tu saṃkruddhaḥ śarāṃs triṃśatam āyasān
analyzed: yudhāmanyuḥ tu saṃkruddhaḥ śarān triṃśatam āyasān
vyasṛjat tava putrasya tvaramāṇaḥ stanāntare
tathā uttamaujāḥ saṃkruddhaḥ śaraiḥ hema vibhūṣitaiḥ
avidhyat sārathim ca asya prāhiṇot yama sādanam

original: 07,105.028c jaghāna caturaś cāśvān ubhau ca pārṣṇisārathī
analyzed: jaghāna caturaḥ ca aśvān ubhau ca pārṣṇisārathī

original: 07,105.029a uttamaujā hatāśvas tu hatasūtaś ca saṃyuge
analyzed: uttamaujāḥ hata aśvaḥ tu hata sūtaḥ ca saṃyuge

original: 07,105.030a sa rathaṃ prāpya taṃ bhrātur duryodhanahayāñ śaraiḥ
analyzed: sa ratham prāpya tam bhrātuḥ duryodhana hayām śaraiḥ

original: 07,105.030c bahubhis tāḍayām āsa te hatāḥ prāpatan bhuvi
analyzed: bahubhiḥ tāḍayām āsa te hatāḥ prāpatan bhuvi

original: 07,105.031c yudhāmanyur dhanuḥ śīghraṃ śarāvāpaṃ ca saṃyuge
analyzed: yudhāmanyuḥ dhanuḥ śīghram śarāvāpam ca saṃyuge
hata aśva sūtāt sa rathāt avaplutya mahā rathaḥ

original: 07,105.032c gadām ādāya te putraḥ pāñcālyāv abhyadhāvata
analyzed: gadām ādāya te putraḥ pāñcālyau abhyadhāvata
tam āpatantam saṃprekṣya kruddham parapuraṃjayam
avaplutau rathopasthāt yudhāmanyu uttamaujasau

original: 07,105.034a tataḥ sa hemacitraṃ taṃ syandanapravaraṃ gadī
analyzed: tatas sa hema citram tam syandana pravaram gadī

original: 07,105.034d*0822_01 etad īdṛśakaṃ kārṣīt putras tava janādhipa
analyzed: etat īdṛśakam kārṣīt putraḥ tava janādhipa

original: 07,105.035a hatvā cainaṃ sa putras te hatāśvo hatasārathiḥ
analyzed: hatvā ca enam sa putraḥ te hata aśvaḥ hata sārathiḥ
madra rāja ratham tūrṇam āruroha paraṃtapaḥ

original: 07,105.036a pāñcālānāṃ tu mukhyau tau rājaputrau mahābalau
analyzed: pāñcālānām tu mukhyau tau rāja putrau mahā balau
ratham anyam samāruhya dhanaṃjayam abhīyatuḥ
saṃjayaḥ uvāca
vartamāne mahā rāja saṃgrāme loma harṣaṇe
vyākuleṣu ca sainyeṣu pīḍyamāneṣu sarvaśas
rādheyaḥ bhīmam ānarcchat yuddhāya bharata ṛṣabha

original: 07,106.000*0823_04 yathā nāgo vane nāgaṃ matto mattam abhidravat
analyzed: yathā nāgaḥ vane nāgam mattaḥ mattam abhidravat
dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ uvāca

original: 07,106.001a yau tau karṇaś ca bhīmaś ca saṃprayuddhau mahābalau
analyzed: yau tau karṇaḥ ca bhīmaḥ ca saṃprayuddhau mahā balau
arjunasya ratha upānte kīdṛśaḥ saḥ bhavat raṇaḥ

original: 07,106.002a pūrvaṃ hi nirjitaḥ karṇo bhīmasenena saṃyuge
analyzed: pūrvam hi nirjitaḥ karṇaḥ bhīmasenena saṃyuge

original: 07,106.002c kathaṃ bhūyas tu rādheyo bhīmam āgān mahārathaḥ
analyzed: katham bhūyas tu rādheyaḥ bhīmam āgāt mahā rathaḥ

original: 07,106.003a bhīmo vā sūtatanayaṃ pratyudyātaḥ kathaṃ raṇe
analyzed: bhīmaḥ vā sūta tanayam pratyudyātaḥ katham raṇe
mahā ratha samākhyātam pṛthivyām pravaram ratham
bhīṣma droṇau atikramya dharmaputraḥ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

original: 07,106.004c nānyato bhayam ādatta vinā karṇaṃ dhanurdharam
analyzed: na anyatas bhayam ādatta vinā karṇam dhanuḥ dharam

original: 07,106.005a bhayān na śete satataṃ cintayan vai mahāratham
analyzed: bhayāt na śete satatam cintayan vai mahā ratham

original: 07,106.005b*0824_01 bhayād yasya mahābāhor na śete bahulāḥ samāḥ
analyzed: bhayāt yasya mahā bāhoḥ na śete bahulāḥ samāḥ
cintayan nityaśas vīryam rādheyasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 07,106.005c taṃ kathaṃ sūtaputraṃ hi bhīmo 'yudhyata saṃyuge
analyzed: tam katham sūtaputram hi bhīmaḥ yudhyata saṃyuge
brahmaṇyam vīrya saṃpannam samareṣu anivartinam

original: 07,106.006c kathaṃ karṇaṃ yudhāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ bhīmo 'yudhyata saṃyuge
analyzed: katham karṇam yudhām śreṣṭham bhīmaḥ yudhyata saṃyuge

original: 07,106.007a yau tau samīyatur vīrāv arjunasya rathaṃ prati
analyzed: yau tau samīyatuḥ vīrau arjunasya ratham prati
katham nu tau ayudhyetām sūtaputra vṛkodarau

original: 07,106.008a bhrātṛtvaṃ darśitaṃ pūrvaṃ ghṛṇī cāpi sa sūtajaḥ
analyzed: bhrātṛ tvam darśitam pūrvam ghṛṇī ca api sa sūtajaḥ

original: 07,106.008c kathaṃ bhīmena yuyudhe kuntyā vākyam anusmaran
analyzed: katham bhīmena yuyudhe kuntyāḥ vākyam anusmaran

original: 07,106.009a bhīmo vā sūtaputreṇa smaran vairaṃ purā kṛtam
analyzed: bhīmaḥ vā sūtaputreṇa smaran vairam purā kṛtam

original: 07,106.009c so 'yudhyata kathaṃ vīraḥ karṇena saha saṃyuge
analyzed: saḥ yudhyata katham vīraḥ karṇena saha saṃyuge

original: 07,106.010a āśāste ca sadā sūta putro duryodhano mama
analyzed: āśāste ca sadā sūta putraḥ duryodhanaḥ mama

original: 07,106.010c karṇo jeṣyati saṃgrāme sahitān pāṇḍavān iti
analyzed: karṇaḥ jeṣyati saṃgrāme sahitān pāṇḍavān iti

original: 07,106.011a jayāśā yatra mandasya putrasya mama saṃyuge
analyzed: jaya āśā yatra mandasya putrasya mama saṃyuge

original: 07,106.012a yaṃ samāśritya putrair me kṛtaṃ vairaṃ mahārathaiḥ
analyzed: yam samāśritya putraiḥ me kṛtam vairam mahā rathaiḥ

original: 07,106.012c taṃ sūtatanayaṃ tāta kathaṃ bhīmo hy ayodhayat
analyzed: tam sūta tanayam tāta katham bhīmaḥ hi ayodhayat
anekān viprakārān ca sūtaputra samudbhavān
smaramāṇaḥ katham bhīmaḥ yuyudhe sūtasūnunā
yaḥ jayat pṛthivīm sarvām rathena ekena vīryavān

original: 07,106.014c taṃ sūtatanayaṃ yuddhe kathaṃ bhīmo hy ayodhayat
analyzed: tam sūta tanayam yuddhe katham bhīmaḥ hi ayodhayat

analyzed: tatas sutau te balinau śūrau duṣkarṇa durmadau

original: 07,130.035a tato hāhākṛte sainye dṛṣṭvā bhīmaṃ nṛpābruvan

original: 07,130.036c visaṃjñāvāhayan vāhān na ca dvau saha dhāvataḥ
analyzed: visaṃjñāḥ avāhayan vāhān na ca dvau saha dhāvataḥ
tatas bale bhṛśa lulite niśā mukhe
su pūjitaḥ nṛpa vṛṣabhaiḥ vṛkodaraḥ
yudhiṣṭhiram nṛpatim apūjayat balī
tatas yamau drupada virāṭa kekayā
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ ca api parām mudam yayuḥ
vṛkodaram bhṛśam abhipūjayan ca te
yathā andhake pratinihate haram surāḥ
tatas sutāḥ tava varuṇa ātmaja upamā
ruṣā anvitāḥ saha guruṇā mahātmanā
vṛkodaram sa ratha padāti kuñjarā
yuyutsavaḥ bhṛśam abhiparyavārayan
tatas yamau drupada sutāḥ sa sainikā
yudhiṣṭhira drupada virāṭa sātvatāḥ
ghaṭotkacaḥ jaya vijayau drumau vṛkaḥ
sasṛṃjayāḥ tava tanayān avārayan
tatas bhavat timira ghanaiḥ iva āvṛtam
mahā bhaye bhaya dam atīva dāruṇam
niśā mukhe vaḍa vṛka gṛdhra modanam
mahātmanām nṛpa vara yuddham adbhutam
saṃjayaḥ uvāca

analyzed: prāya upaviṣṭe tu hate putre sātyakinā tatas

original: 07,131.006a śape sātvata putrābhyām iṣṭena sukṛtena ca
analyzed: śape sātvata putrābhyām iṣṭena sukṛtena ca

analyzed: na hanyām niraye ghore pateyam vṛṣṇi pāṃsana

original: 07,131.013a mṛdaṅgaketos tasya tvaṃ tejasā nihataḥ purā

original: 07,131.014e apayāsyasi cet tyaktvā tato mukto bhaviṣyasi

original: 07,131.018a sāgraṃ śatasahasraṃ tu hayānāṃ tasya dhīmataḥ

original: 07,131.019a rakṣyamāṇaś ca balibhiś chādayām āsa sātyakim

dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ bhyayāt kruddhaḥ pragṛhya mahatīm camūm
abhyarakṣat mahā bāhuḥ sātvatam satya vikramam

original: 07,131.021a vivyādha somadattas tu sātvataṃ navabhiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: vivyādha somadattaḥ tu sātvatam navabhiḥ śaraiḥ
sātyakiḥ daśabhiḥ ca enam avadhīt kuru puṃgavam
saḥ tividdhaḥ balavatā samare dṛḍhadhanvanā
rathopastham samāsādya mumoha gata cetanaḥ
tam vimūḍham samālakṣya sārathiḥ tvarayā anvitaḥ
apovāha raṇāt vīram somadattam mahā ratham
tam visaṃjñam samālokya yuyudhāna śara arditam
abhyadhāvat tatas droṇaḥ yadu vīra jighāṃsayā
tam āyāntam abhiprekṣya yudhiṣṭhira purogamāḥ

original: 07,131.024b@020_0004 tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ droṇasya saha pāṇḍavaiḥ

analyzed: rājan aniśam atyantam dṛṣṭvā droṇam śara

analyzed: dahantam ahitān sainye na enam kaḥ cit avārayat

analyzed: saḥ pi tasya vacaḥ śrutvā viśokaḥ vāhayat dhayān

analyzed: tau dṛṣṭvā bhrātarau yattau droṇa anīkam abhidrutau

original: 07,131.024b@020_0043 tato rājann abhūd ghoraḥ saṃgrāmo lomaharṣaṇaḥ

tau dṛṣṭvā puruṣa vyāghrau bhīmasena dhanaṃjayau

original: 07,131.025a tam āpatantaṃ saṃprekṣya śaineyasya rathaṃ prati
analyzed: tam āpatantam saṃprekṣya śaineyasya ratham prati

mahāntam ratham āsthāya triṃśat natvā antarā antaram
vikṣipta yantra saṃnāham mahā megha ogha nisvanam

original: 07,131.026c yuktaṃ gajanibhair vāhair na hayair nāpi vā gajaiḥ
analyzed: yuktam gaja nibhaiḥ vāhaiḥ na hayaiḥ na api vā gajaiḥ
vikṣiptam aṣṭa cakreṇa vivṛta akṣeṇa kūjatā
dhvajena ucchrita tuṇḍena gṛdhra rājena rājatā
lohita ārdra patākam tam antra mālā vibhūṣitam
aṣṭa cakra samāyuktam āsthāya vipulam ratham
śūla mudgara dhāriṇyā śaila pādapa hastayā
rakṣasām ghora rūpāṇām akṣauhiṇyā samāvṛtaḥ
tam udyata mahā cāpam niśāmya vyathitāḥ nṛpāḥ
yugānta kāla samaye daṇḍa hastam iva antakam
tatas tam giri śṛṅga ābham bhīma rūpam bhaya āvaham
daṃṣṭrā karāla ugra mukham śaṅku karṇam mahā hanum
ūrdhva keśam virūpa akṣam dīpta āsyam nimnita udaram
mahā abhra ābha galat vāram kirīṭa channa mūrdhajam
trāsanam sarva bhūtānām vyātta ānanam iva antakam
vīkṣya dīptam iva āyāntam ripu vikṣobha kāriṇam
tam udyata mahā cāpam rākṣasa indram ghaṭotkacam
bhaya arditā pracukṣobha putrasya tava vāhinī
vāyunā kṣobhita āvartā gaṅgā iva ūrdhva taraṅgiṇī

original: 07,131.032c prasusruvur gajā mūtraṃ vivyathuś ca narā bhṛśam

original: 07,131.034c patanty aviralāḥ śūlāḥ śataghnyaḥ paṭṭiśās tathā

original: 07,131.035a tad ugram atiraudraṃ ca dṛṣṭvā yuddhaṃ narādhipāḥ
analyzed: tat ugram ati raudram ca dṛṣṭvā yuddham narādhipāḥ

original: 07,131.035c tanayās tava karṇaś ca vyathitāḥ prādravan diśaḥ
analyzed: tanayāḥ tava karṇaḥ ca vyathitāḥ prādravan diśaḥ
tatra ekaḥ stra bala ślāghī drauṇiḥ mānī na vivyathe

original: 07,131.037a nihatāyāṃ tu māyāyām amarṣī sa ghaṭotkacaḥ
analyzed: nihatāyām tu māyāyām amarṣī sa ghaṭotkacaḥ
visasarja śarān ghorān te śvatthāmānam āviśan
bhujagāḥ iva vegena valmīkam krodha mūrchitāḥ
te śarāḥ rudhira abhyaktāḥ bhittvā śāradvatī sutam
viviśuḥ dharaṇīm śīghrāḥ rukma puṅkhāḥ śilā śitāḥ
aśvatthāmā tu saṃkruddhaḥ laghu hastaḥ pratāpavān
ghaṭotkacam abhikruddham bibheda daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 07,131.039d*1128_01 tato ghaṭotkacaḥ kruddhaś cakraṃ cikṣepa satvaram
analyzed: tatas ghaṭotkacaḥ kruddhaḥ cakram cikṣepa sa tvaram
ghaṭotkacaḥ tividdhaḥ tu droṇaputreṇa marmasu
cakram śata sahasra aram agṛhṇāt vyathitaḥ bhṛśam
kṣura antam bāla sūrya ābham maṇi vajra vibhūṣitam
aśvatthāmnaḥ tu cikṣepa bhaimaseniḥ jighāṃsayā

original: 07,131.042a vegena mahatā gacchad vikṣiptaṃ drauṇinā śaraiḥ

original: 07,137.001a somadattaṃ tu saṃprekṣya vidhunvānaṃ mahad dhanuḥ

original: 07,137.001c sātyakiḥ prāha yantāraṃ somadattāya māṃ vaha

atīva śuśruve rājan gāṇḍīvasya mahā svanaḥ

original: 07,145.045a śrutvā tu rathanirghoṣaṃ gāṇḍīvasya ca nisvanam
analyzed: śrutvā tu ratha nirghoṣam gāṇḍīvasya ca nisvanam
sūtaputraḥ bravīt rājan duryodhanam idam vacaḥ

original: 07,145.046a eṣa sarvāñ śibīn hatvā mukhyaśaś ca nararṣabhān
analyzed: eṣa sarvām śibīn hatvā mukhyaśas ca nara ṛṣabhān
pauravān ca mahā iṣvāsān gāṇḍīva ninadaḥ mahān
vikṣipan uttamam dhanuḥ
pārthaḥ tatra eva niyatam
śrūyate ratha ghoṣaḥ ca vāsavasya iva nardataḥ
karoti pāṇḍavaḥ vyaktam karma aupayikam ātmanaḥ

original: 07,145.048a eṣā vidīryate rājan bahudhā bhāratī camūḥ
analyzed: eṣā vidīryate rājan bahudhā bhāratī camūḥ
viprakīrṇāni anīkāni na avatiṣṭhanti karhi cit
vātena iva samuddhūtam abhra jālam vidīryate

original: 07,145.049c savyasācinam āsādya bhinnā naur iva sāgare
analyzed: savyasācinam āsādya bhinnā nauḥ iva sāgare
dravatām yodha mukhyānām gāṇḍīva preṣitaiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 07,145.050c viddhānāṃ śataśo rājañ śrūyate ninado mahān
analyzed: viddhānām śataśas rājam śrūyate ninadaḥ mahān
niśīthe rāja śārdūla stanayitnoḥ iva ambare
hāhākāra ravān ca eva siṃhanādān ca puṣkalān

original: 07,145.051c śṛṇu śabdān bahuvidhān arjunasya rathaṃ prati
analyzed: śṛṇu śabdān bahuvidhān arjunasya ratham prati
ayam madhye sthitaḥ smākam sātyakiḥ sātvata adhamaḥ

original: 07,145.052c iha cel labhyate lakṣyaṃ kṛtsnāñ jeṣyāmahe parān
analyzed: iha ced labhyate lakṣyam kṛtsnām jeṣyāmahe parān
eṣa pāñcāla rājasya putraḥ droṇena saṃgataḥ
sarvatas saṃvṛtaḥ yodhaiḥ rājan puruṣa sattamaiḥ

original: 07,145.054a sātyakiṃ yadi hanyāmo dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca pārṣatam
analyzed: sātyakim yadi hanyāmaḥ dhṛṣṭadyumnam ca pārṣatam

original: 07,145.054c asaṃśayaṃ mahārāja dhruvo no vijayo bhavet
analyzed: asaṃśayam mahā rāja dhruvaḥ naḥ vijayaḥ bhavet
saubhadra vat imau vīrau parivārya mahā rathau
prayatāmaḥ mahā rāja nihantum vṛṣṇi pārṣatau
savyasācī puras bhyeti droṇa anīkāya bhārata
saṃsaktam sātyakim jñātvā bahubhiḥ kuru puṃgavaiḥ
tatra gacchantu bahavaḥ pravarāḥ ratha sattamāḥ

original: 07,145.057c yāvat pārtho na jānāti sātyakiṃ bahubhir vṛtam
analyzed: yāvat pārthaḥ na jānāti sātyakim bahubhiḥ vṛtam

original: 07,145.058a te tvaradhvaṃ yathā śūrāḥ śarāṇāṃ mokṣaṇe bhṛśam
analyzed: te tvaradhvam yathā śūrāḥ śarāṇām mokṣaṇe bhṛśam

original: 07,145.058c yathā tūrṇaṃ vrajaty eṣa paralokāya mādhavaḥ
analyzed: yathā tūrṇam vrajati eṣa para lokāya mādhavaḥ
tathā kuru mahā rāja su nītyā su prayuktayā

original: 07,145.059a karṇasya matam ājñāya putras te prāha saubalam
analyzed: karṇasya matam ājñāya putraḥ te prāha saubalam

original: 07,145.059c yathendraḥ samare rājan prāha viṣṇuṃ yaśasvinam
analyzed: yathā indraḥ samare rājan prāha viṣṇum yaśasvinam
vṛtaḥ sahasraiḥ daśabhiḥ gajānām anivartinām

original: 07,145.060c rathaiś ca daśasāhasrair vṛto yāhi dhanaṃjayam
analyzed: rathaiḥ ca daśa sāhasraiḥ vṛtaḥ yāhi dhanaṃjayam

original: 07,145.061c ete tvām anuyāsyanti pattibhir bahubhir vṛtāḥ
analyzed: ete tvām anuyāsyanti pattibhiḥ bahubhiḥ vṛtāḥ

original: 07,145.062a jahi kṛṣṇau mahābāho dharmarājaṃ ca mātula
analyzed: jahi kṛṣṇau mahā bāho dharmarājam ca mātula

original: 07,145.062c nakulaṃ sahadevaṃ ca bhīmasenaṃ ca bhārata
analyzed: nakulam sahadevam ca bhīmasenam ca bhārata

original: 07,145.063a devānām iva devendre jayāśā me tvayi sthitā
analyzed: devānām iva devendre jaya āśā me tvayi sthitā

original: 07,145.063c jahi mātula kaunteyān asurān iva pāvakiḥ
analyzed: jahi mātula kaunteyān asurān iva pāvakiḥ

original: 07,145.064a evam ukto yayau pārthān putreṇa tava saubalaḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ yayau pārthān putreṇa tava saubalaḥ

original: 07,145.064c mahatyā senayā sārdhaṃ tava putrais tathā vibho
analyzed: mahatyā senayā sārdham tava putraiḥ tathā vibho
priya artham tava putrāṇām didhakṣuḥ pāṇḍu nandanān

original: 07,145.065c tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ tāvakānāṃ paraiḥ saha
analyzed: tatas pravavṛte yuddham tāvakānām paraiḥ saha
prayāte saubale rājan pāṇḍavānām anīkinīm

original: 07,145.066c balena mahatā yuktaḥ sūtaputras tu sātvatam
analyzed: balena mahatā yuktaḥ sūtaputraḥ tu sātvatam

original: 07,145.067a abhyayāt tvaritaṃ yuddhe kirañ śaraśatān bahūn
analyzed: abhyayāt tvaritam yuddhe kiram śara śatān bahūn
tathā eva pāṇḍavāḥ sarve sātyakim paryavārayan
bhāradvājaḥ tatas gatvā dhṛṣṭadyumna ratham prati

original: 07,145.068a mahad yuddhaṃ tadāsīt tu droṇasya niśi bhārata
analyzed: mahat yuddham tadā āsīt tu droṇasya niśi bhārata
dhṛṣṭadyumnena śūreṇa pāñcālaiḥ ca mahātmanaḥ
saṃjayaḥ uvāca

original: 07,146.001a tatas te prādravan sarve tvaritā yuddhadurmadāḥ
analyzed: tatas te prādravan sarve tvaritāḥ yuddha durmadāḥ
a mṛṣyamāṇāḥ saṃrabdhāḥ yuyudhāna ratham prati
te rathaiḥ kalpitaiḥ rājan hema rūpya vibhūṣitaiḥ

original: 07,146.002c sādibhiś ca gajaiś caiva parivavruḥ sma sātvatam
analyzed: sādibhiḥ ca gajaiḥ ca eva parivavruḥ sma sātvatam
athā enam koṣṭhakīkṛtya sarvatas te mahā rathāḥ

original: 07,146.003c siṃhanādāṃs tadā cakrus tarjayantaḥ sma sātyakim
analyzed: siṃhanādān tadā cakruḥ tarjayantaḥ sma sātyakim
te bhyavarṣam śaraiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ sātyakim satya vikramam
tvaramāṇāḥ mahā vīryāḥ mādhavasya vadha eṣiṇaḥ

original: 07,146.005a tān dṛṣṭvā patatas tūrṇaṃ śaineyaḥ paravīrahā
analyzed: tān dṛṣṭvā patataḥ tūrṇam śaineyaḥ para vīra hā
pratyagṛhṇāt mahā bāhuḥ pramuñcan viśikhān bahūn
tatra vīraḥ mahā iṣvāsaḥ sātyakiḥ yuddha durmadaḥ
nicakarta śirāṃsi ugraiḥ śaraiḥ saṃnata parvabhiḥ

original: 07,146.007a hastihastān hayagrīvān bāhūn api ca sāyudhān
analyzed: hasti hastān haya grīvān bāhūn api ca sa āyudhān

original: 07,146.007c kṣurapraiḥ pātayām āsa tāvakānāṃ sa mādhavaḥ
analyzed: kṣurapraiḥ pātayām āsa tāvakānām sa mādhavaḥ

original: 07,146.008a patitaiś cāmaraiś caiva śvetacchatraiś ca bhārata
analyzed: patitaiḥ cāmaraiḥ ca eva śveta chatraiḥ ca bhārata

original: 07,146.008c babhūva dharaṇī pūrṇā nakṣatrair dyaur iva prabho
analyzed: babhūva dharaṇī pūrṇā nakṣatraiḥ dyauḥ iva prabho

original: 07,146.009a teṣāṃ tu yuyudhānena yudhyatāṃ yudhi bhārata
analyzed: teṣām tu yuyudhānena yudhyatām yudhi bhārata

original: 07,146.009c babhūva tumulaḥ śabdaḥ pretānām iva krandatām
analyzed: babhūva tumulaḥ śabdaḥ pretānām iva krandatām
tena śabdena mahatā pūritā āsīt vasuṃdharā
rātriḥ samabhavat ca eva tīvra rūpā bhaya āvahā
dīryamāṇam balam dṛṣṭvā yuyudhāna śara āhatam

original: 07,146.011c śrutvā ca vipulaṃ nādaṃ niśīthe lomaharṣaṇam
analyzed: śrutvā ca vipulam nādam niśīthe loma harṣaṇam

original: 07,146.012a sutas tavābravīd rājan sārathiṃ rathināṃ varaḥ
analyzed: sutaḥ tava abravīt rājan sārathim rathinām varaḥ

original: 07,146.012c yatraiṣa śabdas tatrāśvāṃś codayeti punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: yatra eṣa śabdaḥ tatra aśvān codaya iti punar punar

original: 07,146.013a tena saṃcodyamānas tu tatas tāṃs turagottamān
analyzed: tena saṃcodyamānaḥ tu tatas tān turaga uttamān
sūtaḥ saṃcodayām āsa yuyudhāna ratham prati
tatas duryodhanaḥ kruddhaḥ dṛḍhadhanvā jita klamaḥ
śīghra hastaḥ citra yodhī yuyudhānam upādravat
tatas pūrṇa āyata utsṛṣṭaiḥ māṃsa śoṇita bhojanaiḥ
duryodhanam dvādaśabhiḥ mādhavaḥ pratyavidhyata

original: 07,146.016a duryodhanas tena tathā pūrvam evārditaḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: duryodhanaḥ tena tathā pūrvam eva arditaḥ śaraiḥ
śaineyam daśabhiḥ bāṇaiḥ pratyavidhyat amarṣitaḥ
tatas samabhavat yuddham ākulam bharata ṛṣabha

original: 07,146.017c pāñcālānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ bhāratānāṃ ca dāruṇam
analyzed: pāñcālānām ca sarveṣām bhāratānām ca dāruṇam

original: 07,146.018a śaineyas tu raṇe kruddhas tava putraṃ mahāratham
analyzed: śaineyaḥ tu raṇe kruddhaḥ tava putram mahā ratham
sāyakānām aśītyā tu vivyādha urasi bhārata

original: 07,146.019a tato 'sya vāhān samare śarair ninye yamakṣayam
analyzed: tatas sya vāhān samare śaraiḥ ninye yama kṣayam

original: 07,146.019c sārathiṃ ca rathāt tūrṇaṃ pātayām āsa patriṇā
analyzed: sārathim ca rathāt tūrṇam pātayām āsa patriṇā

original: 07,146.020a hatāśve tu rathe tiṣṭhan putras tava viśāṃ pate
analyzed: hata aśve tu rathe tiṣṭhan putraḥ tava viśām pate

original: 07,146.020c mumoca niśitān bāṇāñ śaineyasya rathaṃ prati
analyzed: mumoca niśitān bāṇām śaineyasya ratham prati

original: 07,146.021a śarān pañcāśatas tāṃs tu śaineyaḥ kṛtahastavat
analyzed: śarān pañcāśataḥ tān tu śaineyaḥ kṛtahasta vat

original: 07,146.021c ciccheda samare rājan preṣitāṃs tanayena te
analyzed: ciccheda samare rājan preṣitān tanayena te
atha apareṇa bhallena muṣṭideśe mahat dhanuḥ

original: 07,146.022c ciccheda rabhaso yuddhe tava putrasya māriṣa
analyzed: ciccheda rabhasaḥ yuddhe tava putrasya māriṣa
āruroha ratham tūrṇam bhāsvaram kṛtavarmaṇaḥ
duryodhane parāvṛtte śaineyaḥ tava vāhinīm

original: 07,146.024c drāvayām āsa viśikhair niśāmadhye viśāṃ pate
analyzed: drāvayām āsa viśikhaiḥ niśā madhye viśām pate
śakuniḥ ca arjunam rājan parivārya samantataḥ
rathaiḥ aneka sāhasraiḥ gajaiḥ ca eva sahasraśas
tathā haya sahasraiḥ ca tumulam sarvatas karot
te mahā astrāṇi divyāni vikirantaḥ rjunam prati
arjunam yodhayanti sma kṣatriyāḥ kāla coditāḥ
tāni arjunaḥ sahasrāṇi ratha vāraṇa vājinām
pratyavārayat āyastaḥ prakurvan vipulam kṣayam

original: 07,146.028a tatas tu samare śūraḥ śakuniḥ saubalas tadā
analyzed: tatas tu samare śūraḥ śakuniḥ saubalaḥ tadā

original: 07,146.028c vivyādha niśitair bāṇair arjunaṃ prahasann iva
analyzed: vivyādha niśitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ arjunam prahasan iva

original: 07,146.028d*1193_01 tato 'rjunam arighnaṃ taṃ vivyādha yudhi saubalaḥ
analyzed: tatas rjunam ari ghnam tam vivyādha yudhi saubalaḥ
roṣa tāmra īkṣaṇaḥ kruddhaḥ viṃśatyā sāyakaiḥ bhṛśam
punar ca eva śatena asya saṃrurodha mahā ratham

original: 07,146.029c tam arjunas tu viṃśatyā vivyādha yudhi bhārata
analyzed: tam arjunaḥ tu viṃśatyā vivyādha yudhi bhārata
atha itarān mahā iṣvāsān tribhiḥ tribhiḥ avidhyata

original: 07,146.030c saṃvārya tān bāṇagaṇair yudhi rājan dhanaṃjayaḥ
analyzed: saṃvārya tān bāṇa gaṇaiḥ yudhi rājan dhanaṃjayaḥ
avadhīt tāvakān yodhān vajrapāṇiḥ iva asurān

original: 07,146.031a bhujaiś chinnair mahārāja śarīraiś ca sahasraśaḥ
analyzed: bhujaiḥ chinnaiḥ mahā rāja śarīraiḥ ca sahasraśas

original: 07,146.031c samāstīrṇā dharā tatra babhau puṣpair ivācitā
analyzed: samāstīrṇā dharā tatra babhau puṣpaiḥ iva ācitā
śirobhiḥ sa kirīṭaiḥ ca su nasaiḥ cāru kuṇḍalaiḥ
saṃdaṣṭa oṣṭha puṭaiḥ krodhāt tathā eva uddhṛta locanaiḥ
niṣka cūḍāmaṇi dharaiḥ kṣatriyāṇām priyaṃvadaiḥ

original: 07,146.031d*1194_04 paṅkajair iva vinyastaiḥ patitair vibabhau mahī
analyzed: paṅkajaiḥ iva vinyastaiḥ patitaiḥ vibabhau mahī

original: 07,146.031d*1194_05 kṛtvā tat karma bībhatsur ugram ugraparākramaḥ
analyzed: kṛtvā tat karma bībhatsuḥ ugram ugra parākramaḥ

original: 07,146.032a sa viddhvā śakuniṃ bhūyaḥ pañcabhir nataparvabhiḥ
analyzed: sa viddhvā śakunim bhūyas pañcabhiḥ nata parvabhiḥ

original: 07,146.032c ulūkaṃ tribhir ājaghne tribhir eva mahāyasaiḥ
analyzed: ulūkam tribhiḥ ājaghne tribhiḥ eva mahā āyasaiḥ

original: 07,146.032d*1195_01 sa tu tena samāviddhaḥ krodhād dviguṇavikramaḥ
analyzed: sa tu tena samāviddhaḥ krodhāt dviguṇa vikramaḥ
śaraiḥ aneka sāhasraiḥ saḥ rjunam pratyavidhyata

original: 07,146.033a tam ulūkas tathā viddhvā vāsudevam atāḍayat
analyzed: tam ulūkaḥ tathā viddhvā vāsudevam atāḍayat
nanāda ca mahā nādam pūrayan vasudhā talam

original: 07,146.034a arjunas tu drutaṃ gatvā śakuner dhanur ācchinat
analyzed: arjunaḥ tu drutam gatvā śakuneḥ dhanuḥ ācchinat

original: 07,146.034c ninye ca caturo vāhān yamasya sadanaṃ prati
analyzed: ninye ca caturaḥ vāhān yamasya sadanam prati
tatas rathāt avaplutya saubalaḥ bharata ṛṣabha

original: 07,146.035c ulūkasya rathaṃ tūrṇam āruroha viśāṃ pate
analyzed: ulūkasya ratham tūrṇam āruroha viśām pate
tau eka ratham ārūḍhau pitāputrau mahā rathau

original: 07,146.036c pārthaṃ siṣicatur bāṇair giriṃ meghāv ivotthitau
analyzed: pārtham siṣicatuḥ bāṇaiḥ girim meghau iva utthitau

original: 07,146.037a tau tu viddhvā mahārāja pāṇḍavo niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: tau tu viddhvā mahā rāja pāṇḍavaḥ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 07,146.037c vidrāvayaṃs tava camūṃ śataśo vyadhamac charaiḥ
analyzed: vidrāvayan tava camūm śataśas vyadhamat śaraiḥ
anilena yathā abhrāṇi vicchinnāni samantataḥ

original: 07,146.038c vicchinnāni tathā rājan balāny āsan viśāṃ pate
analyzed: vicchinnāni tathā rājan balāni āsan viśām pate

original: 07,146.039a tad balaṃ bharataśreṣṭha vadhyamānaṃ tathā niśi
analyzed: tat balam bharata śreṣṭha vadhyamānam tathā niśi
pradudrāva diśaḥ sarvāḥ vīkṣamāṇam bhaya arditam
utsṛjya vāhān samare codayantaḥ tathā apare
saṃbhrāntāḥ paryadhāvanta tasmin tamasi dāruṇe
vijitya samare yodhān tāvakān bharata ṛṣabha
dadhmatuḥ muditau śaṅkhau vāsudeva dhanaṃjayau

original: 07,146.042a dhṛṣṭadyumno mahārāja droṇaṃ viddhvā tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ mahā rāja droṇam viddhvā tribhiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 07,146.042c ciccheda dhanuṣas tūrṇaṃ jyāṃ śareṇa śitena ha
analyzed: ciccheda dhanuṣaḥ tūrṇam jyām śareṇa śitena ha

original: 07,146.043a tan nidhāya dhanur nīḍe droṇaḥ kṣatriyamardanaḥ
analyzed: tat nidhāya dhanuḥ nīḍe droṇaḥ kṣatriya mardanaḥ
ādade dhanuḥ śūraḥ vegavat sāravattaram

original: 07,146.044a dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ tato droṇo viddhvā saptabhir āśugaiḥ
analyzed: dhṛṣṭadyumnam tatas droṇaḥ viddhvā saptabhiḥ āśugaiḥ

original: 07,146.044c sārathiṃ pañcabhir bāṇai rājan vivyādha saṃyuge
analyzed: sārathim pañcabhiḥ bāṇaiḥ rājan vivyādha saṃyuge

original: 07,146.045a taṃ nivārya śarais tūrṇaṃ dhṛṣṭadyumno mahārathaḥ
analyzed: tam nivārya śaraiḥ tūrṇam dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ mahā rathaḥ
vyadhamat kauravīm senām sahasraśas

original: 07,146.046a vadhyamāne bale tasmiṃs tava putrasya māriṣa
analyzed: vadhyamāne bale tasmin tava putrasya māriṣa
prāvartata nadī ghorā śoṇita ogha taraṅgiṇī
ubhayoḥ senayoḥ madhye nara aśva dvipa vāhinī
yathā vaitaraṇī rājan yama rāṣṭra puram prati

original: 07,146.048a drāvayitvā tu tat sainyaṃ dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ pratāpavān
analyzed: drāvayitvā tu tat sainyam dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ pratāpavān
atyarājata tejasvī śakraḥ deva gaṇeṣu iva
atha dadhmuḥ mahā śaṅkhān dhṛṣṭadyumna śikhaṇḍinau

original: 07,146.049c yamau ca yuyudhānaś ca pāṇḍavaś ca vṛkodaraḥ
analyzed: yamau ca yuyudhānaḥ ca pāṇḍavaḥ ca vṛkodaraḥ

original: 07,146.049d*1196_01 etasminn eva kāle tu sūtaputro mahārathaḥ
analyzed: etasmin eva kāle tu sūtaputraḥ mahā rathaḥ
cakāra kadanam ghoram pāṇḍu sainyeṣu māriṣa
jitvā ratha sahasrāṇi tāvakānām mahā rathāḥ
siṃhanāda ravān cakruḥ pāṇḍavāḥ jita kāśinaḥ

original: 07,146.051a paśyatas tava putrasya karṇasya ca madotkaṭāḥ
analyzed: paśyataḥ tava putrasya karṇasya ca mada utkaṭāḥ

original: 07,146.051c tathā droṇasya śūrasya drauṇeś caiva viśāṃ pate
analyzed: tathā droṇasya śūrasya drauṇeḥ ca eva viśām pate
saṃjayaḥ uvāca
vidrutam sva balam dṛṣṭvā vadhyamānam mahātmabhiḥ

original: 07,147.001c krodhena mahatāviṣṭaḥ putras tava viśāṃ pate

original: 07,152.028c gadayā tāḍayām āsa sā gadā bhīmam āvrajat
analyzed: gadayā tāḍayām āsa sā gadā bhīmam āvrajat
sa rākṣasa indram kaunteyaḥ śara varṣaiḥ avākirat

original: 07,152.029c tān apy asyākaron moghān rākṣaso niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: tān api asya akarot moghān rākṣasaḥ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 07,152.030a te cāpi rākṣasāḥ sarve sainikā bhīmarūpiṇaḥ
analyzed: te ca api rākṣasāḥ sarve sainikāḥ bhīma rūpiṇaḥ
śāsanāt rākṣasa indrasya nijaghnuḥ ratha kuñjarān
pāñcālāḥ sṛñjayāḥ ca eva vājinaḥ parama dvipāḥ

original: 07,152.031c na śāntiṃ lebhire tatra rakṣasair bhṛśapīḍitāḥ
analyzed: na śāntim lebhire tatra rakṣasaiḥ bhṛśa pīḍitāḥ

original: 07,152.032a taṃ tu dṛṣṭvā mahāghoraṃ vartamānaṃ mahāhave
analyzed: tam tu dṛṣṭvā mahā ghoram vartamānam mahā āhave
abravīt puruṣa śreṣṭhaḥ dhanaṃjayam idam vacaḥ
paśya bhīmam mahā bāho rākṣasa indra vaśam gatam

original: 07,152.033c padavīm asya gaccha tvaṃ mā vicāraya pāṇḍava
analyzed: padavīm asya gaccha tvam mā vicāraya pāṇḍava
dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ śikhaṇḍī ca yudhāmanyu uttamaujasau

original: 07,152.034c sahitā draupadeyāś ca karṇaṃ yāntu mahārathāḥ
analyzed: sahitāḥ draupadeyāḥ ca karṇam yāntu mahā rathāḥ

original: 07,152.035a nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca yuyudhānaś ca vīryavān
analyzed: nakulaḥ sahadevaḥ ca yuyudhānaḥ ca vīryavān

original: 07,152.035c itarān rākṣasān ghnantu śāsanāt tava pāṇḍava
analyzed: itarān rākṣasān ghnantu śāsanāt tava pāṇḍava
tvam api imām mahā bāho camūm droṇa puraskṛtām

original: 07,152.036c vārayasva naravyāghra mahad dhi bhayam āgatam
analyzed: vārayasva nara vyāghra mahat hi bhayam āgatam

original: 07,152.037a evam ukte tu kṛṣṇena yathoddiṣṭā mahārathāḥ
analyzed: evam ukte tu kṛṣṇena yathoddiṣṭāḥ mahā rathāḥ

original: 07,152.037c jagmur vaikartanaṃ karṇaṃ rākṣasāṃś cetarān raṇe
analyzed: jagmuḥ vaikartanam karṇam rākṣasān ca itarān raṇe
atha pūrṇa āyata utsṛṣṭaiḥ śaraiḥ āśīviṣa upamaiḥ
dhanuḥ ciccheda bhīmasya rākṣasa indraḥ pratāpavān

original: 07,152.039a hayāṃś cāsya śitair bāṇaiḥ sārathiṃ ca mahābalaḥ
analyzed: hayān ca asya śitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ sārathim ca mahā balaḥ
jaghāna miṣataḥ saṃkhye bhīmasenasya bhārata
saḥ vatīrya rathopasthāt hata aśvaḥ hata sārathiḥ

original: 07,152.040c tasmai gurvīṃ gadāṃ ghorāṃ sa vinadyotsasarja ha
analyzed: tasmai gurvīm gadām ghorām sa vinadya utsasarja ha
tatas tām bhīma nirghoṣām āpatantīm mahā gadām

original: 07,152.041c gadayā rākṣaso ghoro nijaghāna nanāda ca
analyzed: gadayā rākṣasaḥ ghoraḥ nijaghāna nanāda ca

original: 07,152.042a tad dṛṣṭvā rākṣasendrasya ghoraṃ karma bhayāvaham
analyzed: tat dṛṣṭvā rākṣasa indrasya ghoram karma bhaya āvaham
bhīmasenaḥ prahṛṣṭa ātmā gadām āśu parāmṛśat
tayoḥ samabhavat yuddham tumulam nara rakṣasoḥ
gadā nipāta saṃhrādaiḥ bhuvam kampayatoḥ bhṛśam
gadā vimuktau tau bhūyas samāsādya itaretaram
muṣṭibhiḥ vajra saṃhrādaiḥ anyonyam abhijaghnatuḥ
ratha cakraiḥ yugaiḥ akṣaiḥ adhiṣṭhānaiḥ upaskaraiḥ
yathāsannam upādāya nijaghnatuḥ amarṣaṇau
tau vikṣarantau rudhiram samāsādya itaretaram

original: 07,152.046c mattāv iva mahānāgāv akṛṣyetāṃ punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: mattau iva mahā nāgau akṛṣyetām punar punar

original: 07,152.047a tam apaśyad dhṛṣīkeśaḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ hite rataḥ
analyzed: tam apaśyat hṛṣīkeśaḥ pāṇḍavānām hite rataḥ
sa bhīmasena rakṣā artham haiḍimbam pratyacodayat
saṃjayaḥ uvāca

original: 07,153.001a saṃprekṣya samare bhīmaṃ rakṣasā grastam antikāt
analyzed: saṃprekṣya samare bhīmam rakṣasā grastam antikāt
vāsudevaḥ bravīt vākyam ghaṭotkacam idam tadā

original: 07,153.002a paśya bhīmaṃ mahābāho rakṣasā grastam antikāt
analyzed: paśya bhīmam mahā bāho rakṣasā grastam antikāt
paśyatām sarva sainyānām tava ca eva mahā dyute

original: 07,153.003a sa karṇaṃ tvaṃ samutsṛjya rākṣasendram alāyudham
analyzed: sa karṇam tvam samutsṛjya rākṣasa indram alāyudham

original: 07,153.003c jahi kṣipraṃ mahābāho paścāt karṇaṃ vadhiṣyasi
analyzed: jahi kṣipram mahā bāho paścāt karṇam vadhiṣyasi

original: 07,153.004a sa vārṣṇeyavacaḥ śrutvā karṇam utsṛjya vīryavān
analyzed: sa vārṣṇeya vacaḥ śrutvā karṇam utsṛjya vīryavān
yuyudhe rākṣasa indreṇa baka bhrātrā ghaṭotkacaḥ

original: 07,153.004e tayoḥ sutumulaṃ yuddhaṃ babhūva niśi rakṣasoḥ
analyzed: tayoḥ su tumulam yuddham babhūva niśi rakṣasoḥ
alāyudhasya ca eva ugram haiḍimbasya ca bhārata
alāyudhasya yodhān tu rākṣasān bhīma darśanān
vegena āpatataḥ śūrān pragṛhīta śarāsanān
ātta āyudhaḥ su saṃkruddhaḥ yuyudhānaḥ mahā rathaḥ

original: 07,153.006c nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca cicchidur niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: nakulaḥ sahadevaḥ ca cicchiduḥ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 07,153.007a sarvāṃś ca samare rājan kirīṭī kṣatriyarṣabhān
analyzed: sarvān ca samare rājan kirīṭī kṣatriya ṛṣabhān
paricikṣepa bībhatsuḥ sarvatas prakṣipam śarān

original: 07,153.008a karṇaś ca samare rājan vyadrāvayata pārthivān
analyzed: karṇaḥ ca samare rājan vyadrāvayata pārthivān
dhṛṣṭadyumna śikhaṇḍi ādīn pāñcālānām mahā rathān

original: 07,153.009a tān vadhyamānān dṛṣṭvā tu bhīmo bhīmaparākramaḥ
analyzed: tān vadhyamānān dṛṣṭvā tu bhīmaḥ bhīma parākramaḥ

original: 07,153.009c abhyayāt tvaritaḥ karṇaṃ viśikhān vikiran raṇe
analyzed: abhyayāt tvaritaḥ karṇam viśikhān vikiran raṇe

original: 07,153.010a tatas te 'py āyayur hatvā rākṣasān yatra sūtajaḥ
analyzed: tatas te pi āyayuḥ hatvā rākṣasān yatra sūtajaḥ

original: 07,153.010c nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca sātyakiś ca mahārathaḥ
analyzed: nakulaḥ sahadevaḥ ca sātyakiḥ ca mahā rathaḥ

original: 07,153.010e te karṇaṃ yodhayām āsuḥ pāñcālā droṇam eva ca
analyzed: te karṇam yodhayām āsuḥ pāñcālāḥ droṇam eva ca
alāyudhaḥ tu saṃkruddhaḥ ghaṭotkacam ariṃdamam
parigheṇa ati kāyena tāḍayām āsa mūrdhani

original: 07,153.012a sa tu tena prahāreṇa bhaimasenir mahābalaḥ
analyzed: sa tu tena prahāreṇa bhaimaseniḥ mahā balaḥ
īṣat tmānam saṃstambhayata vīryavān
tatas dīpta agni saṃkāśām śata ghaṇṭām alaṃkṛtām
cikṣepa samare tasmai gadām kāñcana bhūṣaṇām

original: 07,153.014a sā hayān sārathiṃ caiva rathaṃ cāsya mahāsvanā
analyzed: sā hayān sārathim ca eva ratham ca asya mahā svanā
cūrṇayām āsa vegena visṛṣṭā bhīma karmaṇā
sa bhagna haya cakra akṣaḥ viśīrṇa dhvaja kūbaraḥ

original: 07,153.015c utpapāta rathāt tūrṇaṃ māyām āsthāya rākṣasīm
analyzed: utpapāta rathāt tūrṇam māyām āsthāya rākṣasīm

original: 07,153.016a sa samāsthāya māyāṃ tu vavarṣa rudhiraṃ bahu
analyzed: sa samāsthāya māyām tu vavarṣa rudhiram bahu
vidyut vibhrājitam ca āsīt timira abhra ākulam nabhaḥ
tatas vajra nipātāḥ ca sa aśani stanayitnavaḥ
mahān caṭacaṭā śabdaḥ tatra āsīt hi mahā āhave

original: 07,153.018a tāṃ prekṣya vihitāṃ māyāṃ rākṣaso rākṣasena tu
analyzed: tām prekṣya vihitām māyām rākṣasaḥ rākṣasena tu

original: 07,153.018c ūrdhvam utpatya haiḍimbas tāṃ māyāṃ māyayāvadhīt
analyzed: ūrdhvam utpatya haiḍimbaḥ tām māyām māyayā avadhīt

original: 07,153.019a so 'bhivīkṣya hatāṃ māyāṃ māyāvī māyayaiva hi
analyzed: saḥ abhivīkṣya hatām māyām māyāvī māyayā eva hi
aśma varṣam su tumulam visasarja ghaṭotkace

original: 07,153.020a aśmavarṣaṃ sa tad ghoraṃ śaravarṣeṇa vīryavān
analyzed: aśma varṣam sa tat ghoram śara varṣeṇa vīryavān

original: 07,153.020c diśo vidhvaṃsayām āsa tad adbhutam ivābhavat
analyzed: diśaḥ vidhvaṃsayām āsa tat adbhutam iva abhavat
tatas nānā praharaṇaiḥ anyonyam abhivarṣatām
āyasaiḥ parighaiḥ śūlaiḥ gadā musala mudgaraiḥ
pinākaiḥ karavālaiḥ ca tomara prāsa kampanaiḥ

original: 07,153.022c nārācair niśitair bhallaiḥ śaraiś cakraiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ
analyzed: nārācaiḥ niśitaiḥ bhallaiḥ śaraiḥ cakraiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ
ayaḥ guḍaiḥ bhindipālaiḥ gośīrṣa ulūkhalaiḥ api
utpāṭya ca mahā śākhaiḥ vividhaiḥ jagatīruhaiḥ
śamī pīlu karīraiḥ ca śamyākaiḥ ca eva bhārata

original: 07,153.024c iṅgudair badarībhiś ca kovidāraiś ca puṣpitaiḥ
analyzed: iṅgudaiḥ badarībhiḥ ca kovidāraiḥ ca puṣpitaiḥ
palāśaiḥ arimedaiḥ ca plakṣa nyagrodha pippalaiḥ
mahadbhiḥ samare tasmin anyonyam abhijaghnatuḥ
vividhaiḥ parvata agraiḥ ca nānā dhātubhiḥ ācitaiḥ

original: 07,153.026c teṣāṃ śabdo mahān āsīd vajrāṇāṃ bhidyatām iva
analyzed: teṣām śabdaḥ mahān āsīt vajrāṇām bhidyatām iva

original: 07,153.027a yuddhaṃ tad abhavad ghoraṃ bhaimyalāyudhayor nṛpa
analyzed: yuddham tat abhavat ghoram bhaimi alāyudhayoḥ nṛpa
hari indrayoḥ yathā rājan vāli sugrīvayoḥ purā

original: 07,153.028a tau yuddhvā vividhair ghorair āyudhair viśikhais tathā
analyzed: tau yuddhvā vividhaiḥ ghoraiḥ āyudhaiḥ viśikhaiḥ tathā
pragṛhya niśitau khaḍgau anyonyam abhijaghnatuḥ
tau anyonyam abhidrutya keśeṣu su mahā balau
bhujābhyām paryagṛhṇītām mahā kāyau mahā balau
tau bhinna gātrau prasvedam susruvāte janādhipa
rudhiram ca mahā kāyau abhivṛṣṭau iva acalau
athā abhipatya vegena samudbhrāmya ca rākṣasam
balena ākṣipya haiḍimbaḥ cakarta asya śiraḥ mahat
sā u pahṛtya śiraḥ tasya kuṇḍalābhyām vibhūṣitam
tadā su tumulam nādam nanāda su mahā balaḥ
hatam dṛṣṭvā mahā kāyam baka jñātim ariṃdamam
pāñcālāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ ca eva siṃhanādān vinedire
tatas bherī sahasrāṇi śaṅkhānām ayutāni ca
avādayan pāṇḍaveyāḥ tasmin rakṣasi pātite

original: 07,153.035a atīva sā niśā teṣāṃ babhūva vijayāvahā
analyzed: atīva sā niśā teṣām babhūva vijaya āvahā
vidyotamānā vibabhau samantāt dīpa mālinī
alāyudhasya tu śiraḥ bhaimaseniḥ mahā balaḥ
duryodhanasya pramukhe cikṣepa gata cetanam

original: 07,153.037a atha duryodhano rājā dṛṣṭvā hatam alāyudham
analyzed: atha duryodhanaḥ rājā dṛṣṭvā hatam alāyudham
babhūva parama udvignaḥ saha sainyena bhārata

original: 07,153.038a tena hy asya pratijñātaṃ bhīmasenam ahaṃ yudhi
analyzed: tena hi asya pratijñātam bhīmasenam aham yudhi

original: 07,153.038c hanteti svayam āgamya smaratā vairam uttamam
analyzed: hantā iti svayam āgamya smaratā vairam uttamam

original: 07,153.039a dhruvaṃ sa tena hantavya ity amanyata pārthivaḥ
analyzed: dhruvam sa tena hantavyaḥ iti amanyata pārthivaḥ
jīvitam cira kālāya bhrātṝṇām ca api amanyata

original: 07,153.040a sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā vinihataṃ bhīmasenātmajena vai
analyzed: sa tam dṛṣṭvā vinihatam bhīmasena ātmajena vai
pratijñām bhīmasenasya pūrṇām eva abhyamanyata
saṃjayaḥ uvāca
nihatya alāyudham rakṣaḥ prahṛṣṭa ātmā ghaṭotkacaḥ

original: 07,154.001c nanāda vividhān nādān vāhinyāḥ pramukhe sthitaḥ
analyzed: nanāda vividhān nādān vāhinyāḥ pramukhe sthitaḥ

original: 07,154.002a tasya taṃ tumulaṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā kuñjarakampanam
analyzed: tasya tam tumulam śabdam śrutvā kuñjara kampanam
tāvakānām mahā rāja bhayam āsīt su dāruṇam
alāyudha viṣaktam tu bhaimasenim mahā balam
dṛṣṭvā karṇaḥ mahā bāhuḥ pāñcālān samupādravat
daśabhiḥ daśabhiḥ bāṇaiḥ dhṛṣṭadyumna śikhaṇḍinau
dṛḍhaiḥ pūrṇa āyata utsṛṣṭaiḥ bibheda nata parvabhiḥ
tatas parama nārācaiḥ yudhāmanyu uttamaujasau

original: 07,154.005c sātyakiṃ ca rathodāraṃ kampayām āsa mārgaṇaiḥ
analyzed: sātyakim ca ratha udāram kampayām āsa mārgaṇaiḥ
teṣām abhyasyatām tatra sarveṣām savya dakṣiṇam
maṇḍalāni eva cāpāni vyadṛśyanta janādhipa
teṣām jyā tala nirghoṣaḥ ratha nemi svanaḥ ca ha

original: 07,154.007c meghānām iva gharmānte babhūva tumulo niśi
analyzed: meghānām iva gharma ante babhūva tumulaḥ niśi
jyā nemi ghoṣa stanayitnumān vai
śara ogha varṣa ākula vṛṣṭimān ca
saṃgrāma meghaḥ sa babhūva rājan
tat uddhatam śailaḥ iva aprakampyaḥ
varṣam mahat śaila samāna sāraḥ
vidhvaṃsayām āsa raṇe narendra
vaikartanaḥ śatru gaṇa avamardī
tulaiḥ vajra nipāta kalpaiḥ
śitaiḥ śaraiḥ kāñcana citra puṅkhaiḥ
śatrūn vyapohat samare mahātmā
vaikartanaḥ putra hite rataḥ te
saṃchinna bhinna dhvajinaḥ ca ke cit
ke cit śaraiḥ ardita bhinna dehāḥ

original: 07,154.011c ke cid visūtā vihayāś ca ke cid;
analyzed: ke cit visūtāḥ vihayāḥ ca ke cid
vaikartanena āśu kṛtāḥ babhūvuḥ
a vindamānāḥ tu atha śarma saṃkhye
yaudhiṣṭhiram te balam anvapadyan
tān prekṣya bhagnān vimukhīkṛtān ca
ghaṭotkacaḥ roṣam atīva cakre
āsthāya tam kāñcana ratna citram
ratha uttamam siṃhaḥ iva unnanāda
vaikartanam karṇam upetya ca api
vivyādha vajra pratimaiḥ pṛṣatkaiḥ
tau karṇi nārāca śilīmukhaiḥ ca
nālīka daṇḍaiḥ ca sa vatsadantaiḥ
varāha karṇaiḥ sa viṣāṇa śṛṅgaiḥ
kṣura pra varṣaiḥ ca vinedatuḥ kham
tat bāṇa dhārā āvṛtam antarikṣam
tiryak gatābhiḥ samare rarāja
suvarṇa puṅkha jvalita prabhābhiḥ
vicitra puṣpābhiḥ iva srajābhiḥ
samam hi tau apratima prabhāvau
anyonyam ājaghnatuḥ uttama astraiḥ

original: 07,154.016c tayor hi vīrottamayor na kaś cid;
analyzed: tayoḥ hi vīra uttamayoḥ na kaḥ cit
dadarśa tasmin samare viśeṣam
atīva tat citram atīva rūpam
babhūva yuddham ravi bhīma sūnvoḥ
samākulam śastra nipāta ghoram
divi iva rāhu aṃśumatoḥ prataptam

original: 07,154.018a ghaṭotkaco yadā karṇaṃ na viśeṣayate nṛpa
analyzed: ghaṭotkacaḥ yadā karṇam na viśeṣayate nṛpa
tadā prāduścakāra ugram astram astra vidām varaḥ

original: 07,154.019a tenāstreṇa hayān pūrvaṃ hatvā karṇasya rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: tena astreṇa hayān pūrvam hatvā karṇasya rākṣasaḥ
sārathim ca eva haiḍimbaḥ kṣipram antaradhīyata
dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ uvāca

original: 07,154.020a tathā hy antarhite tasmin kūṭayodhini rākṣase
analyzed: tathā hi antarhite tasmin kūṭa yodhini rākṣase

original: 07,154.020c māmakaiḥ pratipannaṃ yat tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
analyzed: māmakaiḥ pratipannam yat tat mama ācakṣva saṃjaya
saṃjayaḥ uvāca
antarhitam rākṣasam tam viditvā
saṃprākrośan kuravaḥ sarve eva
katham na ayam rākṣasaḥ kūṭa yodhī
hanyāt karṇam samare dṛśyamānaḥ
tatas karṇaḥ laghu citra astra yodhī
sarvāḥ diśaḥ vyāvṛṇot bāṇa jālaiḥ

original: 07,154.022c na vai kiṃ cid vyāpatat tatra bhūtaṃ;
analyzed: na vai kim cit vyāpatat tatra bhūtam
tamaḥ bhūte sāyakaiḥ antarikṣe
na ca ādadānaḥ na ca saṃdadhānaḥ
na ca iṣudhī spṛśamānaḥ kara agraiḥ
adṛśyat vai lāghavāt sūtaputraḥ
sarvam bāṇaiḥ chādayānaḥ ntarikṣam
tatas māyām vihitām antarikṣe
ghorām bhīmām dāruṇām rākṣasena
saṃpaśyāmaḥ lohita abhra prakāśām
dedīpyantīm agni śikhām iva ugrām
tatas tasyāḥ vidyutaḥ prādurāsan
ulkāḥ ca api jvalitāḥ kaurava indra
ghoṣaḥ ca anyaḥ prādurāsīt su ghoraḥ
sahasraśas nadatām dundubhīnām
tatas śarāḥ prāpatan rukma puṅkhāḥ
śaktyaḥ prāsāḥ musalāni āyudhāni
paraśvadhāḥ taila dhautāḥ ca khaḍgāḥ
pradīpta agrāḥ paṭṭiśāḥ tomarāḥ ca
mayūkhinaḥ parighāḥ loha baddhā
gadāḥ citrāḥ śita dhārāḥ ca śūlāḥ
gurvyaḥ gadāḥ hema paṭṭa avanaddhāḥ
śataghnyaḥ ca prādurāsan samantāt
mahā śilāḥ ca apatan tatra tatra
sahasraśas sa aśanayaḥ sa vajrāḥ

ghaṭotkacaḥ ca ugra karmā tarasvī
arjunaḥ uvāca

original: 07,156.001a katham asmaddhitārthaṃ te kaiś ca yogair janārdana
analyzed: katham asmad hita artham te kaiḥ ca yogaiḥ janārdana
jarāsaṃdha prabhṛtayaḥ ghātitāḥ pṛthivīṣvarāḥ
vāsudevaḥ uvāca
jarāsaṃdhaḥ cedi rājaḥ naiṣādaḥ ca mahā balaḥ

original: 07,156.002c yadi syur na hatāḥ pūrvam idānīṃ syur bhayaṃkarāḥ
analyzed: yadi syuḥ na hatāḥ pūrvam idānīm syuḥ bhayaṃkarāḥ
suyodhanaḥ tān avaśyam vṛṇuyāt ratha sattamān
te smābhiḥ nitya saṃduṣṭāḥ saṃśrayeyuḥ ca kauravān

original: 07,156.004a te hi vīrā mahātmānaḥ kṛtāstrā dṛḍhayodhinaḥ
analyzed: te hi vīrāḥ mahātmānaḥ kṛtāstrāḥ dṛḍha yodhinaḥ

original: 07,156.004c dhārtarāṣṭrīṃ camūṃ kṛtsnāṃ rakṣeyur amarā iva
analyzed: dhārtarāṣṭrīm camūm kṛtsnām rakṣeyuḥ amarāḥ iva
suyodhanam samāśritya taperan pṛthivīm imām

original: 07,156.006a yogair api hatā yais te tān me śṛṇu dhanaṃjaya
analyzed: yogaiḥ api hatāḥ yaiḥ te tān me śṛṇu dhanaṃjaya

original: 07,156.006c ajayyā hi vinā yogair mṛdhe te daivatair api
analyzed: ajayyāḥ hi vinā yogaiḥ mṛdhe te daivataiḥ api

original: 07,156.007a ekaiko hi pṛthak teṣāṃ samastāṃ suravāhinīm
analyzed: ekaikaḥ hi pṛthak teṣām samastām sura vāhinīm
yodhayet samare pārtha lokapāla abhirakṣitām
jarāsaṃdhaḥ hi ruṣitaḥ rauhiṇeya pradharṣitaḥ
asmad vadha artham cikṣepa gadām vai lohitāmukhīm
sīmantam iva kurvāṇām nabhasaḥ pāvaka prabhām
vyadṛśyata āpatantī sā śakra muktā yathā aśaniḥ
tām āpatantīm dṛṣṭvā eva gadām rohiṇinandanaḥ
pratighāta artham astram vai sthūṇākarṇam avāsṛjat
astra vega pratihatā sā gadā prāpatat bhuvi
dārayantī dharām devīm kampayantī iva parvatān

original: 07,156.012a tatra sma rākṣasī ghorā jarā nāmāśuvikramā
analyzed: tatra sma rākṣasī ghorā jarā nāma āśu vikramā

original: 07,156.012c saṃdhayām āsa taṃ jātaṃ jarāsaṃdham ariṃdamam
analyzed: saṃdhayām āsa tam jātam jarāsaṃdham ariṃdamam

original: 07,156.013a dvābhyāṃ jāto hi mātṛbhyām ardhadehaḥ pṛthak pṛthak
analyzed: dvābhyām jātaḥ hi mātṛbhyām ardha dehaḥ pṛthak pṛthak

original: 07,156.013c tayā sa saṃdhito yasmāj jarāsaṃdhas tataḥ smṛtaḥ
analyzed: tayā sa saṃdhitaḥ yasmāt jarāsaṃdhaḥ tatas smṛtaḥ

original: 07,156.014a sā tu bhūmigatā pārtha hatā sasutabāndhavā
analyzed: sā tu bhūmi gatā pārtha hatā sa suta bāndhavā
gadayā tena ca astreṇa sthūṇākarṇena rākṣasī
vinābhūtaḥ sa gadayā jarāsaṃdhaḥ mahā mṛdhe
nihataḥ bhīmasenena paśyataḥ te dhanaṃjaya

original: 07,156.016a yadi hi syād gadāpāṇir jarāsaṃdhaḥ pratāpavān
analyzed: yadi hi syāt gadā pāṇiḥ jarāsaṃdhaḥ pratāpavān

original: 07,156.016c sendrā devā na taṃ hantuṃ raṇe śaktā narottama
analyzed: sa indrāḥ devāḥ na tam hantum raṇe śaktāḥ narottama
tvad hita artham hi naiṣādaḥ aṅguṣṭhena viyojitaḥ
droṇena ācāryakam kṛtvā chadmanā satya vikramaḥ
sa tu baddha aṅguli trāṇaḥ naiṣādiḥ dṛḍha vikramaḥ

original: 07,156.018c asyann eko vanacaro babhau rāma ivāparaḥ
analyzed: asyan ekaḥ vana caraḥ babhau rāmaḥ iva aparaḥ
ekalavyam hi sa aṅguṣṭham aśaktāḥ deva dānavāḥ

original: 07,156.019c sarākṣasoragāḥ pārtha vijetuṃ yudhi karhi cit
analyzed: sa rākṣasa uragāḥ pārtha vijetum yudhi karhi cit

original: 07,156.020a kim u mānuṣamātreṇa śakyaḥ syāt prativīkṣitum
analyzed: kim u mānuṣa mātreṇa śakyaḥ syāt prativīkṣitum
dṛḍha muṣṭiḥ kṛtī nityam asyamānaḥ divāniśam

original: 07,156.021a tvaddhitārthaṃ tu sa mayā hataḥ saṃgrāmamūrdhani
analyzed: tvad hita artham tu sa mayā hataḥ saṃgrāma mūrdhani

original: 07,156.021c cedirājaś ca vikrāntaḥ pratyakṣaṃ nihatas tava
analyzed: cedi rājaḥ ca vikrāntaḥ pratyakṣam nihataḥ tava

original: 07,156.022a sa cāpy aśakyaḥ saṃgrāme jetuṃ sarvaiḥ surāsuraiḥ
analyzed: sa ca api aśakyaḥ saṃgrāme jetum sarvaiḥ sura asuraiḥ
yama indra siddha gandharvān vasu rudrān marut gaṇān
sa hi jātaḥ catur bāhuḥ dhṛta jāmbūnada srajaḥ
ajeyaḥ sarva bhūtānām jayet api divaukasaḥ

original: 07,156.022c vadhārthaṃ tasya jāto 'ham anyeṣāṃ ca suradviṣām
analyzed: vadha artham tasya jātaḥ ham anyeṣām ca suradviṣām
tvad sahāyaḥ nara vyāghra lokānām hita kāmyayā
hiḍimba baka kirmīrāḥ bhīmasenena pātitāḥ
rāvaṇena sama prāṇāḥ brahmayajña vināśanāḥ
hataḥ tathā eva māyāvī haiḍimbena api alāyudhaḥ

original: 07,156.024c haiḍimbaś cāpy upāyena śaktyā karṇena ghātitaḥ
analyzed: haiḍimbaḥ ca api upāyena śaktyā karṇena ghātitaḥ

original: 07,156.025a yadi hy enaṃ nāhaniṣyat karṇaḥ śaktyā mahāmṛdhe
analyzed: yadi hi enam na ahaniṣyat karṇaḥ śaktyā mahā mṛdhe
mayā vadhyaḥ bhaviṣyat sa bhaimaseniḥ ghaṭotkacaḥ

original: 07,156.026a mayā na nihataḥ pūrvam eṣa yuṣmatpriyepsayā
analyzed: mayā na nihataḥ pūrvam eṣa yuṣmad priya īpsayā

original: 07,156.026c eṣa hi brāhmaṇadveṣī yajñadveṣī ca rākṣasaḥ
analyzed: eṣa hi brāhmaṇa dveṣī yajña dveṣī ca rākṣasaḥ

original: 07,156.027a dharmasya loptā pāpātmā tasmād eṣa nipātitaḥ
analyzed: dharmasya loptā pāpa ātmā tasmāt eṣa nipātitaḥ
vyaṃsitā ca api upāyena śakra dattā mayā anagha

original: 07,156.028a ye hi dharmasya loptāro vadhyās te mama pāṇḍava
analyzed: ye hi dharmasya loptāraḥ vadhyāḥ te mama pāṇḍava
dharma saṃsthāpana artham hi pratijñā eṣā mama avyayā

original: 07,156.029a brahma satyaṃ damaḥ śaucaṃ dharmo hrīḥ śrīr dhṛtiḥ kṣamā
analyzed: brahma satyam damaḥ śaucam dharmaḥ hrīḥ śrīḥ dhṛtiḥ kṣamā

original: 07,156.029c yatra tatra rame nityam ahaṃ satyena te śape
analyzed: yatra tatra rame nityam aham satyena te śape

original: 07,156.030a na viṣādas tvayā kāryaḥ karṇaṃ vaikartanaṃ prati
analyzed: na viṣādaḥ tvayā kāryaḥ karṇam vaikartanam prati

original: 07,156.030c upadekṣyāmy upāyaṃ te yena taṃ prasahiṣyasi
analyzed: upadekṣyāmi upāyam te yena tam prasahiṣyasi
suyodhanam ca api raṇe haniṣyati vṛkodaraḥ

original: 07,156.031c tasya cāpi vadhopāyaṃ vakṣyāmi tava pāṇḍava
analyzed: tasya ca api vadha upāyam vakṣyāmi tava pāṇḍava

original: 07,156.032a vardhate tumulas tv eṣa śabdaḥ paracamūṃ prati
analyzed: vardhate tumulaḥ tu eṣa śabdaḥ para camūm prati

original: 07,156.032c vidravanti ca sainyāni tvadīyāni diśo daśa
analyzed: vidravanti ca sainyāni tvadīyāni diśaḥ daśa

original: 07,156.033a labdhalakṣyā hi kauravyā vidhamanti camūṃ tava
analyzed: labdha lakṣyāḥ hi kauravyāḥ vidhamanti camūm tava

original: 07,156.033c dahaty eṣa ca vaḥ sainyaṃ droṇaḥ praharatāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: dahati eṣa ca vaḥ sainyam droṇaḥ praharatām varaḥ
dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ uvāca
eka vīra vadhe moghā śaktiḥ sūta ātmaje yadā

original: 07,157.001c kasmāt sarvān samutsṛjya sa tāṃ pārthe na muktavān
analyzed: kasmāt sarvān samutsṛjya sa tām pārthe na muktavān

original: 07,157.002a tasmin hate hatā hi syuḥ sarve pāṇḍavasṛñjayāḥ
analyzed: tasmin hate hatāḥ hi syuḥ sarve pāṇḍava sṛñjayāḥ

original: 07,157.002c ekavīravadhe kasmān na yuddhe jayam ādadhat
analyzed: eka vīra vadhe kasmāt na yuddhe jayam ādadhat

original: 07,157.003a āhūto na nivarteyam iti tasya mahāvratam
analyzed: āhūtaḥ na nivarteyam iti tasya mahā vratam
svayam āhvayitavyaḥ sa sūtaputreṇa phalgunaḥ
tatas dvairatham ānīya phalgunam śakra dattayā

original: 07,157.004c na jaghāna vṛṣā kasmāt tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
analyzed: na jaghāna vṛṣā kasmāt tat mama ācakṣva saṃjaya

original: 07,157.005a nūnaṃ buddhivihīnaś cāpy asahāyaś ca me sutaḥ
analyzed: nūnam buddhi vihīnaḥ ca api asahāyaḥ ca me sutaḥ

original: 07,157.005c śatrubhir vyaṃsitopāyaḥ kathaṃ nu sa jayed arīn
analyzed: śatrubhiḥ vyaṃsita upāyaḥ katham nu sa jayet arīn

original: 07,157.006a yā hy asya paramā śaktir jayasya ca parāyaṇam
analyzed: yā hi asya paramā śaktiḥ jayasya ca parāyaṇam
sā śaktiḥ vāsudevena vyaṃsitā asya ghaṭotkace

original: 07,157.007a kuṇer yathā hastagataṃ hriyed bilvaṃ balīyasā
analyzed: kuṇeḥ yathā hasta gatam bilvam balīyasā

original: 07,157.007c tathā śaktir amoghā sā moghībhūtā ghaṭotkace
analyzed: tathā śaktiḥ amoghā sā moghībhūtā ghaṭotkace
yathā varāhasya śunaḥ ca yudhyatoḥ
tayoḥ abhāve śvapacasya lābhaḥ
manye vidvan vāsudevasya tadvat
yuddhe lābhaḥ karṇa haiḍimbayoḥ vai
ghaṭotkacaḥ yadi hanyāt hi karṇam
paraḥ lābhaḥ sa bhavet pāṇḍavānām
vaikartanaḥ vā yadi tam nihanyāt
tathā api kṛtyam śakti nāśāt kṛtam syāt
iti prājñaḥ prajñayā etat vicārya
ghaṭotkacam sūtaputreṇa yuddhe
ayodhayat vāsudevaḥ nṛ siṃhaḥ
priyam kurvan pāṇḍavānām hitam ca
saṃjayaḥ uvāca

original: 07,157.011a etac cikīrṣitaṃ jñātvā karṇe madhunihā nṛpa
analyzed: etat cikīrṣitam jñātvā karṇe madhunihā nṛpa
niyojayām āsa tadā dvairathe rākṣasa īśvaram
ghaṭotkacam mahā vīryam mahā buddhiḥ janārdanaḥ
amoghāyāḥ vighāta artham rājan durmantrite tava

original: 07,157.013a tadaiva kṛtakāryā hi vayaṃ syāma kurūdvaha
analyzed: tadā eva kṛta kāryāḥ hi vayam syāma kuru udvaha

original: 07,157.013c na rakṣed yadi kṛṣṇas taṃ pārthaṃ karṇān mahārathāt
analyzed: na rakṣet yadi kṛṣṇaḥ tam pārtham karṇāt mahā rathāt
sa aśva dhvaja rathaḥ saṃkhye dhṛtarāṣṭra patet bhuvi

original: 07,157.014c vinā janārdanaṃ pārtho yogānām īśvaraṃ prabhum
analyzed: vinā janārdanam pārthaḥ yogānām īśvaram prabhum

original: 07,157.015a tais tair upāyair bahubhī rakṣyamāṇaḥ sa pārthiva
analyzed: taiḥ taiḥ upāyaiḥ bahubhiḥ rakṣyamāṇaḥ sa pārthiva

original: 07,157.015c jayaty abhimukhaḥ śatrūn pārthaḥ kṛṣṇena pālitaḥ
analyzed: jayati abhimukhaḥ śatrūn pārthaḥ kṛṣṇena pālitaḥ
sa viśeṣam tu amoghāyāḥ kṛṣṇaḥ rakṣata pāṇḍavam

original: 07,157.016c hanyāt kṣiptā hi kaunteyaṃ śaktir vṛkṣam ivāśaniḥ
analyzed: hanyāt kṣiptā hi kaunteyam śaktiḥ vṛkṣam iva aśaniḥ
dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ uvāca

original: 07,157.017a virodhī ca kumantrī ca prājñamānī mamātmajaḥ
analyzed: virodhī ca kumantrī ca prājña mānī mama ātmajaḥ
yasya eṣa samatikrāntaḥ vadha upāyaḥ jayam prati

original: 07,157.017d*1252_01 sa vā karṇo mahābuddhiḥ sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: sa vā karṇaḥ mahā buddhiḥ sarva śastrabhṛtām varaḥ

original: 07,157.017d*1252_02 na muktavān kathaṃ sūta tām amoghāṃ dhanaṃjaye
analyzed: na muktavān katham sūta tām amoghām dhanaṃjaye
tava api samatikrāntam etat gāvalgaṇe katham

original: 07,157.018c etam arthaṃ mahābuddhe yat tvayā nāvabodhitaḥ
analyzed: etam artham mahābuddhe yat tvayā na avabodhitaḥ
saṃjayaḥ uvāca
duryodhanasya śakuneḥ mama duḥśāsanasya ca

original: 07,157.019c rātrau rātrau bhavaty eṣā nityam eva samarthanā
analyzed: rātrau rātrau bhavati eṣā nityam eva samarthanā

original: 07,157.020a śvaḥ sarvasainyān utsṛjya jahi karṇa dhanaṃjayam
analyzed: śvas sarva sainyān utsṛjya jahi karṇa dhanaṃjayam
preṣya vat pāṇḍu pāñcālān upabhokṣyāmahe tatas

original: 07,157.021a atha vā nihate pārthe pāṇḍuṣv anyatamaṃ tataḥ
analyzed: atha vā nihate pārthe pāṇḍuṣu anyatamam tatas

original: 07,157.021c sthāpayed yudhi vārṣṇeyas tasmāt kṛṣṇo nipātyatām
analyzed: sthāpayet yudhi vārṣṇeyaḥ tasmāt kṛṣṇaḥ nipātyatām

original: 07,157.022a kṛṣṇo hi mūlaṃ pāṇḍūnāṃ pārthaḥ skandha ivodgataḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ hi mūlam pāṇḍūnām pārthaḥ skandhaḥ iva udgataḥ
śākhāḥ iva itare pārthāḥ pāñcālāḥ patra saṃjñitāḥ
kṛṣṇa āśrayāḥ kṛṣṇa balāḥ kṛṣṇa nāthāḥ ca pāṇḍavāḥ

original: 07,157.023c kṛṣṇaḥ parāyaṇaṃ caiṣāṃ jyotiṣām iva candramāḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ parāyaṇam ca eṣām jyotiṣām iva candramāḥ

original: 07,157.024a tasmāt parṇāni śākhāś ca skandhaṃ cotsṛjya sūtaja
analyzed: tasmāt parṇāni śākhāḥ ca skandham ca utsṛjya sūtaja

original: 07,157.024c kṛṣṇaṃ nikṛndhi pāṇḍūnāṃ mūlaṃ sarvatra sarvadā
analyzed: kṛṣṇam nikṛndhi pāṇḍūnām mūlam sarvatra sarvadā

original: 07,157.025a hanyād yadi hi dāśārhaṃ karṇo yādavanandanam
analyzed: hanyāt yadi hi dāśārham karṇaḥ yādava nandanam

original: 07,157.025c kṛtsnā vasumatī rājan vaśe te syān na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: kṛtsnā vasumatī rājan vaśe te syāt na saṃśayaḥ

original: 07,157.025d*1253_01 sā tu buddhiḥ kṛtā rājan kṛṣṇaṃ prati nareśvara
analyzed: sā tu buddhiḥ kṛtā rājan kṛṣṇam prati nareśvara
viṣṇoḥ tejaḥ pramūḍhānām yuddha kāle praṇaśyati

original: 07,157.026a yadi hi sa nihataḥ śayīta bhūmau;
analyzed: yadi hi sa nihataḥ śayīta bhūmau
yadu kula pāṇḍava nandanaḥ mahātmā
nanu tava vasudhā narendra sarvā
sa giri samudra vanā vaśam vrajeta

original: 07,157.027a sā tu buddhiḥ kṛtāpy evaṃ jāgrati tridaśeśvare
analyzed: sā tu buddhiḥ kṛtā api evam jāgrati tridaśeśvare
aprameye hṛṣīkeśe yuddha kāle vyamuhyata

original: 07,157.028a arjunaṃ cāpi kaunteyaṃ sadā rakṣati keśavaḥ
analyzed: arjunam ca api kaunteyam sadā rakṣati keśavaḥ

original: 07,157.028c na hy enam aicchat pramukhe sauteḥ sthāpayituṃ raṇe
analyzed: na hi enam aicchat pramukhe sauteḥ sthāpayitum raṇe
anyān ca asmai ratha udārān upasthāpayat acyutaḥ

original: 07,157.029c amoghāṃ tāṃ kathaṃ śaktiṃ moghāṃ kuryām iti prabho
analyzed: amoghām tām katham śaktim moghām kuryām iti prabho

original: 07,157.029d*1254_01 yaś caivaṃ rakṣate pārthaṃ karṇāt kṛṣṇo mahāmanāḥ
analyzed: yaḥ ca evam rakṣate pārtham karṇāt kṛṣṇaḥ mahā manāḥ

original: 07,157.029d*1254_02 ātmānaṃ sa kathaṃ rājan na rakṣet puruṣottamaḥ
analyzed: ātmānam sa katham rājan na rakṣet puruṣottamaḥ
paricintya tu paśyāmaḥ cakrāyudham ariṃdamam

original: 07,157.029d*1254_04 na so 'sti triṣu lokeṣu yo jayeta janārdanam
analyzed: na saḥ sti triṣu lokeṣu yaḥ jayeta janārdanam
tatas kṛṣṇam mahā bāhuḥ sātyakiḥ satya vikramaḥ
papraccha ratha śārdūla karṇam prati mahā ratham

original: 07,157.031a ayaṃ ca pratyayaḥ karṇe śaktyā cāmitavikrama
analyzed: ayam ca pratyayaḥ karṇe śaktyā ca amita vikrama

original: 07,157.031c kimarthaṃ sūtaputreṇa na muktā phalgune tu sā
analyzed: kimartham sūtaputreṇa na muktā phalgune tu sā
vāsudevaḥ uvāca

original: 07,157.032a duḥṣāsanaś ca karṇaś ca śakuniś ca sasaindhavaḥ
analyzed: duḥṣāsanaḥ ca karṇaḥ ca śakuniḥ ca sa saindhavaḥ
satatam mantrayanti sma duryodhana purogamāḥ
karṇa karṇa mahā iṣvāsa raṇe mita parākrama

original: 07,157.033c nānyasya śaktir eṣā te moktavyā jayatāṃ vara
analyzed: na anyasya śaktiḥ eṣā te moktavyā jayatām vara
ṛte mahā rathāt pārthāt kuntī putrāt dhanaṃjayāt

original: 07,157.034c sa hi teṣām atiyaśā devānām iva vāsavaḥ
analyzed: sa hi teṣām ati yaśāḥ devānām iva vāsavaḥ

original: 07,157.035a tasmin vinihate sarve pāṇḍavāḥ sṛñjayaiḥ saha
analyzed: tasmin vinihate sarve pāṇḍavāḥ sṛñjayaiḥ saha
bhaviṣyanti gata ātmānaḥ surāḥ iva niragnayaḥ

original: 07,157.035d*1255_01 ṛte mahātmanaḥ pārthāt karṇena nihatā dhruvam
analyzed: ṛte mahātmanaḥ pārthāt karṇena nihatāḥ dhruvam
tathā iti ca pratijñātam karṇena śini puṃgava

original: 07,157.036c hṛdi nityaṃ tu karṇasya vadho gāṇḍīvadhanvanaḥ
analyzed: hṛdi nityam tu karṇasya vadhaḥ gāṇḍīvadhanvanaḥ

original: 07,157.037a aham eva tu rādheyaṃ mohayāmi yudhāṃ vara
analyzed: aham eva tu rādheyam mohayāmi yudhām vara
yatas na avasṛjat śaktim pāṇḍave śvetavāhane

original: 07,157.038a phalgunasya hi tāṃ mṛtyum avagamya yuyutsataḥ
