duryodhanaḥ pratyavidhyat daśabhiḥ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 07,164.037a taṃ sātyakiḥ pratyaviddhat tathaiva daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: tam sātyakiḥ pratyaviddhat tathā eva daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 07,164.037b*1298_01 duryodhanas tataḥ kruddho mādhavaṃ navabhiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: duryodhanaḥ tatas kruddhaḥ mādhavam navabhiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 07,164.037c pañcāśatā punaś cājau triṃśatā daśabhiś ca ha
analyzed: pañcāśatā punar ca ājau triṃśatā daśabhiḥ ca ha

original: 07,164.037d*1299_01 sātyakiṃ tu tato rājan prahasaṃs tanayas tava
analyzed: sātyakim tu tatas rājan prahasan tanayaḥ tava
ākarṇa muktaiḥ niśitaiḥ vivyādha triṃśatā śaraiḥ
tatas sya sa śaram cāpam kṣurapreṇa dvidhā akarot

original: 07,164.037d*1299_04 so 'nyat kārmukam ādāya laghuhastas tato dṛḍham
analyzed: saḥ kārmukam ādāya laghu hastaḥ tatas dṛḍham

original: 07,164.037d*1299_05 sātyakir vyasṛjac cāpi śaraśreṇīṃ sutasya te
analyzed: sātyakiḥ vyasṛjat ca api śara śreṇīm sutasya te
tām āpatantīm sahasā śara śreṇīm jighāṃsayā

original: 07,164.037d*1299_07 ciccheda bahudhā rājaṃs tata uccukruśur janāḥ
analyzed: ciccheda bahudhā rājan tatas uccukruśuḥ janāḥ

original: 07,164.037d*1299_08 sātyakiṃ ca trisaptatyā pīḍayām āsa vegitaḥ
analyzed: sātyakim ca trisaptatyā pīḍayām āsa vegitaḥ
svarṇa puṅkhaiḥ śilā dhautaiḥ ākarṇāpūrṇa niḥsṛtaiḥ

original: 07,164.038a tasya saṃdadhataś ceṣūn saṃhiteṣuṃ ca kārmukam
analyzed: tasya saṃdadhataḥ ca iṣūn saṃhita iṣum ca kārmukam
acchinat sātyakiḥ tūrṇam śaraiḥ ca eva abhyavīvṛṣat
sa gāḍha viddhaḥ vyathitaḥ pratyapāyāt ratha antaram
duryodhanaḥ mahā rāja dāśārha śara pīḍitaḥ

original: 07,164.040a samāśvasya tu putras te sātyakiṃ punar abhyayāt
analyzed: samāśvasya tu putraḥ te sātyakim punar abhyayāt
visṛjan iṣu jālāni yuyudhāna ratham prati
tathā eva sātyakiḥ bāṇān duryodhana ratham prati

original: 07,164.041c pratataṃ vyasṛjad rājaṃs tat saṃkulam avartata
analyzed: pratatam vyasṛjat rājan tat saṃkulam avartata
tatra iṣubhiḥ kṣipyamāṇaiḥ patadbhiḥ ca samantataḥ

original: 07,164.042c agner iva mahākakṣe śabdaḥ samabhavan mahān
analyzed: agneḥ iva mahā kakṣe śabdaḥ samabhavat mahān
tayoḥ śara sahasraiḥ ca saṃchannam vasudhā talam
agamya rūpam ca śaraiḥ ākāśam samapadyata
tatra abhyadhikam ālakṣya mādhavam ratha sattamam

original: 07,164.043c kṣipram abhyapatat karṇaḥ parīpsaṃs tanayaṃ tava
analyzed: kṣipram abhyapatat karṇaḥ parīpsan tanayam tava

original: 07,164.044a na tu taṃ marṣayām āsa bhīmaseno mahābalaḥ
analyzed: na tu tam marṣayām āsa bhīmasenaḥ mahā balaḥ

original: 07,164.044c abhyayāt tvaritaḥ karṇaṃ visṛjan sāyakān bahūn
analyzed: abhyayāt tvaritaḥ karṇam visṛjan sāyakān bahūn

original: 07,164.045a tasya karṇaḥ śitān bāṇān pratihanya hasann iva
analyzed: tasya karṇaḥ śitān bāṇān pratihanya hasan iva

original: 07,164.045c dhanuḥ śarāṃś ca ciccheda sūtaṃ cābhyahanac charaiḥ
analyzed: dhanuḥ śarān ca ciccheda sūtam ca abhyahanat śaraiḥ

original: 07,164.046a bhīmasenas tu saṃkruddho gadām ādāya pāṇḍavaḥ
analyzed: bhīmasenaḥ tu saṃkruddhaḥ gadām ādāya pāṇḍavaḥ

original: 07,164.046c dhvajaṃ dhanuś ca sūtaṃ ca saṃmamardāhave ripoḥ
analyzed: dhvajam dhanuḥ ca sūtam ca saṃmamarda āhave ripoḥ

original: 07,164.046d*1301_01 rathacakraṃ ca karṇasya babhañja sa mahābalaḥ
analyzed: ratha cakram ca karṇasya babhañja sa mahā balaḥ
bhagna cakre rathe tiṣṭhat akampaḥ śailarāj iva

original: 07,164.046d*1301_03 ekacakraṃ rathaṃ tasya tam ūhuḥ suciraṃ hayāḥ
analyzed: eka cakram ratham tasya tam ūhuḥ su ciram hayāḥ
eka cakram iva arkasya ratham saptarṣayaḥ malāḥ
a mṛṣyamāṇaḥ karṇaḥ tu bhīmasenam ayudhyata

original: 07,164.047c vividhair iṣujālaiś ca nānāśastraiś ca saṃyuge
analyzed: vividhaiḥ iṣu jālaiḥ ca nānā śastraiḥ ca saṃyuge
bhīmasenaḥ tu saṃkruddhaḥ sūtaputram ayodhayat
saṃkule vartamāne tu rājā dharmasutaḥ bravīt
pāñcālānām nara vyāghrān matsyānām ca nara ṛṣabhān

original: 07,164.049a ye naḥ prāṇāḥ śiro ye no ye no yodhā mahābalāḥ
analyzed: ye naḥ prāṇāḥ śiraḥ ye naḥ ye naḥ yodhāḥ mahā balāḥ
te ete dhārtarāṣṭreṣu viṣaktāḥ puruṣa ṛṣabhāḥ

original: 07,164.050a kiṃ tiṣṭhata yathā mūḍhāḥ sarve vigatacetasaḥ
analyzed: kim tiṣṭhata yathā mūḍhāḥ sarve vigata cetasaḥ

original: 07,164.050c tatra gacchata yatraite yudhyante māmakā rathāḥ
analyzed: tatra gacchata yatra ete yudhyante māmakāḥ rathāḥ
kṣatra dharmam puraskṛtya sarve eva gata jvarāḥ

original: 07,164.051c jayanto vadhyamānā vā gatim iṣṭāṃ gamiṣyatha
analyzed: jayantaḥ vadhyamānāḥ vā gatim iṣṭām gamiṣyatha

original: 07,164.052a jitvā ca bahubhir yajñair yakṣyadhvaṃ bhūridakṣiṇaiḥ
analyzed: jitvā ca bahubhiḥ yajñaiḥ yakṣyadhvam bhūri dakṣiṇaiḥ

original: 07,164.052c hatā vā devasād bhūtvā lokān prāpsyatha puṣkalān
analyzed: hatāḥ vā devasāt bhūtvā lokān prāpsyatha puṣkalān

original: 07,164.053a te rājñā coditā vīrā yotsyamānā mahārathāḥ
analyzed: te rājñā coditāḥ vīrāḥ yotsyamānāḥ mahā rathāḥ

original: 07,164.053c caturdhā vahinīṃ kṛtvā tvaritā droṇam abhyayuḥ
analyzed: caturdhā vahinīm kṛtvā tvaritāḥ droṇam abhyayus

original: 07,164.054a pāñcālās tv ekato droṇam abhyaghnan bahubhiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: pāñcālāḥ tu ekatas droṇam abhyaghnan bahubhiḥ śaraiḥ
bhīmasena purogāḥ ca ekatas paryavārayan
āsan tu pāṇḍu putrāṇām trayaḥ jihmāḥ mahā rathāḥ

original: 07,164.055c yamau ca bhīmasenaś ca prākrośanta dhanaṃjayam
analyzed: yamau ca bhīmasenaḥ ca prākrośanta dhanaṃjayam
abhidrava arjuna kṣipram kurūn droṇāt apānuda
tatas enam haniṣyanti pāñcālāḥ hata rakṣiṇam
kauraveyān tatas pārthaḥ sahasā samupādravat
pāñcālān eva tu droṇaḥ dhṛṣṭadyumna purogamān
sasṛjuḥ tarasā vīrān pañcame hani bhārata

original: 07,164.058a pāñcālānāṃ tato droṇo 'py akarot kadanaṃ mahat
analyzed: pāñcālānām tatas droṇaḥ pi akarot kadanam mahat

original: 07,164.058c yathā kruddho raṇe śakro dānavānāṃ kṣayaṃ purā
analyzed: yathā kruddhaḥ raṇe śakraḥ dānavānām kṣayam purā
droṇa astreṇa mahā rāja vadhyamānāḥ pare yudhi
na atrasanta raṇe droṇāt sattvavantaḥ mahā rathāḥ
vadhyamānāḥ mahā rāja pāñcālāḥ sṛñjayāḥ tathā
droṇam eva abhyayus yuddhe mohayantaḥ mahā ratham
teṣām tu utsādyamānānām pāñcālānām samantataḥ
abhavat bhairavaḥ nādaḥ vadhyatām śara śaktibhiḥ
vadhyamāneṣu saṃgrāme pāñcāleṣu mahātmanā
udīryamāṇe droṇa astre pāṇḍavān bhayam āviśat
dṛṣṭvā aśva nara saṃghānām vipulam ca kṣayam yudhi
dṛṣṭvā ca nara nāga aśva pattīnām vipulam kṣayam
pāṇḍaveyāḥ mahā rāja na āśaṃsuḥ vijayam tadā

original: 07,164.064a kaccid droṇo na naḥ sarvān kṣapayet paramāstravit
analyzed: kaccit droṇaḥ na naḥ sarvān kṣapayet parama astra vid
samiddhaḥ śiśira apāye dahan kakṣam iva analaḥ

original: 07,164.065a na cainaṃ saṃyuge kaś cit samarthaḥ prativīkṣitum
analyzed: na ca enam saṃyuge kaḥ cit samarthaḥ prativīkṣitum

original: 07,164.065c na cainam arjuno jātu pratiyudhyeta dharmavit
analyzed: na ca enam arjunaḥ jātu pratiyudhyeta dharma vid
trastān kuntī sutān dṛṣṭvā droṇa sāyaka pīḍitān
matimān śreyase yuktaḥ keśavaḥ rjunam abravīt

original: 07,164.067a naiṣa yuddhena saṃgrāme jetuṃ śakyaḥ kathaṃ cana
analyzed: na eṣa yuddhena saṃgrāme jetum śakyaḥ katham cana

original: 07,164.067b*1305_01 sadhanur dhanvināṃ śreṣṭho devair api savāsavaiḥ
analyzed: sa dhanuḥ dhanvinām śreṣṭhaḥ devaiḥ api sa vāsavaiḥ

original: 07,164.067b*1305_02 nyastaśastras tu saṃgrāme śakyo hantuṃ bhaven nṛbhiḥ
analyzed: nyasta śastraḥ tu saṃgrāme śakyaḥ hantum bhavet nṛbhiḥ
api vṛtrahaṇā yuddhe ratha yūthapa yūthapaḥ

original: 07,164.068a āsthīyatāṃ jaye yogo dharmam utsṛjya pāṇḍava
analyzed: āsthīyatām jaye yogaḥ dharmam utsṛjya pāṇḍava

original: 07,164.068c yathā vaḥ saṃyuge sarvān na hanyād rukmavāhanaḥ
analyzed: yathā vaḥ saṃyuge sarvān na hanyāt rukmavāhanaḥ

original: 07,164.069a aśvatthāmni hate naiṣa yudhyed iti matir mama
analyzed: aśvatthāmni hate na eṣa yudhyet iti matiḥ mama

original: 07,164.069c taṃ hataṃ saṃyuge kaś cid asmai śaṃsatu mānavaḥ
analyzed: tam hatam saṃyuge kaḥ cit asmai śaṃsatu mānavaḥ
etat na arocayat rājan kuntī putraḥ dhanaṃjayaḥ

original: 07,164.070c anye tv arocayan sarve kṛcchreṇa tu yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
analyzed: anye tu arocayan sarve kṛcchreṇa tu yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

original: 07,164.071a tato bhīmo mahābāhur anīke sve mahāgajam
analyzed: tatas bhīmaḥ mahā bāhuḥ anīke sve mahā gajam

original: 07,164.071c jaghāna gadayā rājann aśvatthāmānam ity uta
analyzed: jaghāna gadayā rājan aśvatthāmānam iti uta
para pramathanam ghoram mālavasya indravarmaṇaḥ

original: 07,164.072a bhīmasenas tu savrīḍam upetya droṇam āhave
analyzed: bhīmasenaḥ tu sa vrīḍam upetya droṇam āhave

original: 07,164.072c aśvatthāmā hata iti śabdam uccaiś cakāra ha
analyzed: aśvatthāmā hataḥ iti śabdam uccais cakāra ha

original: 07,164.073a aśvatthāmeti hi gajaḥ khyāto nāmnā hato 'bhavat
analyzed: aśvatthāmā iti hi gajaḥ khyātaḥ nāmnā hataḥ bhavat

original: 07,164.073c kṛtvā manasi taṃ bhīmo mithyā vyāhṛtavāṃs tadā
analyzed: kṛtvā manasi tam bhīmaḥ mithyā vyāhṛtavān tadā

original: 07,164.074a bhīmasenavacaḥ śrutvā droṇas tat param apriyam
analyzed: bhīmasena vacaḥ śrutvā droṇaḥ tat param apriyam
manasā sanna gātraḥ bhūt yathā saikatam ambhasi

original: 07,164.075a śaṅkamānaḥ sa tan mithyā vīryajñaḥ svasutasya vai
analyzed: śaṅkamānaḥ sa tat mithyā vīrya jñaḥ sva sutasya vai

original: 07,164.075c hataḥ sa iti ca śrutvā naiva dhairyād akampata
analyzed: hataḥ saḥ iti ca śrutvā nā eva dhairyāt akampata

original: 07,164.076a sa labdhvā cetanāṃ droṇaḥ kṣaṇenaiva samāśvasat
analyzed: sa labdhvā cetanām droṇaḥ kṣaṇena eva samāśvasat
anucintya ātmanaḥ putram aviṣahyam arātibhiḥ

original: 07,164.077a sa pārṣatam abhidrutya jighāṃsur mṛtyum ātmanaḥ
analyzed: sa pārṣatam abhidrutya jighāṃsuḥ mṛtyum ātmanaḥ
avākirat sahasreṇa tīkṣṇānām kaṅka patriṇām
tam vai viṃśati sāhasrāḥ pāñcālānām nara ṛṣabhāḥ

original: 07,164.078c tathā carantaṃ saṃgrāme sarvato vyakirañ śaraiḥ
analyzed: tathā carantam saṃgrāme sarvatas vyakiram śaraiḥ

original: 07,164.078d*1307_01 taiḥ śarair āvṛtaṃ droṇaṃ nāpaśyāma mahāratham
analyzed: taiḥ śaraiḥ āvṛtam droṇam na apaśyāma mahā ratham

original: 07,164.078d*1307_02 bhāskaraṃ jaladai ruddhaṃ varṣāsv iva viśāṃ pate
analyzed: bhāskaram jaladaiḥ ruddham varṣāsu iva viśām pate
vidhūya tān bāṇa gaṇān pāñcālānām mahā rathaḥ

original: 07,164.079a tataḥ prāduṣkarod droṇo brāhmam astraṃ paraṃtapaḥ
analyzed: tatas prāduṣkarot droṇaḥ brāhmam astram paraṃtapaḥ
vadhāya teṣām śūrāṇām pāñcālānām amarṣitaḥ
tatas vyarocata droṇaḥ vinighnan sarva somakān
śirāṃsi apātayat ca api pāñcālānām mahā mṛdhe
tathā eva parigha ākārān bāhūn kanaka bhūṣaṇān
te vadhyamānāḥ samare bhāradvājena pārthivāḥ
medinyām anvakīryanta vāta nunnāḥ iva drumāḥ

original: 07,164.082a kuñjarāṇāṃ ca patatāṃ hayaughānāṃ ca bhārata
analyzed: kuñjarāṇām ca patatām haya oghānām ca bhārata
agamya rūpā pṛthivī māṃsa śoṇita kardamā
hatvā viṃśati sāhasrān pāñcālānām ratha vrajān

original: 07,164.083c atiṣṭhad āhave droṇo vidhūmo 'gnir iva jvalan
analyzed: atiṣṭhat āhave droṇaḥ vidhūmaḥ gniḥ iva jvalan

original: 07,164.084a tathaiva ca punaḥ kruddho bhāradvājaḥ pratāpavān
analyzed: tathā eva ca punar kruddhaḥ bhāradvājaḥ pratāpavān
vasudānasya bhallena śiraḥ kāyāt apāharat

original: 07,164.085a punaḥ pañcaśatān matsyān ṣaṭsahasrāṃś ca sṛñjayān
analyzed: punar pañcaśatān matsyān ṣaṣ sahasrān ca sṛñjayān
hastinām ayutam hatvā jaghāna aśva ayutam punar
kṣatriyāṇām abhāvāya dṛṣṭvā droṇam avasthitam
ṛṣayaḥ bhyāgaman tūrṇam havyavāha purogamāḥ
viśvāmitraḥ jamadagniḥ bhāradvājaḥ gautamaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ kaśyapo tris ca brahma lokam ninīṣavaḥ
sikatāḥ pṛśnayaḥ gargāḥ bālakhilyāḥ marīcipāḥ
bhṛgavaḥ ṅgirasaḥ ca eva sūkṣmāḥ ca anye mahā ṛṣayaḥ

original: 07,164.089a ta enam abruvan sarve droṇam āhavaśobhinam
analyzed: te enam abruvan sarve droṇam āhava śobhinam

original: 07,164.089c adharmataḥ kṛtaṃ yuddhaṃ samayo nidhanasya te
analyzed: adharmataḥ kṛtam yuddham samayaḥ nidhanasya te
nyasya āyudham raṇe droṇa sametya asmān avasthitān

original: 07,164.090c nātaḥ krūrataraṃ karma punaḥ kartuṃ tvam arhasi
analyzed: na atas krūrataram karma punar kartum tvam arhasi
veda vedāṅga viduṣaḥ satya dharma parasya ca
brāhmaṇasya viśeṣeṇa tava etat na upapadyate
nyasya āyudham amogha iṣo tiṣṭha vartmani śāśvate

original: 07,164.092c paripūrṇaś ca kālas te vastuṃ loke 'dya mānuṣe
analyzed: paripūrṇaḥ ca kālaḥ te vastum loke dya mānuṣe

original: 07,164.092d*1308_01 brahmāstreṇa tvayā dagdhā anastrajñā narā bhuvi
analyzed: brahmāstreṇa tvayā dagdhāḥ an astra jñāḥ narāḥ bhuvi

original: 07,164.092d*1308_02 yad etad īdṛśaṃ vipra kṛtaṃ karma na sādhu tat
analyzed: yat etat īdṛśam vipra kṛtam karma na sādhu tat

original: 07,164.092d*1308_03 nyasyāyudhaṃ raṇe kṣipraṃ droṇa mā tvaṃ ciraṃ kṛthāḥ
analyzed: nyasya āyudham raṇe kṣipram droṇa mā tvam ciram kṛthāḥ

original: 07,164.092d*1308_04 mā pāpiṣṭhataraṃ karma kariṣyasi punar dvija
analyzed: mā pāpiṣṭhataram karma kariṣyasi punar dvija

original: 07,164.093a iti teṣāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā bhīmasenavacaś ca tat
analyzed: iti teṣām vacaḥ śrutvā bhīmasena vacaḥ ca tat

original: 07,164.093c dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca saṃprekṣya raṇe sa vimanābhavat
analyzed: dhṛṣṭadyumnam ca saṃprekṣya raṇe sa vimanāḥ bhavat
sa dahyamānaḥ vyathitaḥ kuntī putram yudhiṣṭhiram
yudhiṣṭhiram upāgamya droṇaḥ vacanam abravīt

original: 07,164.094b*1309_02 satyaṃ kathaya rājendra yadi jīvati me sutaḥ
analyzed: satyam kathaya rāja indra yadi jīvati me sutaḥ

original: 07,164.094c ahataṃ vā hataṃ veti papraccha sutam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: ahatam vā hatam vā iti papraccha sutam ātmanaḥ

original: 07,164.095a sthirā buddhir hi droṇasya na pārtho vakṣyate 'nṛtam
analyzed: sthirā buddhiḥ hi droṇasya na pārthaḥ vakṣyate

original: 07,164.095c trayāṇām api lokānām aiśvaryārthe kathaṃ cana
analyzed: trayāṇām api lokānām aiśvarya arthe katham cana

original: 07,164.096a tasmāt taṃ paripapraccha nānyaṃ kaṃ cid viśeṣataḥ
analyzed: tasmāt tam paripapraccha na anyam kam cit viśeṣataḥ

original: 07,164.096c tasmiṃs tasya hi satyāśā bālyāt prabhṛti pāṇḍave
analyzed: tasmin tasya hi satya āśā bālyāt prabhṛti pāṇḍave

original: 07,164.097a tato niṣpāṇḍavām urvīṃ kariṣyantaṃ yudhāṃ patim
analyzed: tatas niṣpāṇḍavām urvīm kariṣyantam yudhām patim
droṇam jñātvā dharmarājam govindaḥ vyathitaḥ bravīt

original: 07,164.098a yady ardhadivasaṃ droṇo yudhyate manyum āsthitaḥ
analyzed: yadi ardha divasam droṇaḥ yudhyate manyum āsthitaḥ

original: 07,164.098c satyaṃ bravīmi te senā vināśaṃ samupaiṣyati
analyzed: satyam bravīmi te senā vināśam samupaiṣyati

original: 07,164.099a sa bhavāṃs trātu no droṇāt satyāj jyāyo 'nṛtaṃ bhavet
analyzed: sa bhavān trātu naḥ droṇāt satyāt jyāyaḥ nṛtam bhavet
anṛtam jīvitasya arthe vadan na spṛśyate nṛtaiḥ

original: 07,164.099d*1310_01 kāminīṣu vivāheṣu gavām arthe tathā dhane
analyzed: kāminīṣu vivāheṣu gavām arthe tathā dhane
brāhmaṇa abhyavapattau ca anṛte na asti pātakam
tayoḥ saṃvadatoḥ evam bhīmasenaḥ bravīt idam
śrutvā eva tam mahā rāja vadha upāyam mahātmanaḥ
gāhamānasya te senām mālavasya indravarmaṇaḥ
aśvatthāmā iti vikhyātaḥ gajaḥ śakra gaja upamaḥ

original: 07,164.102a nihato yudhi vikramya tato 'haṃ droṇam abruvam
analyzed: nihataḥ yudhi vikramya tatas ham droṇam abruvam
aśvatthāmā hataḥ brahman nivartasva āhavāt iti

original: 07,164.103a nūnaṃ nāśraddadhad vākyam eṣa me puruṣarṣabhaḥ
analyzed: nūnam na aśraddadhat vākyam eṣa me puruṣa ṛṣabhaḥ
sa tvam govinda vākyāni mānayasva jaya eṣiṇaḥ
droṇāya nihatam śaṃsa rājam śāradvatī sutam

original: 07,164.104c tvayokto naiṣa yudhyeta jātu rājan dvijarṣabhaḥ
analyzed: tvayā uktaḥ na eṣa yudhyeta jātu rājan dvijarṣabhaḥ

original: 07,164.104e satyavān hi nṛloke 'smin bhavān khyāto janādhipa
analyzed: satyavān hi nṛ loke smin bhavān khyātaḥ janādhipa
tasya tat vacanam śrutvā kṛṣṇa vākya pracoditaḥ
bhāvi tvāt ca mahā rāja vaktum samupacakrame

original: 07,164.106a tam atathyabhaye magno jaye sakto yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
analyzed: tam atathya bhaye magnaḥ jaye saktaḥ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

original: 07,164.106c avyaktam abravīd rājan hataḥ kuñjara ity uta
analyzed: avyaktam abravīt rājan hataḥ kuñjaraḥ iti uta

original: 07,164.107a tasya pūrvaṃ rathaḥ pṛthvyāś caturaṅgula uttaraḥ
analyzed: tasya pūrvam rathaḥ pṛthvyāḥ catur aṅgulaḥ uttaraḥ

original: 07,164.107c babhūvaivaṃ tu tenokte tasya vāhāspṛśan mahīm
analyzed: babhūva evam tu tena ukte tasya vāhaḥ aspṛśat mahīm

original: 07,164.108a yudhiṣṭhirāt tu tad vākyaṃ śrutvā droṇo mahārathaḥ
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhirāt tu tat vākyam śrutvā droṇaḥ mahā rathaḥ
putra vyasana saṃtaptaḥ nirāśaḥ jīvite bhavat
āgaskṛtam iva ātmānam pāṇḍavānām mahātmanām

original: 07,164.109c ṛṣivākyaṃ ca manvānaḥ śrutvā ca nihataṃ sutam
analyzed: ṛṣi vākyam ca manvānaḥ śrutvā ca nihatam sutam
vicetāḥ parama udvignaḥ dhṛṣṭadyumnam avekṣya ca
yoddhum na aśaknuvat rājan yathāpūrvam ariṃdama
tam dṛṣṭvā parama udvignam śoka upahata cetasam
pāñcāla rājasya sutaḥ dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ samādravat
yaḥ iṣṭvā manuja indreṇa drupadena mahā makhe
labdhaḥ droṇa vināśāya samiddhāt havyavāhanāt

original: 07,164.113a sa dhanur jaitram ādāya ghoraṃ jaladanisvanam
analyzed: sa dhanuḥ jaitram ādāya ghoram jalada nisvanam
dṛḍha jyam ajaram divyam śarān ca āśīviṣa upamān
saṃdadhe kārmuke tasmin śaram āśīviṣa upamam
droṇam jighāṃsuḥ pāñcālyaḥ mahā jvālam iva analam
tasya rūpam śarasya āsīt dhanuḥ jyā maṇḍala antare
dyotataḥ bhāskarasya iva ghana ante pariveśinaḥ

original: 07,164.116a pārṣatena parāmṛṣṭaṃ jvalantam iva tad dhanuḥ
analyzed: pārṣatena parāmṛṣṭam jvalantam iva tat dhanuḥ

original: 07,164.116c antakālam iva prāptaṃ menire vīkṣya sainikāḥ
analyzed: anta kālam iva prāptam menire vīkṣya sainikāḥ

original: 07,164.117a tam iṣuṃ saṃhitaṃ tena bhāradvājaḥ pratāpavān
analyzed: tam iṣum saṃhitam tena bhāradvājaḥ pratāpavān
dṛṣṭvā amanyata dehasya kāla paryāyam āgatam

original: 07,164.118a tataḥ sa yatnam ātiṣṭhad ācāryas tasya vāraṇe
analyzed: tatas sa yatnam ātiṣṭhat ācāryaḥ tasya vāraṇe
na ca asya astrāṇi rāja indra prādurāsan mahātmanaḥ

original: 07,164.119a tasya tv ahāni catvāri kṣapā caikāsyato gatā
analyzed: tasya tu ahāni catvāri kṣapā ca ekā asyatas gatā

original: 07,164.119b*1311_01 tasya tv ahaś ca rātriś ca śarān abhyasato 'gamat
analyzed: tasya tu ahar ca rātriḥ ca śarān abhyasataḥ gamat

original: 07,164.119c tasya cāhnas tribhāgena kṣayaṃ jagmuḥ patatriṇaḥ
analyzed: tasya ca ahnaḥ tri bhāgena kṣayam jagmuḥ patatriṇaḥ
sa śara kṣayam āsādya putra śokena ca arditaḥ
vividhānām ca divyānām astrāṇām a prasanna tām
utsraṣṭu kāmaḥ śastrāṇi vipra vākya abhicoditaḥ
tejasā preryamāṇaḥ ca yuyudhe saḥ timānuṣam

original: 07,164.122a athānyat sa samādāya divyam āṅgirasaṃ dhanuḥ
analyzed: atha anyat sa samādāya divyam āṅgirasam dhanuḥ
śarān ca brahmadaṇḍa ābhān dhṛṣṭadyumnam ayodhayat
tatas tam śara varṣeṇa mahatā samavākirat
vyaśātayat ca saṃkruddhaḥ dhṛṣṭadyumnam amarṣaṇaḥ

original: 07,164.123d*1312_01 tataś ca pārṣato rājan samākṛṣya dhanur mahat
analyzed: tatas ca pārṣataḥ rājan samākṛṣya dhanuḥ mahat
śaram mumoca niśitam bhāradvāja jighāṃsayā

original: 07,164.124a taṃ śaraṃ śatadhā cāsya droṇaś ciccheda sāyakaiḥ
analyzed: tam śaram śatadhā ca asya droṇaḥ ciccheda sāyakaiḥ

original: 07,164.124c dhvajaṃ dhanuś ca niśitaiḥ sārathiṃ cāpy apātayat
analyzed: dhvajam dhanuḥ ca niśitaiḥ sārathim ca api apātayat
dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ prahasya anyat punar ādāya kārmukam
śitena ca enam bāṇena pratyavidhyat stanāntare
saḥ tividdhaḥ mahā iṣvāsaḥ saṃbhrāntaḥ iva saṃyuge
bhallena śita dhāreṇa ciccheda asya mahat dhanuḥ

original: 07,164.127a yac cāsya bāṇaṃ vikṛtaṃ dhanūṃṣi ca viśāṃ pate
analyzed: yat ca asya bāṇam vikṛtam dhanūṃṣi ca viśām pate

original: 07,164.127c sarvaṃ saṃchidya durdharṣo gadāṃ khaḍgam athāpi ca
analyzed: sarvam saṃchidya durdharṣaḥ gadām khaḍgam atha api ca
dhṛṣṭadyumnam tatas vidhyat navabhiḥ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
jīvitānta karaiḥ kruddhaḥ kruddha rūpam paraṃtapaḥ
dhṛṣṭadyumna rathasya aśvān sva ratha aśvaiḥ mahā rathaḥ
amiśrayat ameya ātmā brāhmam astram udīrayan

original: 07,164.130a te miśrā bahv aśobhanta javanā vātaraṃhasaḥ
analyzed: te miśrāḥ bahu aśobhanta javanāḥ vāta raṃhasaḥ
pārāvata savarṇāḥ ca śoṇāḥ ca bharata ṛṣabha
yathā sa vidyutaḥ meghāḥ nadantaḥ jaladāgame
tathā rejuḥ mahā rāja miśritāḥ raṇa mūrdhani
īṣā bandham cakra bandham ratha bandham tathā eva ca
praṇāśayat ameya ātmā dhṛṣṭadyumnasya sa dvijaḥ
sa chinna dhanvā virathaḥ hata aśvaḥ hata sārathiḥ

original: 07,164.133c uttamām āpadaṃ prāpya gadāṃ vīraḥ parāmṛśat
analyzed: uttamām āpadam prāpya gadām vīraḥ parāmṛśat

original: 07,164.134a tām asya viśikhais tīkṣṇaiḥ kṣipyamāṇāṃ mahārathaḥ
analyzed: tām asya viśikhaiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ kṣipyamāṇām mahā rathaḥ

original: 07,164.135a tāṃ dṛṣṭvā tu naravyāghro droṇena nihatāṃ śaraiḥ
analyzed: tām dṛṣṭvā tu nara vyāghraḥ droṇena nihatām śaraiḥ

original: 07,164.135c vimalaṃ khaḍgam ādatta śatacandraṃ ca bhānumat
analyzed: vimalam khaḍgam ādatta śata candram ca bhānumat
asaṃśayam tathābhūte pāñcālyaḥ sādhu amanyata
vadham ācārya mukhyasya prāpta kālam mahātmanaḥ
tatas sva rathanīḍa sthaḥ sva rathasya ratheṣayā

original: 07,164.137c agacchad asim udyamya śatacandraṃ ca bhānumat
analyzed: agacchat asim udyamya śata candram ca bhānumat
cikīrṣuḥ duṣkaram karma dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ mahā rathaḥ

original: 07,164.138c iyeṣa vakṣo bhettuṃ ca bhāradvājasya saṃyuge
analyzed: iyeṣa vakṣaḥ bhettum ca bhāradvājasya saṃyuge
saḥ tiṣṭhat yuga madhye vai yuga saṃnahaneṣu ca
śoṇānām jaghana ardheṣu tat sainyāḥ samapūjayan
tiṣṭhataḥ yuga pālīṣu śoṇān api adhitiṣṭhataḥ

original: 07,164.140c nāpaśyad antaraṃ droṇas tad adbhutam ivābhavat
analyzed: na apaśyat antaram droṇaḥ tat adbhutam iva abhavat
kṣipram śyenasya carataḥ yathā eva āmiṣa gṛddhinaḥ

original: 07,164.141c tadvad āsīd abhīsāro droṇaṃ prārthayato raṇe
analyzed: tadvat āsīt abhīsāraḥ droṇam prārthayataḥ raṇe
tasya aśvān ratha śaktyā asau tadā kruddhaḥ parākramī
sarvān ekaikaśas droṇaḥ kapota ābhān ajīghanat

original: 07,164.143a te hatā nyapatan bhūmau dhṛṣṭadyumnasya vājinaḥ
analyzed: te hatāḥ nyapatan bhūmau dhṛṣṭadyumnasya vājinaḥ

original: 07,164.143c śoṇāś ca paryamucyanta rathabandhād viśāṃ pate
analyzed: śoṇāḥ ca paryamucyanta ratha bandhāt viśām pate

original: 07,164.144a tān hayān nihatān dṛṣṭvā dvijāgryeṇa sa pārṣataḥ
analyzed: tān hayān nihatān dṛṣṭvā dvijāgryeṇa sa pārṣataḥ
na amṛṣyata yudhām śreṣṭhaḥ yājñaseniḥ mahā rathaḥ

original: 07,164.145a virathaḥ sa gṛhītvā tu khaḍgaṃ khaḍgabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: virathaḥ sa gṛhītvā tu khaḍgam khaḍga bhṛtām varaḥ
droṇam abhyapatat rājan vainateyaḥ iva uragam

original: 07,164.146a tasya rūpaṃ babhau rājan bhāradvājaṃ jighāṃsataḥ
analyzed: tasya rūpam babhau rājan bhāradvājam jighāṃsataḥ

original: 07,164.146c yathā rūpaṃ paraṃ viṣṇor hiraṇyakaśipor vadhe
analyzed: yathā rūpam param viṣṇoḥ hiraṇyakaśipoḥ vadhe
saḥ carat vividhān mārgān prakārān ekaviṃśatim

original: 07,164.147b*1313_01 darśayām āsa kauravya pārṣato vicaran raṇe
analyzed: darśayām āsa kauravya pārṣataḥ vicaran raṇe

original: 07,164.147c bhrāntam udbhrāntam āviddham āplutaṃ prasṛtaṃ sṛtam
analyzed: bhrāntam udbhrāntam āviddham āplutam prasṛtam sṛtam

original: 07,164.148a parivṛttaṃ nivṛttaṃ ca khaḍgaṃ carma ca dhārayan
analyzed: parivṛttam nivṛttam ca khaḍgam carma ca dhārayan

original: 07,164.148c saṃpātaṃ samudīrṇaṃ ca darśayām āsa pārṣataḥ
analyzed: saṃpātam samudīrṇam ca darśayām āsa pārṣataḥ

original: 07,164.148d*1314_01 bhārataṃ kauśikaṃ caiva sātvataṃ caiva śikṣayā
analyzed: bhāratam kauśikam ca eva sātvatam ca eva śikṣayā
darśayan vyacarat yuddhe droṇasya anta cikīrṣayā

original: 07,164.148d*1314_03 caratas tasya tān mārgān vicitrān khaḍgacarmiṇaḥ
analyzed: carataḥ tasya tān mārgān vicitrān khaḍga carmiṇaḥ

original: 07,164.148d*1314_04 vyasmayanta raṇe yodhā devatāś ca samāgatāḥ
analyzed: vyasmayanta raṇe yodhāḥ devatāḥ ca samāgatāḥ
tatas śara sahasreṇa śata candram apātayat

original: 07,164.149c khaḍgaṃ carma ca saṃbādhe dhṛṣṭadyumnasya sa dvijaḥ
analyzed: khaḍgam carma ca saṃbādhe dhṛṣṭadyumnasya sa dvijaḥ

original: 07,164.150a te tu vaitastikā nāma śarā hy āsannaghātinaḥ
analyzed: te tu vaitastikāḥ nāma śarāḥ hi āsanna ghātinaḥ

original: 07,164.150c nikṛṣṭayuddhe droṇasya nānyeṣāṃ santi te śarāḥ
analyzed: nikṛṣṭa yuddhe droṇasya na anyeṣām santi te śarāḥ
śāradvatasya pārthasya drauṇeḥ vaikartanasya ca

original: 07,164.151b*1315_01 ṛte śāradvatāt pārthād droṇer vaikartanāt tathā
analyzed: ṛte śāradvatāt pārthāt droṇeḥ vaikartanāt tathā
pradyumna yuyudhānābhyām abhimanyoḥ ca te śarāḥ
atha asya iṣum samādhatta dṛḍham parama saṃśitam
antevāsinam ācāryaḥ jighāṃsuḥ putra saṃmitam

original: 07,164.153a taṃ śarair daśabhis tīkṣṇaiś ciccheda śinipuṃgavaḥ
analyzed: tam śaraiḥ daśabhiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ ciccheda śini puṃgavaḥ

original: 07,164.153b*1316_01 paśyatas tasya tān mārgān vicitrān khaḍgacarmaṇi
analyzed: paśyataḥ tasya tān mārgān vicitrān khaḍga carmaṇi

original: 07,164.153c paśyatas tava putrasya karṇasya ca mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: paśyataḥ tava putrasya karṇasya ca mahātmanaḥ
grastam ācārya mukhyena dhṛṣṭadyumnam amocayat
carantam ratha mārgeṣu sātyakim satya vikramam
droṇa karṇa antara gatam kṛpasya api ca bhārata

original: 07,164.155a apūjayetāṃ vārṣṇeyaṃ bruvāṇau sādhu sādhv iti
analyzed: apūjayetām vārṣṇeyam bruvāṇau sādhu sādhu iti

original: 07,164.155c divyāny astrāṇi sarveṣāṃ yudhi nighnantam acyutam
analyzed: divyāni astrāṇi sarveṣām yudhi nighnantam acyutam

original: 07,164.156a dhanaṃjayas tataḥ kṛṣṇam abravīt paśya keśava
analyzed: dhanaṃjayaḥ tatas kṛṣṇam abravīt paśya keśava
ācārya vara mukhyānām madhye krīḍan madhūdvahaḥ

original: 07,164.157c mādrīputrau ca bhīmaṃ ca rājānaṃ ca yudhiṣṭhiram
analyzed: mādrī putrau ca bhīmam ca rājānam ca yudhiṣṭhiram

original: 07,164.158a yac chikṣayānuddhataḥ san raṇe carati sātyakiḥ
analyzed: yat śikṣayā anuddhataḥ san raṇe carati sātyakiḥ
mahā rathān upakrīḍan vṛṣṇīnām kīrti vardhanaḥ

original: 07,164.159a tam ete pratinandanti siddhāḥ sainyāś ca vismitāḥ
analyzed: tam ete pratinandanti siddhāḥ sainyāḥ ca vismitāḥ

original: 07,164.159c ajayyaṃ samare dṛṣṭvā sādhu sādhv iti sātvatam
analyzed: ajayyam samare dṛṣṭvā sādhu sādhu iti sātvatam
yodhāḥ ca ubhayatas sarve karmabhiḥ samapūjayan

original: 07,165.001*1317_01 sātvatasya tu tat karma dṛṣṭvā duryodhanādayaḥ
analyzed: sātvatasya tu tat karma dṛṣṭvā duryodhana ādayaḥ

original: 07,165.001*1317_02 śaineyaṃ sarvataḥ kruddhā vārayām āsur añjasā
analyzed: śaineyam sarvatas kruddhāḥ vārayām āsuḥ añjasā

original: 07,165.001*1317_03 kṛpakarṇau ca samare putrāś ca tava māriṣa
analyzed: kṛpa karṇau ca samare putrāḥ ca tava māriṣa
śaineyam tvarayā abhyetya vinighnan niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 07,165.001*1317_05 yudhiṣṭhiras tato rājā mādrīputrau ca pāṇḍavau
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhiraḥ tatas rājā mādrī putrau ca pāṇḍavau

original: 07,165.001*1317_07 karṇaś ca śaravarṣeṇa gautamaś ca mahārathaḥ
analyzed: karṇaḥ ca śara varṣeṇa gautamaḥ ca mahā rathaḥ

original: 07,165.001*1317_09 tāṃ vṛṣṭiṃ sahasā rājann utthitāṃ ghorarūpiṇīm

original: 07,165.001*1317_10 vārayām āsa śaineyo yodhayaṃs tān mahārathān
analyzed: vārayām āsa śaineyaḥ yodhayan tān mahā rathān

original: 07,165.001*1317_12 vārayām āsa vidhivad divyair astrair mahāmṛdhe
analyzed: vārayām āsa vidhivat divyaiḥ astraiḥ mahā mṛdhe

original: 07,165.001*1318_01 saṃprahṛṣṭācyuto dṛṣṭvā sādhu sādhv iti pūjayan
analyzed: saṃprahṛṣṭa acyutaḥ dṛṣṭvā sādhu sādhu iti pūjayan

original: 07,165.001*1318_02 taṃ yaudhāś cābhavan sarve karmaṇānena pūjayan
analyzed: tam yaudhāḥ ca abhavan sarve karmaṇā anena pūjayan

original: 07,165.001*1318_04 prāyāt tava balaṃ jiṣṇur bhāradvājarathaṃ prati
analyzed: prāyāt tava balam jiṣṇuḥ bhāradvāja ratham prati
tatra āsīt bhairavaḥ nādaḥ tāvakānām jaya eṣiṇām
samabhidravatām pārtham daityānām iva vāsavam
tatra akarot mahā rāja mahīm śoṇita kardamām
prācchinat ca uttamāṅgāni pārtho śva nara dantinām
krūram āyodhanam jajñe tasmin rāja samāgame

original: 07,165.001c rudrasyeva hi kruddhasya nighnatas tu paśūn yathā
analyzed: rudrasya iva hi kruddhasya nighnataḥ tu paśūn yathā
hastānām uttamāṅgānām kārmukāṇām ca bhārata
chatrāṇām ca apaviddhānām cāmarāṇām ca saṃyuge

original: 07,165.002d*1319_01 rāśayaḥ sma vyadṛśyanta tatra tatra raṇājire
analyzed: rāśayaḥ sma vyadṛśyanta tatra tatra raṇa ajire

original: 07,165.003a bhagnacakrai rathaiś cāpi pātitaiś ca mahādhvajaiḥ
analyzed: bhagna cakraiḥ rathaiḥ ca api pātitaiḥ ca mahā dhvajaiḥ

original: 07,165.003c sādibhiś ca hataiḥ śūraiḥ saṃkīrṇā vasudhābhavat
analyzed: sādibhiḥ ca hataiḥ śūraiḥ saṃkīrṇā vasudhā bhavat
bāṇa pāta nikṛttāḥ tu yodhāḥ te kuru sattama
ceṣṭantaḥ vividhāḥ ceṣṭāḥ vyadṛśyanta mahā āhave
vartamāne tathā yuddhe ghore devāsura upame
abravīt kṣatriyān tatra dharmarājaḥ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
abhidravata saṃyattāḥ kumbhayonim mahā rathāḥ

original: 07,165.006a eṣa vai pārṣato vīro bhāradvājena saṃgataḥ

analyzed: tat dṛṣṭvā ghora rūpam tu drauṇeḥ astram bhaya āvaham

original: 07,167.006d*1367_01 petur ākāśagās tatra vimanaskā viśāṃ pate
analyzed: petuḥ ākāśa gāḥ tatra vimanaskāḥ viśām pate

original: 07,167.006d*1367_02 rodasī ca viyac caiva sarvaṃ jvālāsamāvṛtam
analyzed: rodasī ca viyat ca eva sarvam jvālā samāvṛtam
dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ uvāca
nivartiteṣu sainyeṣu droṇaputreṇa saṃyuge
bhṛśam śoka abhitaptena pituḥ vadham a mṛṣyatā
kurūn āpatataḥ dṛṣṭvā dhṛṣṭadyumnasya rakṣaṇe

original: 07,167.008c ko mantraḥ pāṇḍaveṣv āsīt tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
analyzed: kaḥ mantraḥ pāṇḍaveṣu āsīt tat mama ācakṣva saṃjaya
saṃjayaḥ uvāca

original: 07,167.009a prāg eva vidrutān dṛṣṭvā dhārtarāṣṭrān yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
analyzed: prāk eva vidrutān dṛṣṭvā dhārtarāṣṭrān yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

original: 07,167.009c punaś ca tumulaṃ śabdaṃ śrutvārjunam abhāṣata
analyzed: punar ca tumulam śabdam śrutvā arjunam abhāṣata
ācārye nihate droṇe dhṛṣṭadyumnena saṃyuge
nihate vajrahastena yathā vṛtre mahā asure
na aśaṃsanta jayam yuddhe dīna ātmānaḥ dhanaṃjaya

original: 07,167.011c ātmatrāṇe matiṃ kṛtvā prādravan kuravo yathā
analyzed: ātma trāṇe matim kṛtvā prādravan kuravaḥ yathā

original: 07,167.012a ke cid bhrāntai rathais tūrṇaṃ nihatapārṣṇiyantṛbhiḥ
analyzed: ke cit bhrāntaiḥ rathaiḥ tūrṇam nihata pārṣṇiyantṛbhiḥ
vipatāka dhvaja chatraiḥ pārthivāḥ śīrṇa kūbaraiḥ
bhagna nīḍaiḥ ākula aśvaiḥ āruhya anye vicetasaḥ

original: 07,167.013c bhītāḥ pādair hayān ke cit tvarayantaḥ svayaṃ rathaiḥ
analyzed: bhītāḥ pādaiḥ hayān ke cid tvarayantaḥ svayam rathaiḥ

original: 07,167.013e yugacakrākṣabhagnaiś ca drutāḥ ke cid bhayāturāḥ
analyzed: yuga cakra akṣa bhagnaiḥ ca drutāḥ ke cid bhaya āturāḥ

original: 07,167.013f*1368_01 rathān viśīrṇān utsṛjya padbhiḥ ke cic ca vidrutāḥ
analyzed: rathān viśīrṇān utsṛjya padbhiḥ ke cit ca vidrutāḥ
haya pṛṣṭha gatāḥ ca anye kṛṣyante ṛdh cyuta āsanāḥ
gaja skandheṣu saṃsyūtāḥ nārācaiḥ calita āsanāḥ

original: 07,167.014c śarārtair vidrutair nāgair hṛtāḥ ke cid diśo daśa
analyzed: śara ārtaiḥ vidrutaiḥ nāgaiḥ hṛtāḥ ke cit diśaḥ daśa
viśastra kavacāḥ ca anye vāhanebhyaḥ kṣitim gatāḥ

original: 07,167.015c saṃchinnā nemiṣu gatā mṛditāś ca hayadvipaiḥ
analyzed: saṃchinnāḥ nemiṣu gatāḥ mṛditāḥ ca haya dvipaiḥ
krośantaḥ tāta putra iti palāyantaḥ pare bhayāt
na abhijānanti ca anyonyam kaśmala abhihata ojasaḥ

original: 07,167.017a putrān pitṝn sakhīn bhrātṝn samāropya dṛḍhakṣatān
analyzed: putrān pitṝn sakhīn bhrātṝn samāropya dṛḍha kṣatān

original: 07,167.017c jalena kledayanty anye vimucya kavacāny api
analyzed: jalena kledayanti anye vimucya kavacāni api
palāyana parāḥ ca anye yodhāḥ śata sahasraśas

original: 07,167.017d*1370_02 avasthitaṃ punar dṛṣṭvā tava putrasya tad balam
analyzed: avasthitam punar dṛṣṭvā tava putrasya tat balam
dharmaputraḥ mahā rāja dhanaṃjayam atha abravīt

original: 07,167.018a avasthāṃ tādṛśīṃ prāpya hate droṇe drutaṃ balam
analyzed: avasthām tādṛśīm prāpya hate droṇe drutam balam

original: 07,167.018b*1371_01 evam etad drutaṃ bhagnaṃ droṇe yudhi nipātite
analyzed: evam etat drutam bhagnam droṇe yudhi nipātite
avasthānam avindan vai vikṣatam śara pīḍitam

original: 07,167.018c punarāvartitaṃ kena yadi jānāsi śaṃsa me
analyzed: punar āvartitam kena yadi jānāsi śaṃsa me

original: 07,167.019a hayānāṃ heṣatāṃ śabdaḥ kuñjarāṇāṃ ca bṛṃhatām
analyzed: hayānām heṣatām śabdaḥ kuñjarāṇām ca bṛṃhatām
ratha nemi svanaḥ ca atra vimiśraḥ śrūyate mahān

original: 07,167.020a ete śabdā bhṛśaṃ tīvrāḥ pravṛttāḥ kurusāgare
analyzed: ete śabdāḥ bhṛśam tīvrāḥ pravṛttāḥ kuru sāgare

original: 07,167.020c muhur muhur udīryantaḥ kampayanti hi māmakān
analyzed: muhur muhur udīryantaḥ kampayanti hi māmakān

original: 07,167.021a ya eṣa tumulaḥ śabdaḥ śrūyate lomaharṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ eṣa tumulaḥ śabdaḥ śrūyate loma harṣaṇaḥ

original: 07,167.021c sendrān apy eṣa lokāṃs trīn bhañjyād iti matir mama
analyzed: sa indrān api eṣa lokān trīn bhañjyāt iti matiḥ mama
manye vajradharasya eṣa ninādaḥ bhairava svanaḥ

original: 07,167.022c droṇe hate kauravārthaṃ vyaktam abhyeti vāsavaḥ
analyzed: droṇe hate kaurava artham vyaktam abhyeti vāsavaḥ
prahṛṣṭa lomakūpāḥ sma saṃvigna ratha kuñjarāḥ

original: 07,167.023c dhanaṃjaya guruṃ śrutvā tatra nādaṃ subhīṣaṇam
analyzed: dhanaṃjaya gurum śrutvā tatra nādam su bhīṣaṇam

original: 07,167.024a ka eṣa kauravān dīrṇān avasthāpya mahārathaḥ
analyzed: kaḥ eṣa kauravān dīrṇān avasthāpya mahā rathaḥ
nivartayati yuddha artham mṛdhe deveśvaraḥ yathā
arjunaḥ uvāca
udyamya ātmānam ugrāya karmaṇe dhairyam āsthitāḥ

original: 07,167.025c dhamanti kauravāḥ śaṅkhān yasya vīryam upāśritāḥ
analyzed: dhamanti kauravāḥ śaṅkhān yasya vīryam upāśritāḥ

original: 07,167.026a yatra te saṃśayo rājan nyastaśastre gurau hate
analyzed: yatra te saṃśayaḥ rājan nyasta śastre gurau hate

original: 07,167.026c dhārtarāṣṭrān avasthāpya ka eṣa nadatīti ha
analyzed: dhārtarāṣṭrān avasthāpya kaḥ eṣa nadati iti ha
hrīmantam tam mahā bāhum matta dvirada gāminam
indra viṣṇu samam vīrye kope ntakam iva sthitam
bṛhaspati samam buddhyā nītimantam mahā ratham
vyākhyāsyāmi ugra karmāṇam kurūṇām abhayaṃkaram

original: 07,167.028a yasmiñ jāte dadau droṇo gavāṃ daśaśataṃ dhanam
analyzed: yasmin jāte dadau droṇaḥ gavām daśa śatam dhanam

original: 07,167.028b*1373_01 sa eṣa nardati drauṇir gharmānte jalado yathā
analyzed: saḥ eṣa nardati drauṇiḥ gharma ante jaladaḥ yathā
brāhmaṇebhyaḥ mahārhebhyaḥ saḥ śvatthāmā eṣa garjati

original: 07,167.029c heṣatā kampitā bhūmir lokāś ca sakalās trayaḥ
analyzed: heṣatā kampitā bhūmiḥ lokāḥ ca sakalāḥ trayaḥ

original: 07,167.030a tac chrutvāntarhitaṃ bhūtaṃ nāma cāsyākarot tadā
analyzed: tat śrutvā antarhitam bhūtam nāma ca asya akarot tadā
aśvatthāmā iti saḥ dyaiṣa śūraḥ nadati pāṇḍava
yaḥ dyānāthaḥ iva ākramya pārṣatena hataḥ tathā
karmaṇā su nṛśaṃsena tasya nāthaḥ vyavasthitaḥ

original: 07,167.032a guruṃ me yatra pāñcālyaḥ keśapakṣe parāmṛśat
analyzed: gurum me yatra pāñcālyaḥ keśapakṣe parāmṛśat

original: 07,167.032c tan na jātu kṣamed drauṇir jānan pauruṣam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: tat na jātu kṣamet drauṇiḥ jānan pauruṣam ātmanaḥ

original: 07,167.032d*1374_01 sa hi tenaiva naḥ sarvān kṣapayed iti me matiḥ
analyzed: sa hi tena eva naḥ sarvān kṣapayet iti me matiḥ

original: 07,167.033c dharmajñena satā nāma so 'dharmaḥ sumahān kṛtaḥ
analyzed: dharma jñena satā nāma saḥ dharmaḥ su mahān kṛtaḥ
ciram sthāsyati ca a kīrtiḥ trailokye sa carācare

original: 07,167.033d*1375_02 rāme vālivadhād yadvad evaṃ droṇe nipātite
analyzed: rāme vāli vadhāt yadvat evam droṇe nipātite
sarva dharma upapannaḥ yam mama śiṣyaḥ ca pāṇḍavaḥ

original: 07,167.034c nāyaṃ vakṣyati mithyeti pratyayaṃ kṛtavāṃs tvayi
analyzed: na ayam vakṣyati mithyā iti pratyayam kṛtavān tvayi
sa satya kañcukam nāma praviṣṭena tatas

original: 07,167.035c ācārya ukto bhavatā hataḥ kuñjara ity uta
analyzed: ācāryaḥ uktaḥ bhavatā hataḥ kuñjaraḥ iti uta
tatas śastram samutsṛjya nirmamaḥ gata cetanaḥ

original: 07,167.036c āsīt sa vihvalo rājan yathā dṛṣṭas tvayā vibhuḥ
analyzed: āsīt sa vihvalaḥ rājan yathā dṛṣṭaḥ tvayā vibhuḥ

original: 07,167.037a sa tu śokena cāviṣṭo vimukhaḥ putravatsalaḥ
analyzed: sa tu śokena ca āviṣṭaḥ vimukhaḥ putra vatsalaḥ

original: 07,167.037c śāśvataṃ dharmam utsṛjya guruḥ śiṣyeṇa ghātitaḥ
analyzed: śāśvatam dharmam utsṛjya guruḥ śiṣyeṇa ghātitaḥ

original: 07,167.038c rakṣatv idānīṃ sāmātyo yadi śaknoṣi pārṣatam
analyzed: rakṣatu idānīm sa amātyaḥ yadi śaknoṣi pārṣatam
grastam ācārya putreṇa kruddhena hata bandhunā

original: 07,167.039c sarve vayaṃ paritrātuṃ na śakṣyāmo 'dya pārṣatam

original: 07,167.041c avakīrya svadharmaṃ hi śiṣyeṇa nihato guruḥ

original: 07,167.042a yadā gataṃ vayo bhūyaḥ śiṣṭam alpataraṃ ca naḥ

original: 07,167.043a piteva nityaṃ sauhārdāt piteva sa hi dharmataḥ

original: 07,167.044a dhṛtarāṣṭreṇa bhīṣmāya droṇāya ca viśāṃ pate

original: 07,167.045a sa prāpya tādṛśīṃ vṛttiṃ satkṛtaḥ satataṃ paraiḥ

original: 07,167.045c avṛṇīta sadā putrān mām evābhyadhikaṃ guruḥ

original: 07,167.046c na tv enaṃ yudhyamānaṃ vai hanyād api śatakratuḥ

original: 07,167.047c kṛto hy anāryair asmābhī rājyārthe laghubuddhibhiḥ
analyzed: kṛtaḥ hi anāryaiḥ asmābhiḥ rājya arthe laghu buddhibhiḥ

original: 07,167.047d*1376_01 aho bata mahat pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ karma sudāruṇaṃ
analyzed: aho bata mahat pāpam kṛtam karma su dāruṇam

original: 07,167.048a putrān bhrātṝn pitṝn dārāñ jīvitaṃ caiva vāsaviḥ

original: 07,167.048c tyajet sarvaṃ mama premṇā jānāty etad dhi me guruḥ
analyzed: tyajet sarvam mama premṇā jānāti etat hi me guruḥ

original: 07,167.049c tasmād avākśirā rājan prāpto 'smi narakaṃ vibho
analyzed: tasmāt avākśirāḥ rājan prāptaḥ smi narakam vibho

original: 07,167.050a brāhmaṇaṃ vṛddham ācāryaṃ nyastaśastraṃ yathā munim
analyzed: brāhmaṇam vṛddham ācāryam nyasta śastram yathā munim

original: 07,167.050c ghātayitvādya rājyārthe mṛtaṃ śreyo na jīvitam
analyzed: ghātayitvā adya rājya arthe mṛtam śreyaḥ na jīvitam

original: 07,168.001a arjunasya vacaḥ śrutvā nocus tatra mahārathāḥ
analyzed: arjunasya vacaḥ śrutvā na ūcuḥ tatra mahā rathāḥ

original: 07,168.001c apriyaṃ vā priyaṃ vāpi mahārāja dhanaṃjayam
analyzed: apriyam vā priyam vā api mahā rāja dhanaṃjayam
tatas kruddhaḥ mahā bāhuḥ bhīmasenaḥ bhyabhāṣata
utsmayan iva kaunteyam arjunam bharata ṛṣabha
muniḥ yathā araṇya gataḥ bhāṣase dharma saṃhitam
nyasta daṇḍaḥ yathā pārtha brāhmaṇaḥ saṃśita vrataḥ

original: 07,168.004a kṣatāt trātā kṣatāj jīvan kṣāntas triṣv api sādhuṣu
analyzed: kṣatāt trātā kṣatāt jīvan kṣāntaḥ triṣu api sādhuṣu

original: 07,168.004c kṣatriyaḥ kṣitim āpnoti kṣipraṃ dharmaṃ yaśaḥ śriyam
analyzed: kṣatriyaḥ kṣitim āpnoti kṣipram dharmam yaśaḥ śriyam

original: 07,168.005a sa bhavān kṣatriyaguṇair yuktaḥ sarvaiḥ kulodvahaḥ
analyzed: sa bhavān kṣatriya guṇaiḥ yuktaḥ sarvaiḥ kula udvahaḥ

original: 07,168.005c avipaścid yathā vākyaṃ vyāharan nādya śobhase
analyzed: a vipaścit yathā vākyam vyāharan na adya śobhase
vartamāne yathā pāpe ugra karmaṇi bhārata
svadharmam an avasthāpya kim etāni prabhāṣase
parākramaḥ te kaunteya śakrasya iva śacīpateḥ

original: 07,168.006c na cātivartase dharmaṃ velām iva mahodadhiḥ
analyzed: na ca ativartase dharmam velām iva mahā udadhiḥ

original: 07,168.007a na pūjayet tvā ko 'nvadya yat trayodaśavārṣikam
analyzed: na pūjayet tvā kaḥ nu adya yat trayodaśa vārṣikam

original: 07,168.007d*1378_02 tvayā vinā yadi mahīṃ dharmaputrāya dhīmate
analyzed: tvayā vinā yadi mahīm dharmaputrāya dhīmate

original: 07,168.007d*1378_03 na dadyāṃ pañcame prāpte divase nāsmi kṣatriyaḥ
analyzed: na dadyām pañcame prāpte divase na asmi kṣatriyaḥ

original: 07,168.008a diṣṭyā tāta manas te 'dya svadharmam anuvartate
analyzed: diṣṭyā tāta manaḥ te dya svadharmam anuvartate

original: 07,168.008c ānṛśaṃsye ca te diṣṭyā buddhiḥ satatam acyuta
analyzed: ānṛśaṃsye ca te diṣṭyā buddhiḥ satatam acyuta

original: 07,168.009a yat tu dharmapravṛttasya hṛtaṃ rājyam adharmataḥ
analyzed: yat tu dharma pravṛttasya hṛtam rājyam adharmataḥ

original: 07,168.009c draupadī ca parāmṛṣṭā sabhām ānīya śatrubhiḥ
analyzed: draupadī ca parāmṛṣṭā sabhām ānīya śatrubhiḥ

original: 07,168.009d*1379_01 kathaṃ vṛddheṣu tiṣṭhatsu dhārmikeṣu mahatsu ca
analyzed: katham vṛddheṣu tiṣṭhatsu dhārmikeṣu mahatsu ca

original: 07,168.009d*1379_02 draupadī prāpnuyāt kleśaṃ veśyā yoṣeva bhārata
analyzed: draupadī prāpnuyāt kleśam veśyā yoṣā iva bhārata

original: 07,168.009d*1379_03 kim u teṣāṃ bilvaphalaṃ mukhe hy āsīn mahātmanām
analyzed: kim u teṣām bilva phalam mukhe hi āsīt mahātmanām

original: 07,168.009d*1379_04 utāho badhirā hy āsan mūkā vāpi dhanaṃjaya
analyzed: uta aho badhirāḥ hi āsan mūkāḥ vā api dhanaṃjaya

original: 07,168.009d*1379_05 andhā vasaṃs tadā te tu yaiś ca noktaṃ hitaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: andhāḥ vasan tadā te tu yaiḥ ca na uktam hitam vacaḥ

original: 07,168.009d*1379_06 atha tatra bhaved dharmo na caivātrāsty anāryakam
analyzed: atha tatra bhavet dharmaḥ na ca eva atra asti anāryakam
anurūpam kṛtam ca api bhīṣma droṇa kṛpa ādibhiḥ

original: 07,168.009d*1379_08 putraiḥ śiṣyaiś ca yat sārdhaṃ saṃnaddhā yoddhum āhave
analyzed: putraiḥ śiṣyaiḥ ca yat sārdham saṃnaddhāḥ yoddhum āhave
vanam pravrājitāḥ ca āsma valkala ajina vāsasaḥ

original: 07,168.010c anarhamāṇās taṃ bhāvaṃ trayodaśa samāḥ paraiḥ
analyzed: an arhamāṇāḥ tam bhāvam trayodaśa samāḥ paraiḥ
bahūni kṣāmya śatrūṇām satya dharma ratāḥ vayam

original: 07,168.010d*1380_02 tathā tan marṣayitvā tu yathā te utpathasthitāḥ
analyzed: tathā tat marṣayitvā tu yathā te utpatha sthitāḥ
etāni amarṣa sthānāni marṣitāni tvayā anagha
kṣatra dharma prasaktena sarvam etat anuṣṭhitam

original: 07,168.012a tam adharmam apākraṣṭum ārabdhaḥ sahitas tvayā
analyzed: tam adharmam apākraṣṭum ārabdhaḥ sahitaḥ tvayā
sa anubandhān haniṣyāmi kṣudrān rājya harān aham

original: 07,168.013a tvayā tu kathitaṃ pūrvaṃ yuddhāyābhyāgatā vayam
analyzed: tvayā tu kathitam pūrvam yuddhāya abhyāgatāḥ vayam

original: 07,168.013c ghaṭāmaś ca yathāśakti tvaṃ tu no 'dya jugupsase
analyzed: ghaṭāmaḥ ca yathāśakti tvam tu naḥ dya jugupsase

original: 07,168.014a svadharmaṃ necchase jñātuṃ mithyā vacanam eva te
analyzed: svadharmam nā icchase jñātum mithyā vacanam eva te
bhaya arditānām asmākam vācā marmāṇi kṛntasi

original: 07,168.015a vapan vraṇe kṣāram iva kṣatānāṃ śatrukarśana
analyzed: vapan vraṇe kṣāram iva kṣatānām śatru karśana
vidīryate me hṛdayam tvayā vāc śalya pīḍitam

original: 07,168.016a adharmam etad vipulaṃ dhārmikaḥ san na budhyase
analyzed: adharmam etat vipulam dhārmikaḥ san na budhyase

original: 07,168.016c yat tvam ātmānam asmāṃś ca praśaṃsyān na praśaṃsasi
analyzed: yat tvam ātmānam asmān ca praśaṃsyān na praśaṃsasi
vāsudeve sthite ca api droṇaputram praśaṃsasi

original: 07,168.016e yaḥ kalāṃ ṣoḍaśīṃ tvatto nārhate taṃ praśaṃsasi
analyzed: yaḥ kalām ṣoḍaśīm tvattaḥ na arhate tam praśaṃsasi

original: 07,168.017a svayam evātmano vaktuṃ na yuktaṃ guṇasaṃstavam
analyzed: svayam eva ātmanaḥ vaktum na yuktam guṇa saṃstavam

original: 07,168.017b*1382_01 mama nāgāyutaṃ pārtha balaṃ bāhvor vidhīyate
analyzed: mama nāga ayutam pārtha balam bāhvoḥ vidhīyate

original: 07,168.017b*1382_02 prapātayeyaṃ ca śaraiḥ sendrān devān samāgatān
analyzed: prapātayeyam ca śaraiḥ sa indrān devān samāgatān
sa rākṣasa gaṇān pārtha sa asura uraga mānavān

original: 07,168.017c dārayeyaṃ mahīṃ krodhād vikireyaṃ ca parvatān
analyzed: dārayeyam mahīm krodhāt vikireyam ca parvatān

original: 07,168.018a āvidhya ca gadāṃ gurvīṃ bhīmāṃ kāñcanamālinīm
analyzed: āvidhya ca gadām gurvīm bhīmām kāñcana mālinīm
giri prakāśān kṣitijān bhañjeyam anilaḥ yathā

original: 07,168.019a sa tvam evaṃvidhaṃ jānan bhrātaraṃ māṃ nararṣabha
analyzed: sa tvam evaṃvidham jānan bhrātaram mām nara ṛṣabha
droṇaputrāt bhayam kartum nā arhasi amita vikrama

original: 07,168.020a atha vā tiṣṭha bībhatso saha sarvair nararṣabhaiḥ
analyzed: atha vā tiṣṭha bībhatso saha sarvaiḥ nara ṛṣabhaiḥ

original: 07,168.020c aham enaṃ gadāpāṇir jeṣyāmy eko mahāhave
analyzed: aham enam gadā pāṇiḥ jeṣyāmi ekaḥ mahā āhave
tatas pāñcāla rājasya putraḥ pārtham atha abravīt
saṃkruddham iva nardantam hiraṇyakaśipum hariḥ
bībhatso vipra karmāṇi viditāni manīṣiṇām
yājana adhyāpane dānam tathā yajña pratigrahau

original: 07,168.023a ṣaṣṭham adhyayanaṃ nāma teṣāṃ kasmin pratiṣṭhitaḥ
analyzed: ṣaṣṭham adhyayanam nāma teṣām kasmin pratiṣṭhitaḥ

original: 07,168.023c hato droṇo mayā yat tat kiṃ māṃ pārtha vigarhase
analyzed: hataḥ droṇaḥ mayā yat tat kim mām pārtha vigarhase
apakrāntaḥ svadharmāt ca kṣatra dharmam upāśritaḥ
amānuṣeṇa hanti asmān astreṇa kṣudra karma kṛt
tathā māyām prayuñjānam asahyam brāhmaṇabruvam

original: 07,168.025c māyayaiva nihanyād yo na yuktaṃ pārtha tatra kim
analyzed: māyayā eva nihanyāt yaḥ na yuktam pārtha tatra kim

original: 07,168.026a tasmiṃs tathā mayā śaste yadi drauṇāyanī ruṣā
analyzed: tasmin tathā mayā śaste yadi drauṇāyaniḥ ruṣā

original: 07,168.026c kurute bhairavaṃ nādaṃ tatra kiṃ mama hīyate
analyzed: kurute bhairavam nādam tatra kim mama hīyate

original: 07,168.027a na cādbhutam idaṃ manye yad drauṇiḥ śuddhagarjayā
analyzed: na ca adbhutam idam manye yat drauṇiḥ śuddha garjayā
ghātayiṣyati kauravyān paritrātum aśaknuvan

original: 07,168.028a yac ca māṃ dhārmiko bhūtvā bravīṣi gurughātinam
analyzed: yat ca mām dhārmikaḥ bhūtvā bravīṣi guru ghātinam
tad artham aham utpannaḥ pāñcālyasya sutaḥ nalāt

original: 07,168.029a yasya kāryam akāryaṃ vā yudhyataḥ syāt samaṃ raṇe
analyzed: yasya kāryam akāryam vā yudhyataḥ syāt samam raṇe

original: 07,168.029c taṃ kathaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ brūyāḥ kṣatriyaṃ vā dhanaṃjaya
analyzed: tam katham brāhmaṇam brūyāḥ kṣatriyam vā dhanaṃjaya

original: 07,168.030a yo hy anastravido hanyād brahmāstraiḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ hi an astra vidaḥ hanyāt brahmāstraiḥ krodha mūrchitaḥ

original: 07,168.030c sarvopāyair na sa kathaṃ vadhyaḥ puruṣasattama
analyzed: sarva upāyaiḥ na sa katham vadhyaḥ puruṣa sattama

original: 07,168.030d*1383_01 viśeṣāt pitṛhantā me na sa vadhyaḥ kathaṃ mayā
analyzed: viśeṣāt pitṛ hantā me na sa vadhyaḥ katham mayā

original: 07,168.030d*1383_02 yo 'yaṃ pāpaḥ sudurmedhā bāndhavān yudhi jaghnivān
analyzed: yaḥ yam pāpaḥ su durmedhāḥ bāndhavān yudhi jaghnivān

original: 07,168.030d*1383_03 tasya viprabruvavadhe kathaṃ pāpaṃ bhaven mama
analyzed: tasya viprabruva vadhe katham pāpam bhavet mama
vidharmiṇam dharma vidbhiḥ proktam teṣām viṣa upamam
jānan dharma artha tattva jñaḥ kim arjuna vigarhase

original: 07,168.032a nṛśaṃsaḥ sa mayākramya ratha eva nipātitaḥ
analyzed: nṛśaṃsaḥ sa mayā ākramya rathaḥ eva nipātitaḥ
tat mā abhinandyam bībhatso kimartham na abhinandase
kṛte raṇe katham pārtha jvalana arka viṣa upamam
bhīmam droṇa śiraḥ chede praśasyam na praśaṃsasi

original: 07,168.034a yo 'sau mamaiva nānyasya bāndhavān yudhi jaghnivān
analyzed: yaḥ sau mama eva na anyasya bāndhavān yudhi jaghnivān
chittvā api tasya mūrdhānam na eva asmi vigata jvaraḥ

original: 07,168.035a tac ca me kṛntate marma yan na tasya śiro mayā
analyzed: tat ca me kṛntate marma yat na tasya śiraḥ mayā
niṣāda viṣaye kṣiptam jayadratha śiraḥ yathā
avadhaḥ ca api śatrūṇām adharmaḥ śiṣyate rjuna

original: 07,168.036c kṣatriyasya hy ayaṃ dharmo hanyād dhanyeta vā punaḥ
analyzed: kṣatriyasya hi ayam dharmaḥ hanyāt dhanyeta vā punar

original: 07,168.037a sa śatrur nihataḥ saṃkhye mayā dharmeṇa pāṇḍava
analyzed: sa śatruḥ nihataḥ saṃkhye mayā dharmeṇa pāṇḍava

original: 07,168.037c yathā tvayā hataḥ śūro bhagadattaḥ pituḥ sakhā
analyzed: yathā tvayā hataḥ śūraḥ bhagadattaḥ pituḥ sakhā

original: 07,168.038a pitāmahaṃ raṇe hatvā manyase dharmam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: pitāmaham raṇe hatvā manyase dharmam ātmanaḥ

original: 07,168.038c mayā śatrau hate kasmāt pāpe dharmaṃ na manyase
analyzed: mayā śatrau hate kasmāt pāpe dharmam na manyase

original: 07,168.038d*1384_01 saṃbandhāvanataṃ pārtha na māṃ tvaṃ bahu manyase
analyzed: saṃbandha avanatam pārtha na mām tvam bahu manyase
sva gātra kṛta sopānam niṣaṇṇam iva dantinam

original: 07,168.038d*1384_03 kṣamāmi te sarvam eva vāgvyatikramam arjuna
analyzed: kṣamāmi te sarvam eva vāc vyatikramam arjuna
draupadyāḥ draupadeyānām kṛte na anyena hetunā
kula krama āgatam vairam mama ācāryeṇa viśrutam

original: 07,168.038d*1384_06 tathā jānāty ayaṃ loko na yūyaṃ pāṇḍunandanāḥ
analyzed: tathā jānāti ayam lokaḥ na yūyam pāṇḍu nandanāḥ
na anṛtaḥ pāṇḍavaḥ jyeṣṭhaḥ na aham vā adhārmikaḥ rjuna

original: 07,168.039b*1385_01 na kṣatriya iti prāhur yo na hanti raṇājire
analyzed: na kṣatriyaḥ iti prāhuḥ yaḥ na hanti raṇa ajire

original: 07,168.039b*1385_02 pitaraṃ vā guruṃ vāpi jighāṃsuṃ putraśiṣyayoḥ
analyzed: pitaram vā gurum vā api jighāṃsum putra śiṣyayoḥ
jihmena vā api a jihmena hanyāt eva a vicārayan

original: 07,168.039b*1385_04 ity uktaṃ brahmaṇā pūrvaṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ dviṣadvadhe
analyzed: iti uktam brahmaṇā pūrvam kṣatriyāṇām dviṣat vadhe

original: 07,168.039b*1385_05 tasmāc chiṣyeṇa nihataḥ śatrur me brāhmaṇabruvaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt śiṣyeṇa nihataḥ śatruḥ me brāhmaṇabruvaḥ

original: 07,168.039b*1385_06 yaḥ kṣatriyasuto hanyāt pitaraṃ vā guruṃ ca vā
analyzed: yaḥ kṣatriya sutaḥ hanyāt pitaram vā gurum ca vā

original: 07,168.039b*1385_07 aniṣṭaṃ kṣatriyo hanyāt sa vai kṣatriya ucyate
analyzed: aniṣṭam kṣatriyaḥ hanyāt sa vai kṣatriyaḥ ucyate

original: 07,168.039c śiṣyadhruṅ nihataḥ pāpo yudhyasva vijayas tava
analyzed: nihataḥ pāpaḥ yudhyasva vijayaḥ tava
dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ uvāca
sa aṅgāḥ vedāḥ yathānyāyam yena adhītāḥ mahātmanā
yasmin sākṣāt dhanurvedaḥ hrī niṣedhe pratiṣṭhitaḥ
tasmin ākruśyati droṇe mahā ṛṣi tanaye tadā
nīca ātmanā nṛśaṃsena kṣudreṇa guru ghātinā
yasya prasādāt karmāṇi kurvanti puruṣa ṛṣabhāḥ
amānuṣāṇi saṃgrāme devaiḥ asukarāṇi ca
tasmin ākruśyati droṇe samakṣam pāpa karmiṇaḥ

original: 07,169.004c nāmarṣaṃ tatra kurvanti dhik kṣatraṃ dhig amarṣitam
analyzed: na amarṣam tatra kurvanti dhik kṣatram dhik amarṣitam

original: 07,169.005a pārthāḥ sarve ca rājānaḥ pṛthivyāṃ ye dhanurdharāḥ
analyzed: pārthāḥ sarve ca rājānaḥ pṛthivyām ye dhanurdharāḥ

original: 07,169.005c śrutvā kim āhuḥ pāñcālyaṃ tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
analyzed: śrutvā kim āhuḥ pāñcālyam tat mama ācakṣva saṃjaya
saṃjayaḥ uvāca
śrutvā drupada putrasya tāḥ vācaḥ krūra karmaṇaḥ

original: 07,169.006c tūṣṇīṃ babhūvū rājānaḥ sarva eva viśāṃ pate
analyzed: tūṣṇīm babhūvuḥ rājānaḥ sarve eva viśām pate

original: 07,169.007a arjunas tu kaṭākṣeṇa jihmaṃ prekṣya ca pārṣatam
analyzed: arjunaḥ tu kaṭākṣeṇa jihmam prekṣya ca pārṣatam

original: 07,169.007c sabāṣpam abhiniḥśvasya dhig dhig dhig iti cābravīt
analyzed: sa bāṣpam abhiniḥśvasya dhik dhik dhik iti ca abravīt

original: 07,169.008a yudhiṣṭhiraś ca bhīmaś ca yamau kṛṣṇas tathāpare
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhiraḥ ca bhīmaḥ ca yamau kṛṣṇaḥ tathā apare

original: 07,169.008c āsan suvrīḍitā rājan sātyakir idam abravīt
analyzed: āsan su vrīḍitāḥ rājan sātyakiḥ idam abravīt

original: 07,169.009a nehāsti puruṣaḥ kaś cid ya imaṃ pāpapūruṣam

bhāṣamāṇam akalyāṇam śīghram hanyāt nara adhamam

original: 07,169.009d*1386_01 ete tvāṃ pāṇḍavāḥ sarve kutsayanti vivitsayā
analyzed: ete tvām pāṇḍavāḥ sarve kutsayanti vivitsayā

original: 07,169.009d*1386_02 karmaṇā tena pāpena śvapākam iva brāhmaṇāḥ
analyzed: karmaṇā tena pāpena śvapākam iva brāhmaṇāḥ

original: 07,169.009d*1387_01 etat kṛtvā mahat pāpaṃ ninditaṃ sarvasādhubhiḥ
analyzed: etat kṛtvā mahat pāpam ninditam sarva sādhubhiḥ

original: 07,169.009d*1387_02 na lajjase kathaṃ vaktuṃ samitiṃ prāpya śobhanām
analyzed: na lajjase katham vaktum samitim prāpya śobhanām

original: 07,169.010a kathaṃ ca śatadhā jihvā na te mūrdhā ca dīryate
analyzed: katham ca śatadhā jihvā na te mūrdhā ca dīryate

original: 07,169.010c gurum ākrośataḥ kṣudra na cādharmeṇa pātyase
analyzed: gurum ākrośataḥ kṣudra na ca adharmeṇa pātyase

original: 07,169.011a yāpyas tvam asi pārthaiś ca sarvaiś cāndhakavṛṣṇibhiḥ
analyzed: yāpyaḥ tvam asi pārthaiḥ ca sarvaiḥ ca andhaka vṛṣṇibhiḥ

original: 07,169.011c yat karma kaluṣaṃ kṛtvā ślāghase janasaṃsadi
analyzed: yat karma kaluṣam kṛtvā ślāghase jana saṃsadi

original: 07,169.012a akāryaṃ tādṛśaṃ kṛtvā punar eva guruṃ kṣipan
analyzed: akāryam tādṛśam kṛtvā punar eva gurum kṣipan

original: 07,169.012c vadhyas tvaṃ na tvayārtho 'sti muhūrtam api jīvatā
analyzed: vadhyaḥ tvam na tvayā arthaḥ asti muhūrtam api jīvatā

original: 07,169.013a kas tv etad vyavased āryas tvad anyaḥ puruṣādhamaḥ
analyzed: kaḥ tu etat vyavaset āryaḥ tvat anyaḥ puruṣa adhamaḥ

original: 07,169.013c nigṛhya keśeṣu vadhaṃ guror dharmātmanaḥ sataḥ
analyzed: nigṛhya keśeṣu vadham guroḥ dharma ātmanaḥ sataḥ

original: 07,169.014a saptāvare tathā pūrve bāndhavās te nipātitāḥ
analyzed: sapta avare tathā pūrve bāndhavāḥ te nipātitāḥ

original: 07,169.014c yaśasā ca parityaktās tvāṃ prāpya kulapāṃsanam
analyzed: yaśasā ca parityaktāḥ tvām prāpya kula pāṃsanam

original: 07,169.015a uktavāṃś cāpi yat pārthaṃ bhīṣmaṃ prati nararṣabham
analyzed: uktavān ca api yat pārtham bhīṣmam prati nara ṛṣabham

original: 07,169.015c tathānto vihitas tena svayam eva mahātmanā
analyzed: tathā antaḥ vihitaḥ tena svayam eva mahātmanā
tasya api tava sodaryaḥ nihantā pāpa kṛttamaḥ
na anyaḥ pāñcāla putrebhyaḥ vidyate bhuvi pāpa kṛt

original: 07,169.017a sa cāpi sṛṣṭaḥ pitrā te bhīṣmasyāntakaraḥ kila
analyzed: sa ca api sṛṣṭaḥ pitrā te bhīṣmasya anta karaḥ kila

original: 07,169.017c śikhaṇḍī rakṣitas tena sa ca mṛtyur mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: śikhaṇḍī rakṣitaḥ tena sa ca mṛtyuḥ mahātmanaḥ
pāñcālāḥ calitāḥ dharmāt kṣudrāḥ mitra guru druhaḥ
tvām prāpya saha sodaryam dhikkṛtam sarva sādhubhiḥ

original: 07,169.019a punaś ced īdṛśīṃ vācaṃ matsamīpe vadiṣyasi
analyzed: punar ced īdṛśīm vācam mad samīpe vadiṣyasi
śiraḥ te pātayiṣyāmi gadayā vajra kalpayā

original: 07,169.019d*1388_01 tvāṃ ca brahmahaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā janaḥ sūryam avekṣate
analyzed: tvām ca brahma haṇam dṛṣṭvā janaḥ sūryam avekṣate

original: 07,169.019d*1388_02 brahmahatyā hi te pāpaṃ prāyaścittārtham ātmanaḥ
analyzed: brahmahatyā hi te pāpam prāyaścitta artham ātmanaḥ
pāñcālaka su durvṛtta mama eva gurum agratas

original: 07,169.019d*1388_04 guror guruṃ ca bhūyo 'pi kṣipan naiva hi lajjase
analyzed: guroḥ gurum ca bhūyas kṣipan na eva hi lajjase

original: 07,169.019d*1388_05 tiṣṭha tiṣṭha sahasvaikaṃ gadāpātam imaṃ mama
analyzed: tiṣṭha tiṣṭha sahasva ekam gadā pātam imam mama
tava ca api sahiṣye ham gadā pātān anekaśas
sātvatena evam ākṣiptaḥ pārṣataḥ paruṣa akṣaram

original: 07,169.020c saṃrabdhaḥ sātyakiṃ prāha saṃkruddhaḥ prahasann iva
analyzed: saṃrabdhaḥ sātyakim prāha saṃkruddhaḥ prahasan iva

original: 07,169.021a śrūyate śrūyate ceti kṣamyate ceti mādhava
analyzed: śrūyate śrūyate ca iti kṣamyate ca iti mādhava

original: 07,169.021c na cānārya śubhaṃ sādhuṃ puruṣaṃ kṣeptum arhasi
analyzed: na ca anārya śubham sādhum puruṣam kṣeptum arhasi

original: 07,169.022a kṣamā praśasyate loke na tu pāpo 'rhati kṣamām
analyzed: kṣamā praśasyate loke na tu pāpaḥ rhati kṣamām

original: 07,169.022c kṣamāvantaṃ hi pāpātmā jito 'yam iti manyate
analyzed: kṣamāvantam hi pāpa ātmā jitaḥ yam iti manyate
sa tvam kṣudra samācāraḥ nīca ātmā pāpa niścayaḥ

original: 07,169.023c ā keśāgrān nakhāgrāc ca vaktavyo vaktum icchasi
analyzed: ā keśa agrāt nakha agrāt ca vaktavyaḥ vaktum icchasi

original: 07,169.023d*1389_01 varaṃ hi te mṛtaṃ pāpa na ca te vṛttam īdṛśam
analyzed: varam hi te mṛtam pāpa na ca te vṛttam īdṛśam
śrotum vaktavya tā mūlam nīcāḥ vakṣyanti mānavāḥ

original: 07,169.023d*1389_03 parān kṣipanti doṣeṇa sveṣu doṣeṣv adṛṣṭayaḥ
analyzed: parān kṣipanti doṣeṇa sveṣu doṣeṣu adṛṣṭayaḥ

original: 07,169.024a yaḥ sa bhūriśravāś chinne bhuje prāyagatas tvayā
analyzed: yaḥ sa bhūriśravāḥ chinne bhuje prāya gataḥ tvayā

original: 07,169.024c vāryamāṇena nihatas tataḥ pāpataraṃ nu kim
analyzed: vāryamāṇena nihataḥ tatas pāpataram nu kim
vyūhamānaḥ mayā droṇaḥ divyena astreṇa saṃyuge

original: 07,169.025c visṛṣṭaśastro nihataḥ kiṃ tatra krūra duṣkṛtam
analyzed: visṛṣṭa śastraḥ nihataḥ kim tatra krūra duṣkṛtam

original: 07,169.026a ayudhyamānaṃ yas tv ājau tathā prāyagataṃ munim
analyzed: ayudhyamānam yaḥ tu ājau tathā prāya gatam munim

original: 07,169.026c chinnabāhuṃ parair hanyāt sātyake sa kathaṃ bhavet
analyzed: chinna bāhum paraiḥ hanyāt sātyake sa katham bhavet

original: 07,169.027a nihatya tvāṃ yadā bhūmau sa vikrāmati vīryavān
analyzed: nihatya tvām yadā bhūmau sa vikrāmati vīryavān

original: 07,169.027c kiṃ tadā na nihaṃsy enaṃ bhūtvā puruṣasattamaḥ
analyzed: kim tadā na nihaṃsi enam bhūtvā puruṣa sattamaḥ

original: 07,169.028a tvayā punar anāryeṇa pūrvaṃ pārthena nirjitaḥ
analyzed: tvayā punar anāryeṇa pūrvam pārthena nirjitaḥ

original: 07,169.028c yadā tadā hataḥ śūraḥ saumadattiḥ pratāpavān

pinākinam khaṇḍaparaśum lokānām patim īśvaram
niṣaṅginam paraśu hastam dharmāṇām ca prakāśakam
prapadye śaraṇam devam śaraṇyam cīra vāsasam

original: 07,173.034a namas tasmai sureśāya yasya vaiśravaṇaḥ sakhā
analyzed: namaḥ tasmai sureśāya yasya vaiśravaṇaḥ sakhā
su vāsase namaḥ nityam suvratāya su dhanvine
ugra āyudhāya devāya suvratāya bhavāya ca
sruvahastāya devāya sukha dhanvāya dhanvine
dhanvantarāya dhanuṣe dhanva ācāryāya dhanvine
ugra āyudhāya devāya namaḥ suravarāya ca
namaḥ stu bahu rūpāya namaḥ ca bahu dhanvine
namaḥ stu sthāṇave nityam suvratāya su dhanvine

original: 07,173.037c namo 'stu tripuraghnāya bhagaghnāya ca vai namaḥ
analyzed: namaḥ stu tripura ghnāya bhaga ghnāya ca vai namaḥ
vanaspatīnām pataye narāṇām pataye namaḥ

original: 07,173.038b*1453_01 mātṝṇāṃ pataye caiva gaṇānāṃ pataye namaḥ
analyzed: mātṝṇām pataye ca eva gaṇānām pataye namaḥ

original: 07,173.038c apāṃ ca pataye nityaṃ yajñānāṃ pataye namaḥ
analyzed: apām ca pataye nityam yajñānām pataye namaḥ
pūṣṇaḥ danta vināśāya tryakṣāya vara dāya ca
nīlakaṇṭhāya piṅgāya svarṇa keśāya vai namaḥ
karmāṇi ca eva divyāni mahādevasya dhīmataḥ
tāni te kīrtayiṣyāmi yathāprajñam yathāśrutam

original: 07,173.041a na surā nāsurā loke na gandharvā na rākṣasāḥ
analyzed: na surāḥ na asurāḥ loke na gandharvāḥ na rākṣasāḥ

original: 07,173.041c sukham edhanti kupite tasminn api guhāgatāḥ
analyzed: sukham edhanti kupite tasmin api guhā gatāḥ
dakṣasya yajamānasya vidhivat saṃbhṛtam purā

original: 07,173.042a vivyādha kupito yajñaṃ nirbhayas tu bhavas tadā
analyzed: vivyādha kupitaḥ yajñam nirbhayaḥ tu bhavaḥ tadā

original: 07,173.042c dhanuṣā bāṇam utsṛjya saghoṣaṃ vinanāda ca
analyzed: dhanuṣā bāṇam utsṛjya sa ghoṣam vinanāda ca

original: 07,173.043a te na śarma kutaḥ śāntiṃ lebhire sma surās tadā
analyzed: te na śarma kutas śāntim lebhire sma surāḥ tadā

original: 07,173.043c vidrute sahasā yajñe kupite ca maheśvare
analyzed: vidrute sahasā yajñe kupite ca maheśvare
tena jyā tala ghoṣeṇa sarve lokāḥ samākulāḥ

original: 07,173.044c babhūvur vaśagāḥ pārtha nipetuś ca surāsurāḥ
analyzed: babhūvuḥ vaśa gāḥ pārtha nipetuḥ ca sura asurāḥ

original: 07,173.045a āpaś cukṣubhire sarvāś cakampe ca vasuṃdharā
analyzed: āpaḥ cukṣubhire sarvāḥ cakampe ca vasuṃdharā

original: 07,173.045c parvatāś ca vyaśīryanta diśo nāgāś ca mohitāḥ
analyzed: parvatāḥ ca vyaśīryanta diśaḥ nāgāḥ ca mohitāḥ

original: 07,173.046a andhāś ca tamasā lokā na prakāśanta saṃvṛtāḥ
analyzed: andhāḥ ca tamasā lokāḥ na prakāśanta saṃvṛtāḥ

original: 07,173.046c jaghnivān saha sūryeṇa sarveṣāṃ jyotiṣāṃ prabhāḥ
analyzed: jaghnivān saha sūryeṇa sarveṣām jyotiṣām prabhāḥ

original: 07,173.047a cukruśur bhayabhītāś ca śāntiṃ cakrus tathaiva ca
analyzed: cukruśuḥ bhaya bhītāḥ ca śāntim cakruḥ tathā eva ca
ṛṣayaḥ sarva bhūtānām ātmanaḥ ca sukha eṣiṇaḥ
pūṣāṇam abhyadravata śaṃkaraḥ prahasan iva
puroḍāśam bhakṣayataḥ daśanān vai vyaśātayat

original: 07,173.049a tato niścakramur devā vepamānā natāḥ sma tam
analyzed: tatas niścakramuḥ devāḥ vepamānāḥ natāḥ sma tam

original: 07,173.049c punaś ca saṃdadhe dīptaṃ devānāṃ niśitaṃ śaram
analyzed: punar ca saṃdadhe dīptam devānām niśitam śaram
sa dhūma visphuliṅga ābham vidyut toyada saṃnibham

original: 07,173.049d*1455_02 taṃ dṛṣṭvā tu surāḥ sarve praṇipatya maheśvaram
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā tu surāḥ sarve praṇipatya maheśvaram

original: 07,173.050a rudrasya yajñabhāgaṃ ca viśiṣṭaṃ te nv akalpayan
analyzed: rudrasya yajña bhāgam ca viśiṣṭam te nu akalpayan

original: 07,173.050c bhayena tridaśā rājañ śaraṇaṃ ca prapedire
analyzed: bhayena tridaśāḥ rājam śaraṇam ca prapedire

original: 07,173.051a tena caivātikopena sa yajñaḥ saṃdhitas tadā
analyzed: tena ca eva ati kopena sa yajñaḥ saṃdhitaḥ tadā

original: 07,173.051c yattāś cāpi surā āsan yattāś cādyāpi taṃ prati
analyzed: yattāḥ ca api surāḥ āsan yattāḥ ca adya api tam prati

original: 07,173.052a asurāṇāṃ purāṇy āsaṃs trīṇi vīryavatāṃ divi
analyzed: asurāṇām purāṇi āsan trīṇi vīryavatām divi

original: 07,173.052c āyasaṃ rājataṃ caiva sauvarṇam aparaṃ mahat
analyzed: āyasam rājatam ca eva sauvarṇam aparam mahat
āyasam tārakākṣasya kamalākṣasya rājatam

original: 07,173.053c sauvarṇaṃ paramaṃ hy āsīd vidyunmālina eva ca
analyzed: sauvarṇam paramam hi āsīt vidyunmālinaḥ eva ca

original: 07,173.054a na śaktas tāni maghavān bhettuṃ sarvāyudhair api
analyzed: na śaktaḥ tāni maghavān bhettum sarva āyudhaiḥ api

original: 07,173.054c atha sarve 'marā rudraṃ jagmuḥ śaraṇam arditāḥ
analyzed: atha sarve marāḥ rudram jagmuḥ śaraṇam arditāḥ

original: 07,173.055a te tam ūcur mahātmānaṃ sarve devāḥ savāsavāḥ
analyzed: te tam ūcuḥ mahātmānam sarve devāḥ sa vāsavāḥ
brahma datta varāḥ hi ete ghorāḥ tripura vāsinaḥ

original: 07,173.055b*1456_02 pīḍayanty adhikaṃ lokaṃ yasmāt te varadarpitāḥ
analyzed: pīḍayanti adhikam lokam yasmāt te vara darpitāḥ

original: 07,173.055b*1456_03 tvad ṛte devadeveśa nānyaḥ śaktaḥ kathaṃ cana
analyzed: tvat ṛte devadeveśa na anyaḥ śaktaḥ katham cana

original: 07,173.055b*1456_04 hantuṃ daityān mahādeva tvaṃ hantā ca suradviṣām
analyzed: hantum daityān mahādeva tvam hantā ca suradviṣām
rudra raudrāḥ bhaviṣyanti paśavaḥ sarva karmasu
nipātayiṣyase ca enān asurān bhuvaneśvara

original: 07,173.056a sa tathoktas tathety uktvā devānāṃ hitakāmyayā
analyzed: sa tathā uktaḥ tathā iti uktvā devānām hita kāmyayā

original: 07,173.056b*1457_01 śalyam agniṃ ca vai kṛtvā puṅkhe somam apāṃ patim
analyzed: śalyam agnim ca vai kṛtvā puṅkhe somam apām patim

original: 07,173.056b*1457_02 sa kṛtvā dhanur oṃkāraṃ sāvitrīṃ jyāṃ maheśvaraḥ
analyzed: sa kṛtvā dhanuḥ oṃkāram sāvitrīm jyām maheśvaraḥ

original: 07,173.056b*1457_03 hayāṃś ca caturo vedān sarvavedamayaṃ ratham
analyzed: hayān ca caturaḥ vedān sarva veda mayam ratham
prajāpatim ratha śreṣṭhe viniyujya sa sārathim
gandhamādana vindhyau ca kṛtvā vaṃśa dhvajau haraḥ

original: 07,173.056b@025_0002 pṛthvīṃ sasāgaravanāṃ rathaṃ kṛtvā tu śaṃkaraḥ
analyzed: pṛthvīm sa sāgara vanām ratham kṛtvā tu śaṃkaraḥ

original: 07,173.056b@025_0003 akṣaṃ kṛtvā tu nāgendraṃ śeṣaṃ nāgaṃ trilocanaḥ
analyzed: akṣam kṛtvā tu nāga indram śeṣam nāgam trilocanaḥ

original: 07,173.056b@025_0004 cakraṃ kṛtvā tu candrārkau devadevaḥ pinākadhṛk
analyzed: cakram kṛtvā tu candra arkau devadevaḥ pinākadhṛk

original: 07,173.056b@025_0005 aṇī kṛtvailapatraṃ ca puṣpadantaṃ ca tryambakaḥ
analyzed: aṇī kṛtvā elapatram ca puṣpadantam ca tryambakaḥ

original: 07,173.056b@025_0006 yūpaṃ kṛtvā ca malayam avanāhaṃ ca takṣakam
analyzed: yūpam kṛtvā ca malayam avanāham ca takṣakam

original: 07,173.056b@025_0007 yoktrāṅgāni ca catvāri kṛtvā śarvaḥ pratāpavān
analyzed: yoktra aṅgāni ca catvāri kṛtvā śarvaḥ pratāpavān
vedān kṛtvā atha caturaḥ caturaḥ śvān maheśvaraḥ
upavedān khalīnān ca kṛtvā lokatraya īśvaraḥ

original: 07,173.056b@025_0010 gāyatrīṃ pragrahaṃ kṛtvā sāvitrīṃ ca maheśvaraḥ
analyzed: gāyatrīm pragraham kṛtvā sāvitrīm ca maheśvaraḥ

original: 07,173.056b@025_0011 kṛtvoṃkāraṃ pratodaṃ ca brahmāṇaṃ caiva sārathim
analyzed: kṛtvā oṃkāram pratodam ca brahmāṇam ca eva sārathim

original: 07,173.056b@025_0012 gāṇḍīvaṃ mandaraṃ kṛtvā guṇaṃ kṛtvā ca vāsukim
analyzed: gāṇḍīvam mandaram kṛtvā guṇam kṛtvā ca vāsukim

original: 07,173.056b@025_0013 viṣṇuṃ śarottamaṃ kṛtvā śalyam agniṃ tathaiva ca
analyzed: viṣṇum śara uttamam kṛtvā śalyam agnim tathā eva ca

original: 07,173.056b@025_0014 vāyuṃ kṛtvātha vājābhyāṃ puṅkhe vaivasvataṃ yamam
analyzed: vāyum kṛtvā atha vājābhyām puṅkhe vaivasvatam yamam

original: 07,173.056b@025_0015 vidyut kṛtvātha niśrāṇaṃ meruṃ kṛtvātha vai dhvajam
analyzed: vidyut kṛtvā atha merum kṛtvā atha vai dhvajam

original: 07,173.056b@025_0016 āruhya sa rathaṃ divyaṃ sarvadevamayaṃ śivaḥ
analyzed: āruhya sa ratham divyam sarva deva mayam śivaḥ
tripurasya vadha arthāya sthāṇuḥ praharatām varaḥ

original: 07,173.056b@025_0019 stūyamānaḥ suraiḥ pārtha ṛṣibhiś ca tapodhanaiḥ
analyzed: stūyamānaḥ suraiḥ pārtha ṛṣibhiḥ ca tapodhanaiḥ

original: 07,173.056b@025_0020 sthānaṃ māheśvaraṃ kṛtvā divyam apratimaṃ prabhuḥ
analyzed: sthānam māheśvaram kṛtvā divyam apratimam prabhuḥ
atiṣṭhat sthāṇu bhūtaḥ sa sahasram parivatsarān

original: 07,173.057a yadā trīṇi sametāni antarikṣe purāṇi vai
analyzed: yadā trīṇi sametāni antarikṣe purāṇi vai

original: 07,173.057c triparvaṇā triśalyena tena tāni bibheda saḥ
analyzed: tri parvaṇā tri śalyena tena tāni bibheda saḥ

original: 07,173.058a purāṇi na ca taṃ śekur dānavāḥ prativīkṣitum
analyzed: purāṇi na ca tam śekuḥ dānavāḥ prativīkṣitum
śaram kālāgni saṃyuktam viṣṇu soma samāyutam

original: 07,173.058d*1458_01 purāṇi dagdhavantaṃ taṃ devī yātā pravīkṣitum
analyzed: purāṇi dagdhavantam tam devī yātā pravīkṣitum

original: 07,173.058d*1459_01 mumoca bhagavāñ śaṃbhuḥ purāṇy ādiśya vīryavān
analyzed: mumoca bhagavān śaṃbhuḥ purāṇi ādiśya vīryavān
tatas daityāḥ mahābhāga sa putrāḥ sa parigrahāḥ

original: 07,173.058d*1459_03 bhasmībhūtā durātmāno bhinnāś ca tripure purā
analyzed: bhasmībhūtāḥ durātmānaḥ bhinnāḥ ca tripure purā
hatvā daityān mahādevaḥ sarva devaiḥ sabhājitaḥ

original: 07,173.058d*1459_05 ṛṣibhiḥ saṃstutaś caiva parāṃ mudam upāgamat
analyzed: ṛṣibhiḥ saṃstutaḥ ca eva parām mudam upāgamat
tatas brahmā suraiḥ sārdham bṛhaspati purogamaiḥ
stutim ārebhire kartum bhinne tripura mandire
devyāḥ svayaṃvare vṛttam śṛṇuṣva anyat dhanaṃjaya

original: 07,173.059a bālam aṅkagataṃ kṛtvā svayaṃ pañcaśikhaṃ punaḥ
analyzed: bālam aṅka gatam kṛtvā svayam pañcaśikham punar

original: 07,173.059c umā jijñāsamānā vai ko 'yam ity abravīt surān
analyzed: umā jijñāsamānā vai kaḥ yam iti abravīt surān
asūyataḥ ca śakrasya vajreṇa prahariṣyataḥ
bāhum sa vajram śakrasya kruddhasya astambhayat prabhuḥ
prahasya bhagavān tūrṇam sarva loka īśvaraḥ śivaḥ
tatas saṃstambhita bhujaḥ śakraḥ deva gaṇaiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: 07,173.060b*1462_03 jagāma śaraṇaṃ tūrṇaṃ brahmāṇaṃ prabhum avyayam
analyzed: jagāma śaraṇam tūrṇam brahmāṇam prabhum avyayam

original: 07,173.060b*1462_04 te taṃ praṇamya śirasā procuḥ prāñjalayas tadā
analyzed: te tam praṇamya śirasā procuḥ prāñjalayaḥ tadā

original: 07,173.060b*1462_05 kim apy aṅkagataṃ brahman pārvatyā bhūtam adbhutam
analyzed: kim api aṅka gatam brahman pārvatyāḥ bhūtam adbhutam

original: 07,173.060b*1462_06 bālarūpadharaṃ dṛṣṭvā nāsmābhis tac ca lakṣitam
analyzed: bāla rūpa dharam dṛṣṭvā na asmābhiḥ tat ca lakṣitam

original: 07,173.060b*1462_07 tasmāt tvāṃ praṣṭum icchāmo nirjitā yena vai vayam
analyzed: tasmāt tvām praṣṭum icchāmaḥ nirjitāḥ yena vai vayam
a yudhyatā hi bālena līlayā sa puraṃdarāḥ

original: 07,173.060b*1462_09 teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā brahmā brahmavidāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: teṣām tat vacanam śrutvā brahmā brahma vidām varaḥ

original: 07,173.060b*1462_10 dhyātvā sa śaṃbhuṃ bhagavān bālaṃ cāmitatejasam
analyzed: dhyātvā sa śaṃbhum bhagavān bālam ca amita tejasam

original: 07,173.060b*1462_11 uvāca bhagavān brahmā śakrādīṃś ca surottamān
analyzed: uvāca bhagavān brahmā śakra ādīn ca sura uttamān

original: 07,173.060b*1462_12 carācarasya jagataḥ prabhuḥ sa bhagavān haraḥ
analyzed: carācarasya jagataḥ prabhuḥ sa bhagavān haraḥ

original: 07,173.060b*1462_13 tasmāt parataraṃ nānyat kiṃ cid asti maheśvarāt
analyzed: tasmāt parataram na anyat kim cit asti maheśvarāt

original: 07,173.060b*1462_14 yo dṛṣṭo hy umayā sārdhaṃ yuṣmābhir amitadyutiḥ
analyzed: yaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ hi umayā sārdham yuṣmābhiḥ amita dyutiḥ

original: 07,173.060b*1462_15 sa pārvatyāḥ kṛte devaḥ kṛtavān bālarūpatām
analyzed: sa pārvatyāḥ kṛte devaḥ kṛtavān bāla rūpa tām

original: 07,173.060b*1462_16 te mayā sahitā yūyaṃ prapadyadhvaṃ tam eva hi
analyzed: te mayā sahitāḥ yūyam prapadyadhvam tam eva hi

original: 07,173.060c sa eṣa bhagavān devaḥ sarvalokeśvaraḥ prabhuḥ
analyzed: saḥ eṣa bhagavān devaḥ sarva loka īśvaraḥ prabhuḥ

original: 07,173.060d*1463_01 evam uktā gatā devā yatra devo maheśvaraḥ
analyzed: evam uktāḥ gatāḥ devāḥ yatra devaḥ maheśvaraḥ

original: 07,173.060d*1464_01 athānyena svarūpeṇa brahmā dṛṣṭvā tam avyayam
analyzed: atha anyena sva rūpeṇa brahmā dṛṣṭvā tam avyayam

original: 07,173.061a na saṃbubudhire cainaṃ devās taṃ bhuvaneśvaram
analyzed: na saṃbubudhire ca enam devāḥ tam bhuvaneśvaram
sa prajāpatayaḥ sarve bāla arka sadṛśa prabham

original: 07,173.062a athābhyetya tato brahmā dṛṣṭvā ca sa maheśvaram
analyzed: atha abhyetya tatas brahmā dṛṣṭvā ca sa maheśvaram

original: 07,173.062c ayaṃ śreṣṭha iti jñātvā vavande taṃ pitāmahaḥ
analyzed: ayam śreṣṭhaḥ iti jñātvā vavande tam pitāmahaḥ
brahmā uvāca

original: 07,173.062d*1465_01 tvaṃ yajño bhuvanasyāsya tvaṃ gatis tvaṃ parāyaṇam
analyzed: tvam yajñaḥ bhuvanasya asya tvam gatiḥ tvam parāyaṇam

original: 07,173.062d*1465_02 tvaṃ bhavas tvaṃ mahādevas tvaṃ dhāma paramaṃ padam
analyzed: tvam bhavaḥ tvam mahādevaḥ tvam dhāma paramam padam

original: 07,173.062d*1465_03 tvayā sarvam idaṃ vyāptaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam
analyzed: tvayā sarvam idam vyāptam jagat sthāvara jaṅgamam
bhagavan bhūta bhavya īśa lokanātha jagatpate

original: 07,173.062d*1465_05 prasādaṃ kuru śakrasya tvayā krodhārditasya vai
analyzed: prasādam kuru śakrasya tvayā krodha arditasya vai
vyāsaḥ uvāca

original: 07,173.062d*1465_06 padmayoner vacaḥ śrutvā tataḥ prīto maheśvaraḥ
analyzed: padmayoneḥ vacaḥ śrutvā tatas prītaḥ maheśvaraḥ
prasāda abhimukhaḥ bhūtvā ca aṭṭahāsam atha akarot

original: 07,173.063a tataḥ prasādayām āsur umāṃ rudraṃ ca te surāḥ
analyzed: tatas prasādayām āsuḥ umām rudram ca te surāḥ

original: 07,173.063c abhavac ca punar bāhur yathāprakṛti vajriṇaḥ
analyzed: abhavat ca punar bāhuḥ yathāprakṛti vajriṇaḥ
teṣām prasannaḥ bhagavān sa patnīkaḥ vṛṣadhvajaḥ

original: 07,173.065a sa vai rudraḥ sa ca śivaḥ so 'gniḥ śarvaḥ sa sarvavit
analyzed: sa vai rudraḥ sa ca śivaḥ saḥ gniḥ śarvaḥ sa sarva vid

original: 07,173.065c sa cendraś caiva vāyuś ca so 'śvinau sa ca vidyutaḥ
analyzed: sa ca indraḥ ca eva vāyuḥ ca saḥ śvinau sa ca vidyutaḥ

original: 07,173.066a sa bhavaḥ sa ca parjanyo mahādevaḥ sa cānaghaḥ
analyzed: sa bhavaḥ sa ca parjanyaḥ mahādevaḥ sa ca anaghaḥ

original: 07,173.066c sa candramāḥ sa ceśānaḥ sa sūryo varuṇaś ca saḥ
analyzed: sa candramāḥ sa ca īśānaḥ sa sūryaḥ varuṇaḥ ca saḥ

original: 07,173.067a sa kālaḥ so 'ntako mṛtyuḥ sa yamo rātryahāni ca
analyzed: sa kālaḥ saḥ ntakaḥ mṛtyuḥ sa yamaḥ rātri ahāni ca

original: 07,173.067c māsārdhamāsā ṛtavaḥ saṃdhye saṃvatsaraś ca saḥ
analyzed: māsa ardha māsāḥ ṛtavaḥ saṃdhye saṃvatsaraḥ ca saḥ

original: 07,173.068a sa ca dhātā vidhātā ca viśvātmā viśvakarmakṛt
analyzed: sa ca dhātā vidhātā ca viśvātmā viśva karma kṛt

original: 07,173.068c sarvāsāṃ devatānāṃ ca dhārayaty avapur vapuḥ
analyzed: sarvāsām devatānām ca dhārayati avapuḥ vapuḥ

original: 07,173.069a sarvair devaiḥ stuto devaḥ saikadhā bahudhā ca saḥ
analyzed: sarvaiḥ devaiḥ stutaḥ devaḥ saḥ ekadhā bahudhā ca saḥ
śatadhā sahasradhā ca eva tathā śata sahasradhā

original: 07,173.069d*1466_01 dve tanū tasya devasya vedajñā brāhmaṇā viduḥ
analyzed: dve tanū tasya devasya veda jñāḥ brāhmaṇāḥ viduḥ

original: 07,173.069d*1466_02 ghorā cānyā śivā cānyā te tanū bahudhā punaḥ
analyzed: ghorā ca anyā śivā ca anyā te tanū bahudhā punar

original: 07,173.069d*1466_03 ghorā tu yā tanus tasya so 'gnir vidyut sa bhāskaraḥ
analyzed: ghorā tu yā tanuḥ tasya saḥ gniḥ vidyut sa bhāskaraḥ

original: 07,173.069d*1466_04 somārdhaṃ punar evāsya āpo jyotīṃṣi candramāḥ
analyzed: soma ardham punar eva asya āpaḥ jyotīṃṣi candramāḥ
vedāṅgāḥ sa upaniṣadaḥ purāṇa adhyātma niścayāḥ

original: 07,173.069d*1466_06 yad atra paramaṃ guhyaṃ sa vai devo maheśvaraḥ
analyzed: yat atra paramam guhyam sa vai devaḥ maheśvaraḥ

original: 07,173.070a īdṛśaḥ sa mahādevo bhūyaś ca bhagavān ajaḥ
analyzed: īdṛśaḥ sa mahādevaḥ bhūyas ca bhagavān ajaḥ

original: 07,173.070c na hi sarve mayā śakyā vaktuṃ bhagavato guṇāḥ
analyzed: na hi sarve mayā śakyāḥ vaktum bhagavataḥ guṇāḥ
api varṣa sahasreṇa satatam pāṇḍu nandana
sarvaiḥ grahaiḥ gṛhītān vai sarva pāpa samanvitān
sa mocayati su prītaḥ śaraṇyaḥ śaraṇa āgatān

original: 07,173.072a āyur ārogyam aiśvaryaṃ vittaṃ kāmāṃś ca puṣkalān
analyzed: āyuḥ ārogyam aiśvaryam vittam kāmān ca puṣkalān

original: 07,173.072c sa dadāti manuṣyebhyaḥ sa caivākṣipate punaḥ
analyzed: sa dadāti manuṣyebhyaḥ sa ca eva ākṣipate punar

original: 07,173.073a sendrādiṣu ca deveṣu tasya caiśvaryam ucyate
analyzed: sa indra ādiṣu ca deveṣu tasya ca aiśvaryam ucyate

original: 07,173.073c sa caiva vyāhṛte loke manuṣyāṇāṃ śubhāśubhe
analyzed: sa ca eva vyāhṛte loke manuṣyāṇām śubha aśubhe

original: 07,173.074a aiśvaryāc caiva kāmānām īśvaraḥ punar ucyate
analyzed: aiśvaryāt ca eva kāmānām īśvaraḥ punar ucyate

original: 07,173.074c maheśvaraś ca bhūtānāṃ mahatām īśvaraś ca saḥ
analyzed: maheśvaraḥ ca bhūtānām mahatām īśvaraḥ ca saḥ

original: 07,173.075a bahubhir bahudhā rūpair viśvaṃ vyāpnoti vai jagat
analyzed: bahubhiḥ bahudhā rūpaiḥ viśvam vyāpnoti vai jagat

original: 07,173.075c asya devasya yad vaktraṃ samudre tad atiṣṭhata
analyzed: asya devasya yat vaktram samudre tat atiṣṭhata
vaḍavāmukhā iti vikhyātam pibat toya mayam haviḥ

original: 07,173.076a eṣa caiva śmaśāneṣu devo vasati nityaśaḥ
analyzed: eṣa ca eva śmaśāneṣu devaḥ vasati nityaśas

original: 07,173.076c yajanty enaṃ janās tatra vīrasthāna itīśvaram
analyzed: yajanti enam janāḥ tatra vīrasthāne iti īśvaram

original: 07,173.077a asya dīptāni rūpāṇi ghorāṇi ca bahūni ca
analyzed: asya dīptāni rūpāṇi ghorāṇi ca bahūni ca

original: 07,173.077c loke yāny asya kurvanti manuṣyāḥ pravadanti ca
analyzed: loke yāni asya kurvanti manuṣyāḥ pravadanti ca
nāmadheyāni lokeṣu bahūni atra yathārtha vat

original: 07,173.078c nirucyante mahattvāc ca vibhutvāt karmabhis tathā
analyzed: nirucyante mahat tvāt ca vibhu tvāt karmabhiḥ tathā
vede ca asya samāmnātam śatarudrīyam uttamam
nāmnā ca anantarudra iti upasthānam mahātmanaḥ

original: 07,173.080a sa kāmānāṃ prabhur devo ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ
analyzed: sa kāmānām prabhuḥ devaḥ ye divyāḥ ye ca mānuṣāḥ

original: 07,173.080c sa vibhuḥ sa prabhur devo viśvaṃ vyāpnuvate mahat
analyzed: sa vibhuḥ sa prabhuḥ devaḥ viśvam vyāpnuvate mahat

original: 07,173.081a jyeṣṭhaṃ bhūtaṃ vadanty enaṃ brāhmaṇā munayas tathā
analyzed: jyeṣṭham bhūtam vadanti enam brāhmaṇāḥ munayaḥ tathā

original: 07,173.081c prathamo hy eṣa devānāṃ mukhād asyānalo 'bhavat
analyzed: prathamaḥ hi eṣa devānām mukhāt asya analaḥ bhavat

original: 07,173.082a sarvathā yat paśūn pāti taiś ca yad ramate punaḥ
analyzed: sarvathā yat paśūn pāti taiḥ ca yat ramate punar

original: 07,173.082c teṣām adhipatir yac ca tasmāt paśupatiḥ smṛtaḥ
analyzed: teṣām adhipatiḥ yat ca tasmāt paśupatiḥ smṛtaḥ

original: 07,173.083a nityena brahmacaryeṇa liṅgam asya yadā sthitam
analyzed: nityena brahmacaryeṇa liṅgam asya yadā sthitam

original: 07,173.083c mahayanti ca lokāś ca maheśvara iti smṛtaḥ
analyzed: mahayanti ca lokāḥ ca maheśvaraḥ iti smṛtaḥ

original: 07,173.084a ṛṣayaś caiva devāś ca gandharvāpsarasas tathā
analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ ca eva devāḥ ca gandharva apsarasaḥ tathā

original: 07,173.084c liṅgam asyārcayanti sma tac cāpy ūrdhvaṃ samāsthitam
analyzed: liṅgam asya arcayanti sma tat ca api ūrdhvam samāsthitam

original: 07,173.084d*1469_01 urdhvaliṅgas tataś cokto bhagavān brāhmaṇaiḥ sadā
analyzed: urdhvaliṅgaḥ tatas ca uktaḥ bhagavān brāhmaṇaiḥ sadā

original: 07,173.085a pūjyamāne tatas tasmin modate sa maheśvaraḥ
analyzed: pūjyamāne tatas tasmin modate sa maheśvaraḥ

original: 07,173.085c sukhī prītaś ca bhavati prahṛṣṭaś caiva śaṃkaraḥ
analyzed: sukhī prītaḥ ca bhavati prahṛṣṭaḥ ca eva śaṃkaraḥ
yat asya bahudhā rūpam bhūta bhavya bhavat sthitam

original: 07,173.086c sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ caiva bahurūpas tataḥ smṛtaḥ
analyzed: sthāvaram jaṅgamam ca eva bahurūpaḥ tatas smṛtaḥ
eka akṣaḥ jājvalan āste vā

original: 07,173.087c krodhād yaś cāviśal lokāṃs tasmāc charva iti smṛtaḥ
analyzed: krodhāt yaḥ ca aviśat lokān tasmāt śarvaḥ iti smṛtaḥ

original: 07,173.088a dhūmraṃ rūpaṃ ca yat tasya dhūrjaṭis tena ucyate
analyzed: dhūmram rūpam ca yat tasya dhūrjaṭiḥ tena ucyate

original: 07,173.088c viśve devāś ca yat tasmin viśvarūpas tataḥ smṛtaḥ
analyzed: viśve devāḥ ca yat tasmin viśvarūpaḥ tatas smṛtaḥ

original: 07,173.089a tisro devīr yadā caiva bhajate bhuvaneśvaraḥ
analyzed: tisraḥ devīḥ yadā ca eva bhajate bhuvaneśvaraḥ

original: 07,173.089c dyām apaḥ pṛthivīṃ caiva tryambakaś ca tataḥ smṛtaḥ
analyzed: dyām apaḥ pṛthivīm ca eva tryambakaḥ ca tatas smṛtaḥ

original: 07,173.090c śivam icchan manuṣyāṇāṃ tasmād eśa śivaḥ smṛtaḥ
analyzed: śivam icchan manuṣyāṇām tasmāt eśa śivaḥ smṛtaḥ
sahasra akṣaḥ yuta akṣaḥ vā vā

original: 07,173.091c yac ca viśvaṃ mahat pāti mahādevas tataḥ smṛtaḥ
analyzed: yat ca viśvam mahat pāti mahādevaḥ tatas smṛtaḥ

original: 07,173.092a dahaty ūrdhvaṃ sthito yac ca prāṇotpattisthitaś ca yat
analyzed: dahati ūrdhvam sthitaḥ yat ca prāṇa utpatti sthitaḥ ca yat

original: 07,173.092c sthitaliṅgaś ca yan nityaṃ tasmāt sthāṇur iti smṛtaḥ

original: 07,173.092d*1470_01 sūryācandramasor loke prakāśanty aṃśavaś ca ye

original: 07,173.092d*1470_02 te keśāḥ saṃjñitās tasya vyomakeśas tataḥ smṛtaḥ

original: 07,173.092d*1470_03 kapiḥ śreṣṭha iti prokto dharmaś ca vṛṣa ucyate
analyzed: kapiḥ śreṣṭhaḥ iti proktaḥ dharmaḥ ca vṛṣaḥ ucyate

original: 07,173.092d*1470_04 sa devadevo bhagavān kīrtyate vai vṛṣākapiḥ
analyzed: sa devadevaḥ bhagavān kīrtyate vai vṛṣākapiḥ

original: 07,173.092d*1470_05 brahmāṇam indraṃ varuṇaṃ yamaṃ dhanadam eva ca
analyzed: brahmāṇam indram varuṇam yamam dhanadam eva ca

original: 07,173.092d*1470_06 nigṛhya harate yasmāt tasmād dhara iti smṛtaḥ
analyzed: nigṛhya harate yasmāt tasmāt dharaḥ iti smṛtaḥ

original: 07,173.092d*1470_08 lalāṭe netram asṛjat tena tryakṣaḥ sa ucyate
analyzed: lalāṭe netram asṛjat tena tryakṣaḥ saḥ ucyate

original: 07,173.092d*1470_09 bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyac ca sarvaṃ sarvam aśeṣataḥ
analyzed: bhūtam bhavyam bhaviṣyat ca sarvam sarvam aśeṣatas

original: 07,173.093a viṣamasthaḥ śarīreṣu samaś ca prāṇinām iha

original: 07,173.094a pūjayed vigrahaṃ yas tu liṅgaṃ vāpi samarcayet
analyzed: pūjayet vigraham yaḥ tu liṅgam vā api samarcayet

original: 07,173.094c liṅgaṃ pūjayitā nityaṃ mahatīṃ śriyam aśnute

original: 07,173.095a ūrubhyām ardham āgneyaṃ somārdhaṃ ca śivā tanuḥ
analyzed: ūrubhyām ardham āgneyam soma ardham ca śivā tanuḥ

original: 07,173.095c ātmano 'rdhaṃ ca tasyāgniḥ somo 'rdhaṃ punar ucyate
analyzed: ātmanaḥ ṛdham ca tasya agniḥ somaḥ ṛdham punar ucyate

original: 07,173.096a taijasī mahatī dīptā devebhyaś ca śivā tanuḥ
analyzed: taijasī mahatī dīptā devebhyaḥ ca śivā tanuḥ

original: 07,173.096c bhāsvatī mānuṣeṣv asya tanur ghorāgnir ucyate
analyzed: bhāsvatī mānuṣeṣu asya tanuḥ ghorā agniḥ ucyate

original: 07,173.097a brahmacaryaṃ caraty eṣa śivā yāsya tanus tayā
analyzed: brahmacaryam carati eṣa śivā yā asya tanuḥ tayā

original: 07,173.097c yāsya ghoratarā mūrtiḥ sarvān atti tayeśvaraḥ
analyzed: yā asya ghoratarā mūrtiḥ sarvān atti tayā īśvaraḥ

original: 07,173.098a yan nirdahati yat tīkṣṇo yad ugro yat pratāpavān
analyzed: yat nirdahati yat tīkṣṇaḥ yat ugraḥ yat pratāpavān

original: 07,173.099a eṣa devo mahādevo yo 'sau pārtha tavāgrataḥ
analyzed: eṣa devaḥ mahādevaḥ sau pārtha tava agratas

original: 07,173.099c saṃgrāme śātravān nighnaṃs tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ pinākadhṛk
analyzed: saṃgrāme śātravān nighnan tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ pinākadhṛk
sindhurāja vadha arthāya pratijñāte tvayā anagha

original: 07,173.099d*1472_01 kṛṣṇena darśite svapne yas te śailendramūrdhani
analyzed: kṛṣṇena darśite svapne yaḥ te śailendra mūrdhani

original: 07,173.100a eṣa vai bhagavān devaḥ saṃgrāme yāti te 'grataḥ
analyzed: eṣa vai bhagavān devaḥ saṃgrāme yāti te gratas

original: 07,173.100c yena dattāni te 'strāṇi yais tvayā dānavā hatāḥ
analyzed: yena dattāni te strāṇi yaiḥ tvayā dānavāḥ hatāḥ

original: 07,173.101a dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ puṇyaṃ vedaiś ca saṃjñitam
analyzed: dhanyam yaśasyam āyuṣyam puṇyam vedaiḥ ca saṃjñitam
devadevasya te pārtha vyākhyātam śatarudriyam
aśvamedha sahasrasya rājasūya śatasya ca
iṣṭasya phalam āpnoti durācāraḥ pi mānavaḥ
gavām koṭi śatasya api dānasya phalam aśnute

original: 07,173.103a caturvidham idaṃ stotraṃ yaḥ śṛṇoti naraḥ sadā
analyzed: caturvidham idam stotram yaḥ śṛṇoti naraḥ sadā

original: 07,173.103c vijitya sarvāñ śatrūn sa rudraloke mahīyate
analyzed: vijitya sarvām śatrūn sa rudra loke mahīyate

original: 07,173.104a caritaṃ mahātmano divyaṃ sāṃgrāmikam idaṃ śubham
analyzed: caritam mahātmanaḥ divyam sāṃgrāmikam idam śubham

original: 07,173.104c paṭhan vai śatarudrīyaṃ śṛṇvaṃś ca satatotthitaḥ
analyzed: paṭhan vai śatarudrīyam śṛṇvan ca satata utthitaḥ

original: 07,173.104d*1474_01 yaḥ śṛṇoti naro bhaktyā yaś cāpi parikīrtayet
analyzed: yaḥ śṛṇoti naraḥ bhaktyā yaḥ ca api parikīrtayet

original: 07,173.104d*1474_02 divā vā yadi vā rātrau brahmahatyāṃ vyapohati
analyzed: divā vā yadi vā rātrau brahmahatyām vyapohati

original: 07,173.105a bhakto viśveśvaraṃ devaṃ mānuṣeṣu tu yaḥ sadā
analyzed: bhaktaḥ viśveśvaram devam mānuṣeṣu tu yaḥ sadā

original: 07,173.105c varān sa kāmāṃl labhate prasanne tryambake naraḥ
analyzed: varān sa kāmān labhate prasanne tryambake naraḥ

original: 07,173.106a gaccha yudhyasva kaunteya na tavāsti parājayaḥ
analyzed: gaccha yudhyasva kaunteya na tava asti parājayaḥ

original: 07,173.106c yasya mantrī ca goptā ca pārśvatas te janārdanaḥ
analyzed: yasya mantrī ca goptā ca pārśvatas te janārdanaḥ
saṃjayaḥ uvāca
evam uktvā arjunam saṃkhye parāśara sutaḥ tadā
jagāma bharata śreṣṭha yathāgatam ariṃdama
saṃjayaḥ uvāca
yuddham kṛtvā mahā ghoram pañca ahāni mahā balaḥ
brāhmaṇaḥ nihataḥ rājan brahma lokam avāptavān

original: 07,173.107d*1475_03 adhīte yat phalaṃ vede tad asminn api parvaṇi
analyzed: adhīte yat phalam vede tat asmin api parvaṇi
kṣatriyāṇām abhīrūṇām viśuddham khyāpyate yaśaḥ

original: 07,173.107d*1476_01 ya idaṃ paṭhate parva śṛṇuyād vāpi nityaśaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ idam paṭhate parva śṛṇuyāt vā api nityaśas

original: 07,173.107d*1476_02 sa mucyate mahāpāpaiḥ kṛtair ghoraiś ca karmabhiḥ
analyzed: sa mucyate mahā pāpaiḥ kṛtaiḥ ghoraiḥ ca karmabhiḥ
idam paṭhet sarva mahā artha saṃyutam
raṇe jayam pāṇḍava vṛṣṇi siṃhayoḥ

original: 07,173.107d*1477_03 sadā śubhaṃ yaḥ śṛṇuyāt tathā naraḥ
analyzed: sadā śubham yaḥ śṛṇuyāt tathā naraḥ
sa mucyate karmabhiḥ
yajña avāptiḥ brāhmaṇasya iha nityam
yuddhe nityam kṣatriyāṇām jayaḥ ca
śeṣau varṇau kāmam iṣṭam labhete
putrān pautrān nityam iṣṭān tathā eva

original: 07,173.107d*1479_01 etad ākhyāya vai sūto rājñaḥ sarvaṃ tu saṃjayaḥ
analyzed: etat ākhyāya vai sūtaḥ rājñaḥ sarvam tu saṃjayaḥ
prayātaḥ śibirāya eva draṣṭum karṇasya vaiśasam
